GSP28dhebta_u:287: [4] atrālokasammataḥ ṭīkāpāṭhaḥ “bījābījāvadhṛtaye” na tu yathā mudrite labhyate “bījādyavadhṛtaye” iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:291: asati vacane kathaṃ sambhava ity āha -- tatsādhake[1.20]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:293: “anumānavyutpattiḥ prayojanam asya” ity4anabhidhāne viśiṣṭaṃ prayojanaṃ prati prakaraṇasyopāyatvaṃ katham iha sandigdhe vidagdha ity āśaṅkyāha
GSP28dhebta_u:297: sa kasyacid granthasya darśanāt tasya cārthitva5viṣayopāyabhāvaṃ prati sādhakabādhakapramāṇāpratisaṃvedī
GSP28dhebta_u:299: jijñāsādita evānyatra ādivākyaviyukta iva granthe pravartiṣyati(te)
GSP28dhebta_u:301: anyathā ādivākyavikale bhūyasi śāstre pravṛ6ttir na syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:302: tatra ca yad eva pravṛttinibandhanaṃ tad atrāpi bhaviṣyati /
GSP28dhebta_u:303: nāpi ādivākye saty apy āśvāso yujyate,
GSP28dhebta_u:307: tato niṣphalaivādivākyakriyā syād yadi tadviṣaya7saṃśayotpādanene pravṛttyarthaṃ tad upavarṇyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:308: anyathā tv ādivākyepi katham iva pravarteta śroteti? /
GSP28dhebta_u:310: tathāhi --yady arthasaṃśayaṃ prakaraṇe pravṛttyaṅgaṃ kartum abhidheyādīni abhidhīyanta ādivākyena,
GSP28dhebta_u:312: tarhi tatraivādivākye kathaṃ pravṛttiḥ8 śrotṝṇām asati tasyādivākyasyābhidheyādyabhidhāyake vākyāntare' iti prṣṭodharmottarādirācaṣṭāṃ tāvat
GSP28dhebta_u:315: anyathā prakaraṇepi kā pravṛttir iti tulyacodyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:316: vyākhyātṛvacanāt tatra pravṛttau prakaraṇe 'pi kā kṣatiḥ? /
GSP28dhebta_u:321: tatra tadantareṇāpi pravṛttir nānyatreti prativacanaṃ pratikṣiptam /
GSP28dhebta_u:322: tasmād dūram api gatvā tenedam abhidhānīyaṃ yad evāsmadabhimatam iti kim atinirbandhena [kṛ]taṃ bahutithena doṣeṇa /
GSP28dhebta_u:323: saṃśayasya 2svarūpam upadarśayann āha -- kim asya [2.22] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:324: na vā kiñcidi[2.22]ty anena niścayenānyānusaraṇabījaṃ darśitam /
GSP28dhebta_u:325: saṃprati prayojanaviśeṣaṃ prati prakaraṇasyopāyabhāvasaṃśayaṃ tadabhidhānāt prāṇ
GSP28dhebta_u:327: purastāt sambhavī tato 'pi prakaraṇe pravṛttir avyāhateti darśayan 3tatraivābhyccaye
GSP28dhebta_u:329: evaṃ jijñāsoḥ [2.24] ity etajjijñāsāta ity arthāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:334: saprayojanatvānusaraṇe kadācid asmadabhimatam api prayoja4naṃ sambhāvyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:335: ata eva vyanakti -- asmadabhimatena vā [2.24] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:337: vyarthaḥ [2.25] niṣphalaḥ prayojanapratipādako vākyasya prastāvādādivākyasyopanyāsaḥ [2.26] pradarśanam /
GSP28dhebta_u:338: yady evam artho vākyopanyāso vyarthas tarhi kim arthaṃvārtikakāreṇākārīty āśaṇkya tasmād [2.27] ityā5dinopasaṃhāravyājena phalam asya darśayati
GSP28dhebta_u:340: kartuṃ pratipādayituṃ vā nārabhyate [2.28] nānuṣṭhīyata iti yathāsaṃkhyaṃ sambandhaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:342: {p.243} itiḥ [3.2] pratiṣedhyasya tatkaraṇapratipādanānuṣṭhānalaksaṇasya vyāpakasyānupa6labdher ākāraṃ kathayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:345: yasyā udbhāvanaṃ pradarśanaṃ tad evārthaḥ prayojanam,
GSP28dhebta_u:346: tad yathā bhavatīty upanyasanakriyāyā viśeṣaṇam etat /
GSP28dhebta_u:348: asmāt khalu arthā ādāya ādāya vyākhyāyanta iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:349: syād etat -- vacana7syāsya bahir arthe prāmāṇyābhāvāt katham asau tadvacanāt tadasiddhatāṃ budhyate? /
GSP28dhebta_u:350: yadi parasmādasya tadviṣayo 'rthasaṃśayaḥ pravrttyaṅgaṃ jāyata iti tad eva matamāyātam iti kim anena masīmrakṣitakukkaṭanyāyenācariteneti /
GSP28dhebta_u:351: atrācaṣṭe -- kevalaṃ yaḥ pratipattā sati prayojanādau prekṣāpūrvakāriṇaṃ kartāraṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:352: 8niyamena ādau tadvādinaṃ manvānaḥ tadarthaṃ vacanam asyāpy apaśyann aprekṣāvatprayuktatvagarbhaprayojanādikam atrāpi jānīte,
GSP28dhebta_u:356: ādyasya tūktayā nītyā pravṛttir avyāhateti sarvam avadātam /
GSP28dhebta_u:359: etac ca sādhv asādhu vā madhyasthayā dhiyā sadbhir eva vijñāsyata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:360: pūrvaṃ sāmānyena prayojanābhidhānam ākhyātam idānīṃ viśeṣeṇāvacchindann āha tatreti [3.5] vākyopanyāse /
GSP28dhebta_u:361: etad arthātmanopi saṃbhavāt prakaraṇātmana ity āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:363: kathaṃ punar vyutpādanaṃ “parokṣārthe“tyādiśabdarūpasya prakaraṇasya prayojanam ity
GSP28dhebta_u:367: vākyasya [3.6] ekasminn arthe prādhānyena pratipādye 'rthādvāreṇānyonyā3pekṣiṇa upakāryopakārakabhāvenāvasthitasya padasamūhasya /
GSP28dhebta_u:375: [5] parasparasaṃsargāt' S[ataḥ paraṃ sarvatra mudritahetubinduṭīkāyāḥS' iti saṃjñā bodhyā /]
GSP28dhebta_u:376: {p. 244} nanv etāvatāpi na jñāyate kotra samudāyārtho yasmin pratipādye amīṣāṃ parasparasambandhena vyāpāra ity āha tathāhi [3.8] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:377: nipātasamudāyaścāyaṃ yasmād ity asminn arthe sarvatra /
GSP28dhebta_u:379: yadi tacchabdena tat parāmṛṣyeta tadā tadabhidheyaṃ vyutpādyatayoktaṃ bhaved yāvatā tacchabdena tan na parāmṛṣṭam iti āha -- tasyaiva [3.9] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:382: tato 'yam arthaḥ -- yasmāt tacchabdena tasya sambandhaḥ svīkāraḥ tasmāt sambandhāt [3.9] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:386: syād etat -- ayaṃ khalu tacchabdo anantarapra6kāntaṃ pradhānaṃ parāmṛśan dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP28dhebta_u:395: [7] ṭīkāyāṃ prater atra truṭitatvātguṇabhūtam' iti kalpayitvā sthāpitaḥ pāṭhaḥ,
GSP28dhebta_u:399: pradhānasya saṃsparśaḥ svīkāraḥ sambandhaḥ iti yāvat /
GSP28dhebta_u:400: tena samaṃ vāstavasambandhāt tatparāmarśaḥ syādity āha -- śabdānām [3.12] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:403: kasaṃkāśe kiṃ mahāstrākarṣaṇaprāye8ṇeti manyamānas tadabhimataṃ prādhānyam eva darśayann āha -- pakṣe[3.13]tyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:404: ayam asyāśayaḥ -- yady api samāsārthopasarjanaṃ pratyavamrasṭum aśakyaṃ tathāpi vyutpādyatayā śāstre prakṛtatvāt buddhyantareṇa gṛhītaṃ svatantraṃ satpratyavamṛṣyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:408: {p. 245} yady evaṃ tadvyutpattyartham iti vaktavye ṇicā nirdeśena kiṃ prayojanam ity āha -- ata eva [3.15] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:409: yato 'numānavyutpattiḥ prakaraṇasya sādhyatvād eva prayojanaṃ nānyathā ataḥ asmāt kāraṇāt prakaraṇasya vyāpāras tathārthābhidhānaṃ tad darśayituṃ[8][3.16]
GSP28dhebta_u:410: kiṃrūpaṃ tad datśayitum ity āha -- anumāne[3.15]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:411: anumānavyutpattiḥ viṣayaḥ sādhyatvād ya2sya sa tathoktas taṃ darśayituṃ vyutpattiviṣayaṃ prayojakavyāpāraṃ darśayitum iti yāvat /
GSP28dhebta_u:417: evaṃ ca vyācaksāṇaḥ śiṣyasyānumānavyutpattau prakaraṇasya hetukartṛtāṃ darśayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:420: sati caivaṃ kartuḥ śrotuś ca karaṇa-śravaṇaprayojanam api sūcitaṃ bhavati /
GSP28dhebta_u:421: athāsati sādhyasādhanasambandhābhidhāne kathaṃ tatpratītir yena tasya tatprayojanaṃ siddhim adhyāsītety āha -- tataś ca [3.17] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:425: nanu ca praṇetur jñānastham arthaṃ pratipādayitum ucyate na (ṃuccaritena)
GSP28dhebta_u:427: na hi anyathā tam arthaṃ pratipādyā(dyāḥ ā)
GSP28dhebta_u:429: tathā cārthābhidhānam evātra prayojakasya prakaraṇasya vyāpāraḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:432: tataś cāsyaivābhidhānārtham idam ārabhyata iti prasaktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:435: na tv asyaivābhidhānārtham iti codyaṃ pratividhātum abhyupagacchann āha -- yady api [3.18] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:436: śabdasya vṛttam vartanam pravṛttiḥ vyāpāra iti yāvat /
GSP28dhebta_u:437: tena śābdena nyā6yena prakaraṇavyāpārasya prādhānyam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:438: etad uktaṃ bhavati -- śabdasya hi vyutpattiviṣayaḥ prayojakavyāpāro 'bhidheyaḥ pradhānaṃ ten tādarthyaṃ gamyeteti /
GSP28dhebta_u:439: yadīdam anumatam eva tarhi kim artham evam abhihitam ity āśaṅkya pratisamādhānam āha -- tathāpi [3.19] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:441: {p 246}vastuvṛttyāpi kathaṃ vyutpatteḥ prādhānyam ity āha tasyā [3.18] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:442: ayam āśayaḥ -- sarvo hi prayojakavyāpāraḥ prayojyakriyārthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:443: uktaṃ hi “vikledanopasarjanā viklittiḥ paceḥ pradhānārthaḥ” iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:444: tasmād vyutpādanārtham iti prayojakavyāpāravad vyutpattyartham ity uktaṃ bhavati /
GSP28dhebta_u:445: tadvyutpattyartham iti tūcyamāne anyais tadarthais bhojanā8d iva (janāva)
GSP28dhebta_u:446: sthānādibhiḥ prayojakas tadarthamātravyāpāratayā samāna uktaḥ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:448: sa kathaṃ nām gamyeta iti nyāyyo ṇiṅnirdeśaḥ iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:449: śābdīṃ gatim āśritya vākyasya prakaraṇaprayojanābhidhānapravṛttatvam abhisandhāya
GSP28dhebta_u:450: parokṣārthety āder ekadeśasya śābdyaiva gatyā guṇabhūtārthavācakatvaṃ da[6b] 1rśayann
GSP28dhebta_u:453: kṛtam arthātmanas tenābhihitena ity āśaṅkyāha -- na hi [3.24] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:454: tātparyārthapradarśanenaivaṃ vyācakṣāṇaś cārthena nyāyena abhidheyaprayojanam eva vaktuṃ pravṛttam idaṃ vākyam iti darśayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:457: kiṃ tad i2ty apekṣāyāṃ brāhmaṇītyuktau strītvāvagatāv api yathā na tatra strīpratyayas tadvat sarvatra draṣṭavyam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:458: ā samantād upyate 'nena iti āvapanam [4.5] kim ity apekṣāyāṃ iyam [4.5] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:460: nanu parokṣārthapratipatter anumānāśrayatvāt yadi tad vyutpādyate tarhi śabdāder api tannimittatvāt tad api kiṃ na vyutpādyate ity āśaṅkyāha -- anena [4.7] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:464: kasmād evam uktaṃ bhavatīty āha -- anyasmāt [4.8] iti uktatrirūpaliṅgād anyasmāt tatpratipatter avyabhicāriṇyāḥ parokṣārthapratipatter ayogād aprayujyamānatvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:465: asaty avadhāraṇe ayam a4rthaḥ kutastya ity āha -- avadhāraṇāt [4.10] niyamād iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:469: uktād anyena prakāreṇānumānatve prāmāṇye sati iti yāvat /
GSP28dhebta_u:471: {p. 247} syād etat -- aliṅgajāpi parokṣārthapratipattir 5avybhicāriṇī bhaviṣyati tatkahaṃ śabdādīnāṃ saty api prāmāṇye tathātvam ity āśaṅkyāha -- tathāhi [4.13] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:479: tad eva lakṣaṇaṃ svabhāvo yasya tadbhāvas tattvaṃ tasmāt [4.15] /
GSP28dhebta_u:481: [9] ālokasammataḥ mūlapāṭhaḥavisaṃvādanalakṣatvāt' na tu yathā mudritaḥ --avisaṃvādalakṣaṇatvāt' iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:483: anyata eva sā bhaviṣyati kim etāvatānumānatvam? /
GSP28dhebta_u:484: na hi pakṣadharmataiva liṅgasya rūpaṃ yena tajjāyāḥ tathātvaṃ syādity āha -- anyatrāpi(topi) [4.15] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:487: [10] S' prater atra truṭitatvātyadi syā' iti pūritam asmābhiḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:488: ālokam anusṛtyaasambaddhāt yadi syā' iti -- pāṭhaḥ pūraṇīyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:490: tataś cānvayavyatirekavato 'pi śabdāder apakṣadharmāt parokṣārthapratipattir avyabhicāriṇī nānumānam ity āśaṅkyāha -- dharmyasaṃbandhepi [4.16] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:491: yady evam astu tatpratipattihetoḥ pakṣadharmatvam api /
GSP28dhebta_u:492: kim ataḥ ity āha -- evam [4.18] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:501: yatra tu arthaviśeṣe vartate sa prāyeṇa kathyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:502: syād etat -- utsūtro 'yam arthas tvayā vyākhyāyate na tv ayam atrācāryasya vivakṣita ity āha eṣa ca [4.19] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:504: nanu prakṛtasambandhād arthitam ayam artho 'tyanta (-darśane 'yam artho 'saṅgata)
GSP28dhebta_u:506: vyāpta eva ca [4.22] iti samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇam idam /
GSP28dhebta_u:507: narañ ca nārāyaṇa[7a] 1m eva cādau svataḥ sutau dvau janayāṃ babhūva
GSP28dhebta_u:510: iti ca bhāvaḥ avadhāraṇāt [4.22] iti dhru(bru)vataḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:518: katham arthaviṣayatvābhidhāne 'numānaprāmāṇyasya svalakṣaṇa2viṣayatvam uktaṃ bhavatīty āha -- arthe[4.25]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:519: evam evācāryasya tathābhidhānaṃ saṅgacchate nānyatheti darśayitum āha -- ata eva [4.26] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:523: atra prāmāṇyasya vastuviṣayatvād anyena sāmānyaviṣayatvaprakāreṇa tatra [4.27] svalakṣaṇe,
GSP28dhebta_u:527: tena tadarthakriyārthitayaive pravṛttir upapatsyata ity āha -- sāmānyasyeti [5.1] /
GSP28dhebta_u:529: tasyām evārthakriyāyāṃ pravṛttir bhaviṣyatīty āha -- tasyāś ca [5.2] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:533: tarhi vāhadohārthakri4yārthitayaiva pratīte gotve sāmānye pravartsyatīti ata āha -- na hi [5.2] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:542: abhyupetyāpi sambandham idānīm āha -- satyapi [5.5] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:544: dhūmārthinopi dhūmapratipattau dhūmadhvaje pratipattiḥ prāpnoti iti iṣṭam dharmam atikrāntaḥ prasaṅgaḥ atiprasaṅga[5.6]s tasmāddhetoḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:546: vivekaḥ -- anyatvaṃ yena sa tathā tasya [5.6] /
GSP28dhebta_u:547: tadanavasāya eva kuta ity āha -- samavāyasya [5.3] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:553: nanu kim idaṃ samavāyasya sūkṣmatvaṃ vivakṣitam? /
GSP28dhebta_u:556: athāpy upalabdhijananayogyarūparahitatvaṃ tad api tadabhāvāt tad eva nopalabhyatām,
GSP28dhebta_u:557: na tu tasya tādrūpyeṇa sāmānyatadvetor bhedānupalakṣaṇam upapadyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:558: na ca samavāyo nopalabhyatenaiyāyikamate samavetaviśeṣaṇabhāvena tasyopalabdher iṣṭatvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:561: iha hi sūkṣmatvaṃ samavāyasya samavāyinor bhedenānupalambhakatvaṃ vivakṣitam /
GSP28dhebta_u:562: eṣa hi samavāyasya mahimā yena samavāyinau nirluṭhitagarbhavadbhedena nopala8mbhayati paṭatantvādivad iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:565: iha bhrāntes tvayāpy avaśyābhyupagantavyatvād bhrāntimātram evāstu [5.8] ity āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:566: vāsanādvayanibaddho hi vikalpaḥ svābhāsam evāgovyāvṛttaṃ pratiyan bāhyasyāpy agovyāvṛttatayā
GSP28dhebta_u:567: bhedam avagāhitum anīśāno bāhya eva gaur mayā pratīta ity abhimanyamā[7b] 1naḥ prakṛtyaiva
GSP28dhebta_u:569: bhrāntir eva bhrāntimātram [5.8] vastubhūtasāmānyaśūnyaṃ svakṣaṇāśrayatayā anumānajñānāśrayatayopagatatvena
GSP28dhebta_u:571: gaḍurūpaṃ [5.8] tena tadviṣayatayopagateneti prakaraṇāt kiṃ [5.8] na kiñcid ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:572: ayam asyāśayaḥ -- 2yadi vikalpo dṛśyavikalpyāv arthāv ekīkṛtya lokaṃ pravartayituṃ na śaknuyāt yadi ca tadupagame 'pi bhrāntiḥ pravṛttinimittaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:574: yadi ca tat pramāṇaprasiddhaṃ bhavet gaḍuvadevānupayuktam api upagamyeta,
GSP28dhebta_u:578: na ca vyaktiṣu sarvato vyāvṛttāsu anugatākārasya buddhipratibhāsasyārope kiṇcin nimittam asti /
GSP28dhebta_u:579: tat kathaṃ bhrāntyā pravṛttikalpanā jyāyasīty abhiprāyavānāha -- nirbīje[5.8]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:581: yāḥ svahetubhyas tathotpannās tā vyaktayaḥ svahetusāmarthyāt tadekapratyavamarṣārthajñānādy ekaṃ kāryaṃ 4yāsāṃ tās tathā /
GSP28dhebta_u:582: etad uktaṃ bhavati -- atatkāryavyāvṛttyā tadekakāryatvaṃ sarvasajātīyānugataṃ tāsu vidyamānam anugatākārasya buddhipratibhāsasyāropabījaṃ kin na bhavatīti? /
GSP28dhebta_u:583: syād etat -- tadekakāryatayā tathābhūtā api vyaktayaḥ tathābhūtāyā bhrānter bījam upapadyante /
GSP28dhebta_u:584: sāmānyam ity asmatpakṣasyāpi na kiñcit pramāṇam ity abhi5sambandham ākalayya parasparasāmānyābhidhānam unmūlayitum āha -- varṇe[5.10]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:587: tābhyāṃ samāno 'viśiṣṭaḥ ākāra ābhāso yasya yatra vā tat tathoktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:588: varṇasamānābhāsam ākṛtisamānābhāsaṃ varṇābhāsam ākṛtyābhāsam iti yāvat /
GSP28dhebta_u:590: tajjñānasyāpi tathātvaṃ nāyuktam ity āha -- na ca [5.11] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:594: varṇākṛtiprayuktaṃ hi pratibhāsamānaṃ hi tadvarṇākṛtiyoginy aparatra bhrānter bījaṃ [5.11] nibandhanaṃ bhavet,
GSP28dhebta_u:596: yadi nāma sāmānya7tadvator varṇādiyogābhyāṃ vaisadṛśyaṃ tathāpi sāmānyaṃ tatra bhramanibandhanaṃ kiṃ na bhavati ity āha -- sādṛśye[5.11]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:597: asti hi kācidbhrāntir yā antarupaplavasambhave ity abhipretya paraiḥ [5.12] ity āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:598: yadi evaṃ bāhyasya buddhipratibhāsena sāmānyena kiṃ sādṛśyaṃ yena brāntir utpadyata iti āha -- vyaktaya [5.12] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:599: [17]sāmānyālambanaṃ yaj jñānaṃ tasya ya ākāro8 vijātīyavyāvṛttarūpaṃ tasya sarūpāḥ [5.13][18]vijātīyavyāvṛttā [5.12] iti hetubhāvena viśeṣaṇam
GSP28dhebta_u:601: buddhipratibhāsasya vā atadrūpaparāvṛttatayaivāvabhāsanād iti ca bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:607: yairvaiśeṣikādibhir vyakter bhinnaṃ sāmānyam iṣṭaṃ tair apy avaśyam uktayā nītyā
GSP28dhebta_u:608: svalakṣaṇaviṣayam anumānasya prāmāṇyam eṣṭavyam iti pra[8a] 1tipādya saṃpratimīmāṃsakādīn
GSP28dhebta_u:612: tac ca vyaktisvarūpam iti svalakṣaṇaviṣayam eva prāmāṇyaṃ tasyāpatitam ity āśayaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:613: yady evaṃ bhavanmatavat tad api matam atiśobhanam ity āśaṅkya āha -- svalakṣaṇe[5.17]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:615: pratītau cakṣurindriyādivaiyarthyaprasaṅgena vyakter apratibhāsane tadātmakaṃ sāmānyaṃ katham iva pratibhāyād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:616: nanu yady anumānasyāpi prāmāṇyaṃ svalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ tarhi pratyakṣād asya bhedaḥ katham ity āśaṅkyāha --[19]parokṣa iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:619: [19] S saṃjñakahetubinduṭīkāyāḥ prater atra truṭitatvāt mūlapāṭhābhāvaḥ bodhyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:620: yasmād arthā[t]sākṣād anudaya3mānam utpattuṃ liṅgam apeksate,
GSP28dhebta_u:621: arthañ ca na sākṣātkaroti tasmād ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:623: syān matam -- yady asyāpi svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣayaḥ,
GSP28dhebta_u:625: so 'numānasya viṣayaḥ[NB I] itinyāyabindur virudhyetety āha -- tadeveti /
GSP28dhebta_u:627: kathaṃ tathā vaktuṃ śakyata ity āha -- lakṣyata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:628: sā4mānyam atadrūpaparāvṛttir lakṣaṇaṃ lakṣakaṃ yasyātadrūpaparāvṛttasya vastunaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:629: ta eva bhedāś ca avivecitabhedāḥ sāmānyam ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:630: punar uktāśaṅkām ity arthapunaruktāśaṅkā ity avaseyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:633: arthapunaruktam -- yadā viśeṣavidhitsā5dyabhāve sa evārthaḥ śabdāntareṇābhidhīyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:634: śabdapunaruktaṃ tu vidhitsādyabhāva eva yadā sa eva śabdaḥ punar uccāryate /
GSP28dhebta_u:635: viśeṣavidhitsādibhāve tad eva dvaidham arthānuvādaśabdānuvādātmanā dvaidhaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP28dhebta_u:641: prabhedo 'pi dvidhā draṣṭavyaḥ -- anupalabdhyādibhedena pakṣadharmatvādyātmanā ca /
GSP28dhebta_u:644: rūpaprabhedaniścāyakaṃ pramāṇaṃ nokta7m evaty āśaṃkyāha trividheti /
GSP28dhebta_u:647: evam abhidhānād eva cāsya prabhedasyety atrāsmābhis tathā vyākhyātam anyathā etan na saṃgaccheta /
GSP28dhebta_u:648: syād etat -- liṅgalakṣaṇānumānasvarūpasya vyutpādanaṃ syād yadi lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tan nirdiṣṭaṃ bhavet /
GSP28dhebta_u:649: prabhedasya ca 8tadā syād yadi tan nirdeśaḥ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:650: na cātra tadvācakam astīty āha tatra tredhāvyutpādane vyavasthite satīti /
GSP28dhebta_u:651: evañ ca nirdeśapradarśanaṃ paraṃ kṛtaṃ boddhavyaṃ na tu lakṣaṇānuvādena lakṣyavidhirdarśitaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:652: hetur iti tu lakṣyamanūdya pakṣadharma ityādilakṣaṇaṃ vidheyam avaseyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:657: atra tu sāhāyakaṃkumārilasākṣiṇam apakṣipann āha tad uktam iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:668: so 'pi kasmād ity āha -- yogyatvād iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:671: sa viṣayo 'syeti tadviṣayas tasya bhāvas tattā /
GSP28dhebta_u:676: [20] bhāvāṃśenaiva saṃyogo yogyatvādi indriyasya hi' iti SV, abhāva 18 /
GSP28dhebta_u:678: anukrāntaṃ rūpaṃ [6.9] svabhāvo yasya tat tathā /
GSP28dhebta_u:680: hetvantaram api tathā bhaviṣyati ity āha -- yadi [6.9] iti sambhāvayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:688: na ca tasya cātyantāsato 'vikalakāraṇasya bhāvaḥ sambhavati iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:692: {p. 253} amūṣāṃ sambhavam abhyupapadyedānīṃ dūṣaṇaṃ datte -- sambhave ca[23] [6.14] 5iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:695: nanu katham ayaṃ niyamaḥ sidhyatīti praśne kim idam akṛtaṃ niyamasiddhyanaṅgam abhidhīyata ity āśaṅkyāha -- evaṃ manyata [6.18] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:699: tadvipakṣasya [6.19] tasya niyamaviṣayasya vipakṣaḥ tadvipakṣas tasya vyāptau /
GSP28dhebta_u:701: 6pratiṣedhyasya hetutvasya yaḥ svabhāvas tena yadviruddhaṃ hetvābhāsatvaṃ tasya upalabdhyā [6.25] /
GSP28dhebta_u:704: kathaṃ punaḥ parasparaparihāravattayā tayor virodhaḥ pratīyata ity āha -- tadātme[7.1]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:705: tasya hetor ya ātmā tatra niyato yaḥ pratibhāsas tasya yaj jñānaṃ saṃve7danaṃ tasmāddhetoḥ viparītasya anyatayā tadanātmatayā sāmarthyāt jñātayā
GSP28dhebta_u:708: tasmāt kiṃ bhavatīty āha -- parasparam iti [7.2]
GSP28dhebta_u:709: syād etat -- atyantāsato hetvantarasya na kenacit saha virodhāvagatiḥ yena viruddhopalambhāt abhāvagatir bhavati /
GSP28dhebta_u:710: tatra ca hetutvam a8tyantāsat kathaṃ niṣidhyeta iti pūrvapakṣadvayam utprekṣamāṇa āha -- te ca [7.4] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:712: nāpi ca tena niṣidhyamānaṃ hetutvam atyantāsattayopagatam iti sambandhanīyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:713: tarhi kim atra tattvam ity āha -- kevalaṃ [7.6] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:714: anyatra [7.6] kāryādau prasiddhaṃ niścitaṃ vyāmohād ajñānāt tatra [7.6] hetutrayabāhye arthe āropitaṃ [7.7] sattvena vyavasthāpitam /
GSP28dhebta_u:716: tat [7.7] tasmāt / kiṃ kasmāt sāmarthyāt prakāśyamānam ity uktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:717: evam upalakṣaṇatvād asya kathaṃ niṣedha ity api draṣṭavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:718: nanu kiṃ hetvantare hetutvaṃ bhavatvā[bhavat hetvā]bhāsatvabhāvān nivartamānam avagataṃ yena tasyānena virodho vakṣyata ity āha -- na ca [7.8] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:719: idānīm atyantāsattvam abhyupagamyāpi doṣābhāvaṃ pradarśayitum āha -- nāpi [7.10] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:720: {p. 254} kathaṃ punas tatraiva2 tadavagamo na bhavatīty āśaṅkyāha -- na hi [7.11] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:722: satas tadavagama ity āha -- sarvatra[24] [7.13] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:725: ālokānurodhena sa tu “virodho 'pi tu sarvatra” iti gamyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:728: niyatarūpapratītir eva sarveṇa samaṃ tasya virodhapratītir iti samudāyārthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:732: prakaraṇaṃ nigamayann āha -- iti sthitam e3tat [7.18] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:735: pramāṇayor dvaitāt dvayor aniyatarūpadarśane katareṇe[7.25]ty uktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:737: viśeṣapratiṣedhāt śeṣavidhānaṃ labdham ity abhiprāyeṇa pakṣadharmatāsadbhāve
GSP28dhebta_u:739: bhavatu avinābhāvābhāvo hetvābhāsatvan tu kasmād ity āha -- avinābhāveti [8.2] /
GSP28dhebta_u:741: saṃprati viśiṣṭena nāmnā sādhanam idam avacchindan āha -- iti [8.3] ityādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:742: avinābhāvavaikalyam eva tu kutaḥ siddhim ity āha -- avinābhāvavaikalyañ ca [8.5] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:743: tebhyaḥ5 svabhāvādibhyo vyatiriktānāṃ vyāpakānupalabdhyā[26] [8.6] vakṣyamāṇasya vyāpakasyānupalabdhyā /
GSP28dhebta_u:746: tadanupalabdhir eva kuta ity āha -- trividhe[8.5]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:747: tadbhāve hi trividhāntarbhāvād eva tadvyatiriktatvam eva na bhaved iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:748: kiṃ tadvyāpakānupalabdhyā tatsiddhim adhyārohatīty āha -- tathāhi [8.6] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:752: tasmād utpattis tatkāraṇād votpattiś ca tadutpattir iṣṭā draṣṭavyā /
GSP28dhebta_u:753: kutas tābhyāṃ tasya vyāptir ity āha -- tayoḥ [8.7] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:758: kiṃ punar anyathāpi na bhāvah ity āha -- atatsvabhāvasyeti [8.8] /
GSP28dhebta_u:759: pūrvoktata7dutpattiniṣedhena yasya yasmād anutpattir yatkāraṇād vā tasyātadutpatter iti [8.8] boddhavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:761: syād etat -- dṛṣṭacaram idaṃ yat atatsvabhāvena anutpannena ca kenacit kasyacid avyabhicāro yathā rasādinā rūpāder ity āha -- rūpādinā [8.15] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:765: tatkāraṇotpattir eva [8.16] ity abhidadhānas tadutpattiśabdena pūrvaṃ dve vidhe vivakṣite iti sphuṭayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:768: ekārthasamavāyitvam eva viśeṣa ity abhipretur vacanam ekārtha [8.19] ityādinā śaṅkate /
GSP28dhebta_u:769: ekārthasamavāya ity atra dvayī vyutpa[9b] 1ttiḥ -- ekasminn arthe ekasmin samavāya ekārthasya vā samavāya iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:770: atra tu ekasminn arthe dvayoḥ samavāyaḥ iti vivakṣitam /
GSP28dhebta_u:771: sa nimittaṃ yasya avinābhāvasya sa tathā /
GSP28dhebta_u:773: “ayutasiddhānām ādhāryādhārabhūtānāṃ yaḥ sambandha ihapratyayahetuḥ sa samavāyaḥ” [Praśasta. p. 696)
GSP28dhebta_u:775: astu tathāvidhayor asau kā kṣatir iti āha -- sa ca [8.20] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:778: sthityādikaraṇenādhārabhāvasyānyatra niṣiddhatvād iti bhāvaḥ / itiḥ [8.21] hetau /
GSP28dhebta_u:780: tad eva tu nāstīti saṃprati pratipādayann āha --[27]yathā ca [8.22] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:781: tādā3tmye ce[28][9.1]ti tena sahety eva yojanīyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:783: [27] S prater atra truṭitatvāt “-samavāyo[vase]yaḥ” iti kalpanayā pūritaḥ pāṭhaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:787: {p. 256} ye [9.2] vastusvabhāvāḥ evaṃ bhavanti [9.2] tathābhūtāvyabhicāriṇo bhavanti /
GSP28dhebta_u:788: bhavantas tarhi kiṃ kartāra ity āha -- kevalam [9.3] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:791: itiḥ [9.4] tasmāt na kasya cidva4stunaḥ sa svabhāvo viramet /
GSP28dhebta_u:792: sarvasya sarvaḥ svabhāvaḥ syād ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:793: digādivad ahetoḥ sato deśakālaniyamo neṣṭa eveti vādini tu deśakālagrahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntārthaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:794: tena yathā deśakālaniyamo heturahitasya nāsti tathā dravyaniyamo 'pi na syād ityarthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:796: 5hir yasmāt tadgamakaṃ vastu kartṛ kiñcid gamyaṃ[29]kañcid(kvacid)
GSP28dhebta_u:797: dharmiṇyupanīyeta agnir vā na veti [9.5] tadviparītaṃ vā syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:798: yasya [9.5] vastuno yatra [9.6] gamye kiñcid dravyam āyattaṃ,
GSP28dhebta_u:799: na veti asya vivaraṇaṃ anāyattam iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:809: na tu bhavadabhipretam ity āha tac ca [9.10] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:812: etad evācāryavacanena saṃsyandayann āha -- tathā cāha [9.11] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:813: syād etat -- asaty api tatsvābhāvye tatkāryatve vā kiñcid arthāntaram avyabhicaradṛṣṭam eva yathā 7tape tarucchāyā /
GSP28dhebta_u:815: evam ādyasmābhirdharmottarapradīpe vistareṇa nirūpitam ity āstām tāvad iha /
GSP28dhebta_u:816: syād etad -- avinābhāvasya tādātmyatadutpattyor avyabhicāre nimittam na tāvat tādātmyatadutpattī
GSP28dhebta_u:817: sto yathā cāyaṃ tathā tadanyopi tadavyabhicārī ca syā8n na ca tasya tatsvabhāvatvaṃ tatkāryatvañ ceti /
GSP28dhebta_u:820: kevalaṃ kayācid vyapekṣayā tato bhinna iva kathyate. na tu tāvatā vastuto bhinna eva. avinābhāvi ca rūpaṃ kiñcid avyabhicaritavyād arthāntaraṃ kiñcid anarthāntaram,
GSP28dhebta_u:823: tadabhāvaṃ tu tad api rūpaṃ nāstīti pratipādyata iti sarvam avadātam /
GSP28dhebta_u:824: atra [9.15] asminn arthe prayogo [9.15] dvyavayaṃ sādhanavākyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:826: syād etat -- yathā tādātmyatadutpattyabhāvo 'py anupalabdhiḥ sādhyāvyabhicāriṇī tathānyad api kiṃ na bhaved ity āśaṃ2kyāha svabhāve[9.18]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:828: tādātmyaṃ [9.19] lakṣanaṃ nibandhanaṃ yasya sa tathā /
GSP28dhebta_u:829: tad apiācāryasyābhimatam iti darśayann āha taduktam [9.22] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:830: idānīm imam eva “pakṣadharma“ityādiślokaṃ anyathā vyācikhyāsuranena yāvanto 'rthā nirdiṣṭāḥ tāvataḥ parisaṃkhyātum āha -- tad evam [9.25] iti
GSP28dhebta_u:835: etac chlokavyākhyānasyāparām api vidhāṃ darśayann āha -- athavā [9.28] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:837: na tv avadhāraṇacintākṛteti tato bhinnam idaṃ vyākhyānam /
GSP28dhebta_u:838: katham idam uktam avadhāraṇam upapadyata ity abhipretya pṛcchati /
GSP28dhebta_u:841: avi4nābhāva[32]bhāvād iti śliṣṭanirdeśam abhisandhāya trividhasya ca [10.3] ity uktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:842: tathā hy avinābhāve niyamān niyatatvād ity ukte kasyety āśaṃkāyāṃ trividhasya ca śrutatvāt trividhasyeti yujyate vaktum /
GSP28dhebta_u:846: vyākhyātena korthātiśayaḥ prakāśito bhavatīty āha tena [10.3] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:849: tataḥ [10.7] kāraṇāt trividhahetuvāhyeṣu hetuvyavahāraṃ kurvanto nirastā bhavanti /
GSP28dhebta_u:851: trivedhe ca hetāv ahetutām ācakṣāṇā nirastā bhavanti /
GSP28dhebta_u:857: {p. 258} asmin vyākhyāne “hetvābhāsās tato 'pare” iti vyākhyātuṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ racayann āha[35]tathaitat [10.11] 6iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:858: dvedhā hi tadaṃśavyāptiviraho viparyayavyāpteḥ viparyaye bādhakapramāṇābhāvād ity abhiprāyeṇāha viparyaye[10.17]tyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:859: te [10.17] buddhiniviṣṭā asiddhaviruddhānaikāntikā heturūpavikalatayā hetvābhāsā gamyanta eva /
GSP28dhebta_u:861: na tu tatsaṃjñayā jñātais taiḥ prayojana(naṃ)
GSP28dhebta_u:863: evam api vā prajñāiḥ jñāyanta iti na kācit kṣatiḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:866: evadeva sāmānyanyāyopadarśanamukhena prasādhayann āha -- tathāhi [10.19] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:867: atrāpi vyākhyāne aṅgāṅgibhāvena pratipāditānām arthānām avacchedaṃ kurvann āha -- tad atreti [10.27] /
GSP28dhebta_u:869: trividha eva hetur ity asyāvadhāraṇadvayasya kāraṇam [11.1] upapattī dve 8ity arthatvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:872: anantaroktās trayo 'rthā imau ca dvikāraṇalakṣaṇau dvāv arthāpattayaś caka iti ṣaḍarthā bhavanti /
GSP28dhebta_u:873: asminn eva śloke pūrvavyākhyānāparityāgenāvṛttyaivāparam api vyākhyānam abhyuccinvann āha kiñceti [11.4] /
GSP28dhebta_u:875: sa[10b] 1iti prabhedasya vyutpādanam” iti bruvatā sa hetus traidhā kāryasvabhāvānupalabdhibhedabhinna iti prakāśitam evaitat,
GSP28dhebta_u:878: kevalaṃ “tridhaiva sa” ity atra vyākhyānāntaram idaṃ vidheyaṃ tac ca tadā sujñātaṃ bhavati,
GSP28dhebta_u:879: yady asya prākpravṛttaṃ vyākhyānam upadarśya pradarśyata ity abhiprāyeṇa tad vyākhyānam anūditam /
GSP28dhebta_u:880: etad apekṣeṇa tu a2thavety anena kiñcaśabdārtham ujjvalayatā yat pradarśyate tad eva vyākhyānāntaraṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:882: tenāyam arthaḥ -- kāryādibhedabhinna eva pratyekaṃ pakṣadharmatvānvayavyatirekātmakas trirūpa eveti /
GSP28dhebta_u:883: etenaikadvipadaparyudāsena ṣaṭpakṣān pratikṣipya saptamapakṣaparigraheṇānumānalakṣaṇam abhipre3taṃ vārtikakṛto darśayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:888: tathāhi pakṣadharmo hetur ity ucyamāne yasya sapakṣenanvayo vipakṣe ca pravṛttiḥ sopi hetuḥ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:890: sapakṣe yasyānvaya ity ucyamā4ne vipakṣapravṛtter apakṣadharmasya hetutvaṃ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:891: yathā nityaḥ śabdaś cākṣuṣatvāt sāmānya{p. 259}vad iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:892: ya(ta)thā sapakṣavyatireka ity ucyamāne yo 'pakṣadharmaḥ sapakṣe ca nāsti sa hetuḥ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:894: pakṣadharme sapakṣe ca yo 'sti sa hetur ity ucyamāne nityaḥ śabdaḥ prameyatvād iti5 vipakṣavṛttir hetuḥ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:895: pakṣadharmaḥ sapakṣe nāstīty ucyamāne nityaḥ śabdo jātimattve sati śrāvaṇatvād ity ayaṃ sapakṣavṛttihīno hetuḥ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:896: sapakṣe 'sti vipakṣe ca nāstīty ucyamāne anityāḥ paramānavaḥ kṛtakatvād ity ayam apakṣadharmo hetuḥ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:897: tad etat sarvam mā bhūd iti samudāyopādāne prayo6janam iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:898: idam eva ca sarvaṃ buddhāvādhāyadharmottarapradīpe 'smābhir abhyadhāyi “trirūpāl liṅgād iti ca ācakṣāṇena” ityādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:900: anvayavyatirekātmakayos tu rūpayoḥ kenābhidhānaṃ yenaivaṃ vyākhyāyata ity āha tadaṃśe[11.6]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:905: vastūnāñ ca viruddhasvabhāvadvayābhāvāt tatraikasmiṃs tadavinābhāvini tadviruddharūpāvinābhāvino 'nyasyāsaṃbhavenāpi(pya)
GSP28dhebta_u:907: yasya tu tadvya8tiriktam iṣṭaṃ tadabhiprāyeṇa vyatirikta[11.10]grahaṇam /
GSP28dhebta_u:911: rūpāntarayoginy apy avinābhāvāsambhavād asiddhas tadbhāva ity āha tadvati [11.14] pratibandhanibandhanā[vinā] bhāvavatīti /
GSP28dhebta_u:912: yadi tasminn api rūpāntaraṃ syāt kevalam apramāṇakam etad ucyata ity āha yathā ce[11.15]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:917: tathābhūtasamudāyasādhakapramāṇābhāvena taddharmatayā sarvasyaiva grahītum aśakyatvād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:918: atha kathañcit taddharmasya siddhiḥ [11.19] niścayas tasyāṃ vā siddhaprayojanatvāt tasya hetor vaiyarthyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:919: parasthānapatitatvāt para evāsāv ity abhiprāyeṇaīśvarasena eva paraḥ [12.6] abhipretaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:922: tatra cirāspadībhūte dharmiṇi dvayor apy anyayor asiddhatvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:923: idam iha svarūpāsiddham idaṃ tu vyadhikaraṇāsiddham ity etad eva kuto vyavasthāpyam iti cet /
GSP28dhebta_u:927: {p. 260} kasmāt tatsaṃbandhanā3rthaṃ nāśaṅkanīyam ity āśaṃkāyāṃ tad abhidhānīyaṃ tadabhivyaktatvād anena noktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:928: dharmo hetus tadaṃśena vyāpta ityukte vā [saka]lopi hi jānāty eva /
GSP28dhebta_u:932: paksasya dharmiṇo dharmasyānupapatteḥ na tāvat karmadhārayo ta evāsaṃkhyāpūrvakatvā4c ca na dviguḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:935: na hi sa eva dharmī sa eva dharma ity arthavirodhāc ca samāsāntasyānicpratyayaprasakteś ca na bahuvrīhiḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:936: napusaṃkaliṅgāt dvivacanaprasaṅgāc ca “cā“arthāsaṃbhavāc ca na dvandvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:937: saptamīsamāsasūtre ca dharmaśabdasyāsaṃgrahād yogavibhāgena tatsamāsabhāve5pi ṣaṣṭhīsaptamyor abhedād ity abhiprāyavān prāha [37]ṣaṣthītatpuruṣād [14.22] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:938: ṣaṣṭhīsamāse ca rājapuruṣādau svāmyantaravyavacchedo dṛṣṭo rājñaḥ puruṣo vācyusyeti(-ṣo nānyasyeti) /
GSP28dhebta_u:939: tadvad ihāpi pakṣasya dharmo nānyasyety anyayogavyavacchedaḥ syād ity abhisambandhaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:943: ādiśabdād buddhyādi kṣaṇikatveneṣṭam iti tat ka6tham aksaṇivādinaṃ taṃ prati pakṣasya(syā)
GSP28dhebta_u:945: na pratyakṣataḥ [15.22] iti bruvatoyaṃ bhāvaḥ -- yadi pratyakṣeṇa kṣaṇasyopalakṣaṇaṃ syāt,
GSP28dhebta_u:947: yadā tv anumānatas tadā tad api teṣām anumānam adṛṣṭāntakaṃ kathaṃ syād iti sādhanaṃ duḥkham iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:948: etac ca kasyacit parasya kṣaṇikatvābhyu7pagamam abhyupagamyoktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:949: na tu sahetunāśavādibhir buddhyāder apy utpattikṣaṇa eva bhāvo na tu dvitīye kṣaṇa iti evaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇikatvam eṣṭavyam,
GSP28dhebta_u:950: āśutaravināśitvābhiprāyeṇa kṣaṇikaśabdapravṛtter iṣṭatvād iti draṣṭavyam iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:951: tatra prati.....ndhanasyāvinābhāvasya bādhakapramāṇataḥ siddhāv apy anyatve 'traiva vṛttir apekṣaṇīyeti paribhā.... 8kālpanikatvaṃ [15.24] tasya pratipannaṃ syād ity āśayaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:955: yad vastu dhūmādikaṃ kvacit parvatādau dṛṣṭaṃ niścitaṃ tasya dhūmādeḥ yatra vahnyādau
GSP28dhebta_u:956: pratibandhaḥ pratibaddhatvam tadvidaḥ pratibandhavidaḥ puṃsas tasya pratibandhaviṣayasya
GSP28dhebta_u:957: vahnyādeḥ tad dhūmādi[11b] 1kaṃ gamakam anumāpakaṃ tatra parvatādau itiḥ evam arthe /
GSP28dhebta_u:959: evaṃparam [16.5] evaṃpradhānam etad arthaṃ “tattulye sadbhāvaḥ” iti vacanam /
GSP28dhebta_u:961: dharmo yasya sa taddharmā [16.5] sādhyadharmī tasya /
GSP28dhebta_u:963: {p. 261} pakṣatvena tasya sapakṣatvaṃ nirākriyata ity āha sādhyatvene[16.6]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:966: kasmāt tannibandhanaṃ tad ity apekṣāyām āha -- anyathā [16.8] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:971: yadāpi tathāvidhasya hetor anyatve ca prasiddhena 3pratibandhen kāryaṃ tadāpy anyatrāpy ananuvartamānaḥ kathaṃ duṣyed ity āha tadā hī[16.18]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:972: viruddhopi viparyaye samyagdhetuneti ceti viparyayāniścitavṛttitvam uktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:976: tat katham asau tatra saṃśayahe4tuḥ syād ity āśaṃkyāha -- tadubhayabahir bhāvāyogāt [16.19] sādhyavṛttivyavacchede vahnibhāvāyogāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:977: kasyety āśaṃkāyām āha taddharmiṇaḥ [16.19] tasya hetor āśrayasyeti /
GSP28dhebta_u:981: anyonyavyavacchedarūpāṇām ekabhāvasyā5paravidhināntarīyatvāt kutaḥ prakārāntaraṃ saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:982: syād etat -- antarvyāptiprasādhakād eva pramāṇādvivādādhyāsitasya dharmiṇas taddharmatvajñānān
GSP28dhebta_u:983: maulasya hetoh katham ativyaktam api vaiyarthyaṃbhadantadharmākaradattena na lakṣitam iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:985: evaṃ hi bruvato 'syāyam āśa6yaḥ -- dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇīva sādhyadharmiṇy api sarvopasaṃhāreṇa dharmānavacchedena vyāptigrahe maulād eva sādhyasiddheḥ kuto vaiyarthyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:986: itarathā dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇyapi viparyaye bādhakapramāṇavṛttāviṣyamāṇāyāṃ katham iva maulo hetur vaiyarthyaṃ nāśnuvīta /
GSP28dhebta_u:987: tathāhi tatrāpi tatpravṛttaṃ dharmisāmānyopagraheṇa vyāptiṃ pratipadyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:988: 7tathā ca pakṣīkṛtasyāpi jijñāsitadharmavattvaṃ tata eva siddham iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:989: athocyate -- bādhakapramāṇamāhātmyāt sattvasya kṣaṇikatvasiddhāv api kiṃ na śaśaviṣāṇādes
GSP28dhebta_u:992: itaḥ sattvahetor evāsaṃhṛtāt śabdādeḥ kṣaṇikatvāvagatir nāsmanmate hetor vaiyarthyam i8ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:994: tathāhi vyāptigrāhakāt pramāṇāt tatra pravṛttād api dharmiviśeṣāparigraheṇa plavamānākārā pravṛttiḥ kṣaṇikatvasattvayos tādātmyagrāhiṇī jātā na tu pravṛttyaṅgam /
GSP28dhebta_u:995: “ya(sa)ccedam” iti tu darṣite sati “idaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ śabdādi” iti pravṛttyaṅgaṃ pratītir upajāyate,
GSP28dhebta_u:997: katham asmanmate maula[12a] 1sya hetor vaiyarthyam {p. 262}amandamandākṣeṇocyata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:998: dharmottarādibhirvigarhite 'py asminmate gatir iyaṃ asmābhir upavarṇitā /
GSP28dhebta_u:999: atrāpi tu kiñcid vācyaṃ tad asmābhir evasvayūthyavicāre darśitam iha tu mā bhūd virasībhāva iti nocyata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1002: atra ca pakṣa eva 2vyavacchedakavad viśeṣaṇam iti tenaiva sahāvadhāraṇaṃ vācyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1003: tathā ca pakṣasyaive dharma ity uktau tadavastho doṣa iti cet /
GSP28dhebta_u:1005: “viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyābhyām” ity atra śābdīṃ gatim anāśrityāśritatvād viśeṣaṇam,
GSP28dhebta_u:1006: āśrayatvād viśeṣyam ity ārthena viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayor abhipretatvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:1009: dharmas tv āśri3tatvād viśeṣaṇam eva na viśeṣya iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1010: tena sahoditanipāto 'yogam eva vyavacchinattīti sarvam avadātam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1014: prakṛṣṭe ananyasādhāraṇe guṇe 'tiśaye vṛttir yasya sa [17.12] tathā /
GSP28dhebta_u:1015: tad uktaṃ “4na hi viśeṣasannidhir eva sāmānyaśabdānāṃ viśeṣāvasthitihetur api tu prakaraṇasāmarthyādikam arpaya(m api” i)ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1024: na tu yathā mudritaḥ “prakaraṇa sāmarthyādinā” iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1025: kamāt tatra dhanurdharatvamātram ity āha pratipādye[17.15]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1032: kiṃ dhūmādīnāṃ āśritatvena dharmāṇāṃ dhūmatvapārthivatvādayo dharmā na santi6?
GSP28dhebta_u:1034: satyam etad vā kevalaṃ bodhe yatnaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1035: dharmaśabdeneha sādhyo vahnyādir abhipretaḥ sa ca tasya dharmo nāsty eveti kim avadyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1036: athātra kena dharmo 'bhihito yena dharmasya dharmabhāvapratipādanaṃ yujyata ity āha {p. 263} aṃśaś ca [17.22] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1038: aṃśa ivāṃśo yathāṃśo '7śiviśeṣaṇas tathā dharmopi dharmiviśeṣaka ity abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1039: pakṣaśabdena samudāyavacanāt tad ekadeśa evāṃśo vaktavya ity āha pakṣaśabdena [17.22] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1040: tasyaivaikadeśaḥ kiṃ nocyata ity āha tasya[40]ca [17.22] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1041: [40] mudrite “ca” rahitaḥ pāṭhaḥ kaplitaḥ kintu ālokasammataḥ pāṭhaḥ “tasya ca eka-” iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1043: yato vyāpye sati vyāpakasya niyamenopasthāpanam eva vyāpakaniṣṭhā vyāpti8s tatkaraṇāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:1044: vyāpyasyaiva [18.3] na tu vyāpakasya vyāptatāpratītir avinābhāvitāpratītiḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1045: kim apekṣā sā tathā pratītir ity āha[42]vyāpake[18.2]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1046: vyāpakabhāvam apekṣate “īkṣikṣamibhyāṃñ ca” [Vā. 1981] iti karmopapade ṇaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1047: vyāpakasya bhāvaṃ niyamaviṣayaṃ rūpam apekṣya paryālocya tathā pratītir bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1049: [41] ayam eva samyak pāṭhaḥ na tu yathā kalpito 'smābhih “dharmāṇāṃ dharmāntaratvābhāvāt” iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1052: tatra bhāvam evety abhimatam avadhāraṇaṃ pradarśyānabhimataṃ nirā[12b] 1kurvann āha na tv i[18.3]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1058: tatraive[18.8]ty avadhāraṇam abhimataṃ pratipādyānyathāvadhāraṇaṃ niṣedhayann āha atrāpīti [18.9] /
GSP28dhebta_u:1059: etad eva sūtrakāravacanena saṃsyandayann āha tad uktami[18.17]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1060: 2liṅge sādhane sati liṅgī sādhyaṃ bhavaty eva /
GSP28dhebta_u:1062: itaralliṅgaṃ punarliṅginy eva sādhya eva bhavatīti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1064: uktena prakāreṇa niyamasyāvadhāraṇasya viparyāse vaiparītye-viparyāsaś ca ekatrāyogavyavacchedena viśeṣaṇā(ṇama)
GSP28dhebta_u:1068: ayañ ca doṣaācāryeṇaye dhūmaṃ saṃyoginaṃ hetum icchanti,
GSP28dhebta_u:1071: te hi dhūmā{p. 264}vayavinaṃ pradeśaṃ vā dharmiṇam ādhāya4 sāgnitvasiṣādhayiṣayā dhūmatvaṃ dhūmavattvaṃ vā sāmānyaṃ hetum upādadata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1076: etad api tadvacanena saṃsyandayann āha -- tathā ca [19.1] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1077: dviṣṭhatvāt sambandhasya katham ubhayatraikākāratāvyāptir na syād ity āśaṃkya yady api ity anena dviṣṭhaṃ samba5ndhaṃ vāstavam abhyupagamyāpi pratividhatte /
GSP28dhebta_u:1078: kayor asāv ity āha = aṅga [19.2] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1080: rasya grahaṇād aṃgyate liṅgyate pratīyate 'nena parokṣārtha ity aṅgaṃ liṅgam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1088: kayor iva sety āha -- ādhārādheyayor iveti saptamyantād vatiḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1089: yathā ādhārādheyabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ sambandho dviṣṭhopi naikarūpayā vṛttyā dvayor vartate
GSP28dhebta_u:1090: yata evaikasambandhayogepi nādhārasyā7dheyatvam ādheyasya vādhāratvaṃ tathā liṅgaliṅginor
GSP28dhebta_u:1093: ata eva dhūmatvādir eva vyāpyatayā gamako na prameyatvādiḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1094: vahnitvādir eva vyāpakatayā gamyo na tu tārṇatvādir nāpi dhūmo gamyo vahnir gamaka iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1095: yata evaṃ tasya vṛttiḥ tena [19.4] kāraṇena /
GSP28dhebta_u:1102: tasyāḥ sūcakaṃ prakāśanaṃ tad eva arthaḥ prayojanaṃ yasya “vā“śabdasya /
GSP28dhebta_u:1103: paramārthatas tādātmyāt [19.24] iti bruvatā tadupapādayatā cānvayena vyatirekagatau vyatirekeṇa cānvayagatau svabhāvahetur adhikṛta iti darśitam
GSP28dhebta_u:1111: pratyakṣānumānābhyām iti sāmasty aniṣedho boddhavyo na tu kasyacit /
GSP28dhebta_u:1114: [44] atra S prater ekaṃ patraṃ naṣṭam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1115: avikalpanatvāt pratyakṣāsya kathaṃ tato niścayas tasya sambhavīty āśaṃkyāha -- pratyakṣeṇa[45]pratī[20.8]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1118: upacārata [20.9] iti pratyakṣato niścaya ity upacārataḥ ucyata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1121: nanu sāmānyaṃ liṅgaṃ kathaṃ tasyādhyakṣato niścaya ity āha yady apī[20.11]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1126: sattve vā kiṃ tasya bhāgostīty āśaṃkyabauddhābhipretam eva darśayan para āha āloke[20.20]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1131: tarhy anumānotseda eva prāpta ity āśaṃkya puner eva vyavasthāṃ kurvann āha tasmād [20.22] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1132: kathaṃ punaḥ sa eva dharmī sa eva hetur bhavitum arhatīty āha sāgniḥ [20.22] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1133: anena dhūmaviśeṣasya dharmitvaṃ dhūmasāmānyasya hetutvaṃ darśayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:1137: tāvata [20.27] iti dṛśyādṛśyavibhāgavataḥ dhūmepi dharmiṇi uktena prakāreṇa etat saṃgacchata iti sāmyābhimānaśaṣyaṃ(śasyaṃ)
GSP28dhebta_u:1141: anyatropalabhyamānasyānyadeśāpekṣayā gamakatvaṃ katham ity āha deśa6kāle[21.2]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1142: ācāryeṇāpy etad abhimatam ity upadarśayann āha yadāce(he)[21.3]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1143: ataś caivam abhyupetavyam iti darśayann āha pathe[21.9]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1145: dharmiṇo vā[21.15] svarūpagrahaṇam api tāvat kathaṃ yujyate ity eva yojyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1148: {p. 266} evam asau pratyavatastha iti kathaṃ jñāyata ity āśaṃkyāha tena hī[21.16]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1151: yad āhaśabarasvāmī“ko dharmmo yaḥ śreyaḥsādhanaḥ” [Śābarabhā.1.1.2] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1158: kadā tatpūrvakaṃ tad ity āha yadeti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1162: vikalpanam antareṇāpi kathaṃ na tathā grahaṇam ity āha nace[21.20]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1166: pratyakṣeṇāgrahaṇaṃ kasyety apekṣāyām āha liṅgāde[21.23]r iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1171: kiṃ vikalpamātrasya tathotpattir ity āśaṃkyāha -- arthe[21.24]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1174: nanu nirvikalpasavikalpabhedenārthavijñānasya dvaite satīdaṃ vaktuṃ yujyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:1177: vikalpāt pūrvaṃ bhāvāt prathamam [21.25] ādyam bālādiṣu tathā3vidhavikalpāniṣṭer jñānaṃ dṛṣṭāntatayeṣṭam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1181: jātyādibhir viśiṣṭaṃ yayā buddhyāvasīyate sāpi na kevalam ālocanājñānam iti apiśabdaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1182: evaṃ ca bruvato 'yaṃ bhāvaḥ -- yady api prathamaṃ nirvikalpakabodhena dvyātmakaṃ 4vastugṛhītam indriyasaṃbandhāt,
GSP28dhebta_u:1189: yasmāt tenaivaṃ bruvatā sāmarthyād etat prakāśitaṃ tataḥ [22.3] tasmāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:1190: tenakumārilena upada[46]rśito yo doṣaḥ “saugatānām eva pratyakṣeṇa liṅgādyagrahaṇām” ity evaṃlakṣaṇaḥ,
GSP28dhebta_u:1194: {p. 267} śiṣyāṇāṃ sukhapratipattyarthaṃ sadhūmaṃ hī[22.4]tyādiphakkikāyāḥ samudāyārtham upadarśayann āha ayam atre[22.5]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1196: kartuṃ samarthaṃ tat6 kathaṃ tannibandhanas tanniścaya ity abhidhātari katham idaṃ “sadhūmaṃ hī“tyādivaco na plavata ity āśaṃkāyām atre[22.5]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:1198: ekasya sākṣād itarasya sāmarthyāj jananāt vidhipratiṣedhavikalpadvayaṃ janayatī[22.9]ty uktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1199: kadācid vidhivikalpaṃ kadācit pratiṣedhavikalpaṃ janayatīty abhiprāyeṇa caitad uktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1204: yady anubhavānatikrameṇa vikalpodayas tadā sarvatrāṃśe tadudayaprasaṅgaḥ ity āha abhyāse[22.11]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1212: asyāpy ayam arthaḥ -- nānubhava ity eva vikalpaṃ janayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:1213: kiṃtu kaścit punaḥ punas tatrotpadyamānas tādṛśo bhavati /
GSP28dhebta_u:1215: kaścit tu svabhāvātiśayalakṣaṇaṃ pāṭavam apekṣya janayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:1216: asyāpy aya[14a] 1m arthaḥ -- kaścid anubhavaḥ prakṛtyaiva paṭīyān jāyate yas tatra kṣamaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1219: kvacit punar avidyānubandhāt sadṛśāparāparotpādavipralabdhaś ca sarvadaiva tiraskṛtapaṭimā yo naiva tatkṣamo bhavati /
GSP28dhebta_u:1224: syād etat -- sa2mbandho 'yam iti niścayānanubhavanāt kathaṃ sambandhaniścayas tannibandhana ucyata ity āśaṃkyāha tathāhī[22.13]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1226: nanu sambandhasyādhārādheyalakṣaṇasyānanubhavāt kathaṃ tanniścayas tannibandhana upavarṇyata ity āha na ce[22.16]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1227: tathā [22.19] auttarādharyeṇa avasthitam arthadvyam āśritya [22.19] gṛhītvā /
GSP28dhebta_u:1228: {p. 268} yadi 3tathābhūtavastudvayād anyo nāsti tarhi katham “anayor ayaṃ saṃbandhaḥ sambandhinau caitau” iti vyavahāra ity āha -- teneti[22.20]
GSP28dhebta_u:1229: yena tathābhūtavastudvayānubhavāśrayataḥ samāropitaḥ sanbandhaḥ tena kāraṇena vyavahāra[22.21]ś ca “ayaṃ dharmī ayaṃ dharmaḥ” iti śābdo 'bhipretaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:1232: na tv ayaṃ paramārthiko vyavahāra ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1234: tasya ca pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇāt sambandhaniścayas tathābhūtavastudvayakṛtos tu,
GSP28dhebta_u:1237: na ca viśeṣo liṅgam ity āśaṃkyāha sāmānye[22.22]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1239: syād etat -- anugatasya vastuno 'bhāve 'nugatapratyayo nirhetukaḥ kathaṃ bhaved ity āha teṣām eva [22.23] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1240: na svalakṣaṇasya vikalpajanane sākṣād vyāparas tasyātadviṣayatvād ity āha -- anubhave[22.23]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1241: yadi te vijātīyasvabhāvās tathāpi kathaṃ ta6tpratyayahetutvaṃ teṣām ity āha -- vijātīye[22.23]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1244: ācāryavacanenaitat saṃsyandayann āha tathā cāha [22.25] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1246: iti vigrahaḥ kāryaḥ na tv ekaś cāsau pratyavamarṣaś ceti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1250: marśād iti yady ucyeta tadā tasyāpi tattvaṃ tata ity anavasthā /
GSP28dhebta_u:1251: tathā ca yāvad antimasya tathātvaṃ na jñāyate tāvad ādimasyāpi tattvavyavasthā na syāt,
GSP28dhebta_u:1252: asatyāṃ ca tasyām ekadhīhetubhāvena vyaktīnām apy abhinna[tvam a]rpāyituṃ na śakyetety alam iha vistareṇa /
GSP28dhebta_u:1253: yasmāt tair ayaṃ vikalpo janyate tataḥ [23.1] /
GSP28dhebta_u:1256: yena smṛtitvaṃ syād ity āha tatpratibhāsina [23.1] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1258: na tu vyāvṛttir ity āha nahī[23.3]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1259: syād etat -- vikalpānām anarthagrāhitayā bāhyārthāsaṃsparśād eva kathaṃ gṛhītagrāhitvalakṣaṇaṃ smṛtitvam ity āścarya upasaṃhārāpadeśenāha -- tasmāt [23.4] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1260: yady evaṃ dvaidham api vikalpaḥ pratipattur adhyavasā[14b] 1yavaśād gṛhītabāhyārthagrāhitayā smṛtir ucyate,
GSP28dhebta_u:1261: tarhi paramārthataḥ kiṃviṣaya ity āha vastuta [23.7] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1262: yato 'yaṃ vikalpaḥ paramārthato nirviṣayopi pratipantradhyavasāyānurodhāt smṛtir abhipretaḥ tataḥ [23.7] tasmāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:1265: abhedenābhinnākāraṃ yadvijñānaṃ tad etat smārtaṃ smṛtirūpa2m iti yobauddho vadet /
GSP28dhebta_u:1266: tasyāivaṃvādino nūnaṃ niścitaṃ vandhyāsute 'pi viṣaye yatsmaraṇaṃ tatra śaktatā sāmarthyam astu /
GSP28dhebta_u:1268: śakta iti yāvat kathaṃ tasyātyāntābhāvasmaraṇaśaktatopakalpyata iti āśaṃkāyāṃ cūrṇakenopapattim āha sāmānyasyānanubhūtatayā ananubhūtatvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:1271: yadi vānanubhūtepi smaraṇam upapadyate tadā vandhyāsutepy ananubhūtatvāviśeṣāt smārtā buddhiḥ kiṃ na kalpyata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1275: tenāyam arthaḥ -- yuṣmān evādhyeṣya sāmānyato viśeṣataś ca etat pṛcchāma iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1277: atra svātantryaparijihīrṣayā tatkārikā upakṣipann āha -- tathā cāhe[23.19]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1279: tasya ekaliṅgini [23.28] gatir yugasahasreṣu bahuṣv api na vidyata [23.29] iti sambandhaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1285: asāmānyasya svalakṣaṇasya anavagatam eva liṅgaṃ liṅgijñānaṃ kariṣyatīty āha -- nace[23.23]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1290: kiṃbhūtāl liṅgāt sāmānyajñā6nasaṃhitāt sāmānyajñānayuktāt sāmānyātmanā jñātād iti yāvat /
GSP28dhebta_u:1293: tasya liṅgasya sāmānyasyodbhavas tadudbhavo [23.26] liṅgenāpareṇety arthāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:1294: tenāpi sāmānyarūpatayā anumānāntarād eva jñātena tathābhāvya7m ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- anumānāntarād eva jñātene[23.27]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1295: astv evaṃ kā kṣatir ity āha evaṃ ce[23.27]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1296: nanv evaṃ liṅgānumānasyaivānantyaṃ na tu liṅgyanumānasya tat kathaṃliṅgyanumānānām ity uktam iti cet /
GSP28dhebta_u:1297: satyaṃ, kevalaṃ tad evādyaṃ liṅgaṃ jñāpakahetvadhikārāt jñāyamānasāmānyarūpatayā cānumānatā (-mānena)
GSP28dhebta_u:1302: nanu ca sāmānyarūpasya liṅgatve tasya cānumānenaiva grahe na pratyakṣatas tanniścaya
GSP28dhebta_u:1303: upapadyata ity abhidhātari katham idamācāryīyaṃ sadhūmetyādinā pratyakṣatas tanniścayasyopavarṇanaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:1304: yujyata ity āśaṃkyāha evaṃ manyata [23.30] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1307: ayam artho -- vijātīyavyāvṛtter anyasya sāmānyasyābhāvāt vijātīyavyāvṛttyavagama eva sāmānyāvagamaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1308: vāsanādvayanibaddhaś ca vikalpaḥ svapratibhāsam eva niyataṃ bahīrūpatayā sādhāraṇatayā pratipadyamāno bāhya eva vijātīyavyāvṛttyā mayā pratīyata iti manyata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1310: sa vivecita2bhedo []bheda eva vikalpena pratīyata ity uktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1311: atha yadi prakṛtibhrānto 'yaṃ vikalpas tarhi kathaṃ tasya atadvyāvrttavastuprāpakatvalakṣaṇaṃ saṃvādakatvam ity āha liṅgavikalpasya ce[24.2]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:1317: avaśyaṃ hi kiñcid anumitsatā dhūmādisvalakṣaṇadarśanottarakālam -- “idaṃ sādhyam idaṃ sādhanam” iti saṃkalayitavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1318: sati cāsmin saṃkalpe sataḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgitayā vastudarśanābhāvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:1319: darśanena ca viṣayiṇā viṣayasya dṛśyasyā[48]bhidhānaṃ tena dṛśyasya liṅgaṃ(liṅga)
GSP28dhebta_u:1321: tataś ca katham svalakṣaṇadarśanāśrayo 4gamyagamakabhāvo bhaved yena kalpitadharmadvārako gamyagamakabhāvo [na bha]ved iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1325: ata eva sa eva mūle sthāpitaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1326: nanu yadi pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvināpi vikalpena sāmānyaṃ pratīyate,
GSP28dhebta_u:1327: tarhinyāyabindau yadavādi [te]na “anyatsāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ so 'numānasya viṣayaḥ” iti virudhyetety āśaṃkyāha yat tūktam i[24.9]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1329: evam api kim artham avadhāryata ity āha svalakṣaṇeti [24.12] /
GSP28dhebta_u:1330: svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣayo grāhyatvena naiva bhavatīti pratipādayitum ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1331: pūrvapakṣadvayapūrvakaṃ phakkikāyāḥ samudāyārthaṃ vyākhyāyāvayavārthaṃ vyākhyātuṃ tatra [24.13] ityādinopakra6mate /
GSP28dhebta_u:1332: ādi[?]śabdād ekavināśe sarvavināśādisaṅgrahaḥ “pratyakseṇa dṛṣṭavataḥ” {p. 271} ity asya tātparyārtham āha na tvi[24.26]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1333: kathaṃ punar asya tathāmananam anupapannam ity āha nahī[24.27]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1336: yadi kevalapratītis tarhi sābhāvasaṃvittibhantareṇa7 natarāṃ prasiddyatīti kathaṃ pratyakṣeṇa tathāgrahaṇam upavarṇyata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1338: tathāhi bhinnam abhāvam icchatāpi vastūnāṃ svarūpaṃ parānanupraviṣṭam avaśyaiṣṭavyam,
GSP28dhebta_u:1342: tāvat khalv abhāvasaṃvittir nāsti tadā8tmavad yāvat kevalagraho na bhavet /
GSP28dhebta_u:1343: tāvac ca kevalagraho nāsti yāvat nābhāvasaṃvittir iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1344: kiñca yathā kevalo 'bhāvo 'paraṇābhāvena vinā pratīyate tathā bhāvopy antareṇāparābhāvaṃ kevalaḥ kiṃ na mīyeta /
GSP28dhebta_u:1353: vopi naivañ ced anavasthā prasajyate //” iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1354: kathaṃ nirviṣayasya vikalpasya yathādṛṣṭabhedasya paramārthaviṣayatvam ucyata ity āha[49]niścayetyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:1362: sa eva viṣayo 'dhyavasāyavaśād yasyeti sa tathā /
GSP28dhebta_u:1365: ” evaṃ tubhaṭṭā3rcaṭena kathaṃ na vyākhyātam iti na pratīmaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1366: pramāṇalakṣaṇasāmānyena yogam upadarśya pramāṇaviśeṣasya pratyakṣasyāpi lakṣaṇena yogaṃ darśayann āha sad iti / /
GSP28dhebta_u:1368: cakṣur indriyāpekṣayā granthasyāsya yojanāyāṃ tu indriyasya nāyanaraśmyavayavina
GSP28dhebta_u:1369: indriyasyānu4mānasiddhasya saṃbhāradaṃśena saṃyoge saṃbandhe saty asya vikalpasya
GSP28dhebta_u:1372: syāt tasya cārthena saṃgatiḥ [Ślokavā. 4.60] ityādivacanāt svābhimānāt pratyakṣatvenendriyam udāharaṇīkṛtaṃ pareṇa /
GSP28dhebta_u:1373: na punaḥ pratipādyapratipādakayor buddhisāmyaviṣayo dṛṣṭānto bhavitum arhati /
GSP28dhebta_u:1376: ādyami[25.12]ty etad vyācakṣāṇa āha ādau [25.14] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1378: ādau bhavam iti tv artha[ḥ] yasyārthasyetyādinā svalakṣaṇenāsādhāraṇasyaivopalakṣaṇād asādhāraṇaviṣayaṃ svalakṣaṇam iti vyācaṣṭe /
GSP28dhebta_u:1381: nanu ca tasyāsaṃkīrṇarūpatā [na] svataḥ kiṃ tv abhāvāṃśasadbhāvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:1382: tat katham evam abhidhīyata ity āśaṃkya kāraṇam āha tathāhī[25.26]tyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:1384: sa evābhāvāṃśaḥ [25.28] parābhāvo na siddhyet parātmava7d iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1386: sā [26.1] saṃkīrṇarūpatā kathaṃ na yuktimatīty āha svahetubale[26.2]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1389: nanu tena tasya saṃkīrṇarūpasya vināśa[ne] parābhāvena sarveṣām eva bhāvānām udayakṣaṇād ūrdhvam abhāvād abhāvaika8rasaṃ jagat syād iti prasaṃjayituṃ yuktaṃ na bhū(tu)
GSP28dhebta_u:1395: iha khalu bhāvānāṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgitvepi sadṛśāparāparakṣaṇodayād vastusantānaviṣayā pratītir asti na tv abhāvaviṣa[16a] 1yaiva /
GSP28dhebta_u:1398: udayottarakālam avyavadhānena vastuviṣayā ca pratītiḥ katham upapadyeta yadi sa evābhāvaḥ pūrvasiddhaṃ saṃkīrṇarūpaṃ vināsyād anyasaṃ(vināśyāty
GSP28dhebta_u:1400: sati caivaṃ varaṃ svahetor eva tathāvidhātām udayos tv ity ucyata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1401: hetutvenārthākriyākāritvena vasturūpatvād abhāva2rūpataiva hīyetety etad upekṣe(kṣyai)
GSP28dhebta_u:1405: prathamaṃ saṃkīrṇarūpāṇām utpādobhyupeyate paścād asaṃkīrṇarūpāṇām udayam upagantum -- kā punar atra hānir ity āśaṃkyāha kimi[26.5]tyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:1406: kaścit kila parivrāḍaśucau patitaṃ {p. 279} modakaṃ karaṇa gṛhṇan kenacit sotprāsaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ ” kim aśucer modakam udgrhṇāsi” iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1412: yathā ca tatra tanmatam “atraiva tyaktavya evāyam” tadā kim aśucim rakṣitasyānnasya grahaṇena,
GSP28dhebta_u:1415: yadi tv abhāvata evāsaṃkīrṇarūpāṇāṃ paścād utpādo 'bhyupetavyo 4varaṃ prathamata eva tathābhūtānām udayo 'bhyupagamyatām ity ābhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1419: pratykṣabalena [26.13] ity asya tātparyārthaṃ darśayann āha -- yadi tu [26.13] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1422: tathā saty api smṛtir na syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:1423: vyāptigrāhakapramāṇānadhigatasya viśiṣṭadeśādivartitad asādhāraṇarūpasya grahaṇād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1425: yam abhāvapratītiḥ kena pramāṇeneṣṭā yenāsyāḥ prāmāṇyam ācāryeṇa nivāryata ity āśaṃkyācāryasyābhiprāyaṃ 6parisphuṭayann āha -- nābhāve[26.20]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:1426: kasmāt punar etat pratītijanakatvenānyad a[bhā]vākhyaṃ pramāṇaṃ na bhavati,
GSP28dhebta_u:1427: eṣā ca tatphalam ity āha nahī[26.20]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1428: ākriyate adhyavasīyata iti ākāro [26.21] viśeṣo vyāvṛttir eva /
GSP28dhebta_u:1434: anadhigamād iti [27.10] vastuno viśeṣaṇatvenāgrahaṇād iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1445: atha mā bhūt sāmānyam arthakriyāsādhanaṃ vyaktis tāvat tatsādhanībhavati /
GSP28dhebta_u:1446: [16b] 1tadadhyavasāyitayaiva ca vidhivikalpaḥ pramāṇaṃ kiṃ na bhavatīty āśaṃkya na tatra prāmāṇyam iti [27.24] dūrasthena sambandhaḥ kāryaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:1452: yena tvayaivam ucyata ity āha tataḥ param i[27.19]tyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:1454: tatoyam arthaḥ -- yasmād evam ucyate pūrvapakṣavādinety arthāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:1455: evam abhidhāne 'pi kathaṃ tadadhyavasāya ukto bhavatīty āśaṃkyāha tatreti [27.21] /
GSP28dhebta_u:1456: jātim atiriktām adhigacchato 'sya prāmāṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīty āśaṃkyoktam evārtham adhikavidhānārtham anuvadann āha jātes tv iti [27.24] /
GSP28dhebta_u:1460: apūrvārthavijñānatvasya pramāṇalakṣaṇasyābhāvād abhipretya na prāmāṇyam ity uktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1461: anena yaḥ pareṇa vidhivikalpasya “tatrāpūrvārthavijñānam” ityādinā sāmānyena pramāṇalakṣaṇayogo darśitaḥ sa nāstīti darśitam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1462: yopi “satsaṃprayoga” ityādinā 4viṣeśeṇa pratyaksalakṣaṇayogo darśitaḥ so 'pi nāstīti darśayann āha ata eveti [27.25] /
GSP28dhebta_u:1466: tena sahendriyāṇāṃ [26.26] yaḥ saṃprayogaḥ sambandhas tasyā abhāvāt [27.26] /
GSP28dhebta_u:1471: “bhāvāṃśenaiva sambandho yogyatvād indriyasya hi” (Ślokavā. pra. 18) iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1473: ṣayasya jñānasya arthakriyāsādhane [28.14] vastuni pravṛttyaṅgatvād upadarśitārthaprāpakatvād iti yāvat /
GSP28dhebta_u:1481: api vyaktam etad ity asminn arthe /
GSP28dhebta_u:1484: nanu yadi nāma tadarthakriyāsādhane pravartakaṃ na bhavati tathāpi tat prāpakatvenāvisaṃvāda7katayā pramāṇaṃ kiṃ na bhavatīty āśaṃkyāha yac
GSP28dhebta_u:1492: anena yauvārthakriyā8yuṣmābhir vyaktisādhyatayopagamyate saiva tatsādhyā bhaviṣyatīty api pakṣaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1493: ubhayatrāpi vyakter evānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ sākṣāt pāraṃparyeṇa ca tatra sāmarthyasya pramāṇenāvagatatvād ity abhipretam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1494: nanu kasmin kāle karotīti praśne “svalakṣaṇapratipatter ūrdhvam” [28.23] ity uktam yuktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1495: na tu[52]kīdṛśa iti praśne iti cet /
GSP28dhebta_u:1496: satyam kevalaṃ svalakṣaṇa[17a] 1pratipatteḥ [28.24] uttarakālaṃ pratīyamānatvād ūrdhvam uttarakālam ity uktam upacārata iti boddhavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1497: tatpratipatter ūrdhvaṃ pratīyamānatvam eva darśayann āha tatsāmarthyeti [28.25] /
GSP28dhebta_u:1498: yad vā kīdṛśam iti praśnayitvaiva tatsāmarthyeti yojyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1499: tatsāmarthyotpannavikalpagrāhyatvam api kiṃ svalakṣaṇapratipatter ūrdhvam eva kiṃ vā kiyatkālapari(rya)
GSP28dhebta_u:1500: vasāne ity apekṣāyām uktam tatpratipatte2r ūrdhvam iti evaṃ bravīti [28.27] /
GSP28dhebta_u:1502: parābhiprāyeṇāpy evam abhidhānaṃ kim artham ity āha darśaneti [28.27] /
GSP28dhebta_u:1503: nanu kiṃ sāmānyamātram evārthakriyāsādhanaṃ na bhavati,
GSP28dhebta_u:1504: yena parais tathābhidhānād evaṃ bravītīty ucyata ity āśaṃkyābhyupagamam evottaraṃ racayann āha -- sarvam eveti [28.29] /
GSP28dhebta_u:1507: yadi evam anumānavikalpagrāhyasyāpi sāmānyasya tathātvā3t tadviṣayasyānumānavikalpasyāpi prāmāṇyan na syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:1508: tataś ca śabdapraveśe 'kṣitārānirgamavṛttānto jāta ity āśaṃkyāha yat tv api [29.1] /
GSP28dhebta_u:1512: anadhigataṃ pūrvajñānenāparicchinnaṃ yad arthakriyāsādhanaṃ tadviṣaya āśrayatvā4dhyavasāyena yasya tat tathā /
GSP28dhebta_u:1514: anena ca vidhivikalpāvabhāsisāmānyasyārthakriyāsādhanaviṣayatvepi nānadhigatārthakriyāsādhanaviṣayatvam iti na tadviṣayasya prāmāṇyam iti darśitam
GSP28dhebta_u:1515: tadviṣayatvam evāsya kuta ity āha sambaddheti [29.2] yad arthakriyāyāṃ sambaddhaṃ ka(kā)
GSP28dhebta_u:1516: raṇabhāvena tatsaṃbandhā5t tadārūḍhatvāt tanniṣṭhatvād iti yāvat /
GSP28dhebta_u:1518: tvam evedṛśam asya kva ity apekṣāyāṃ kāraṇe[29.1]tyādi yojyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1520: kāryañ ca vyāpyañ ca tathāvasīyamānaṃ svakāraṇaṃ vyāpakaṃ cātadrūpaparāvṛttaṃ 6pratyāyayatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1521: anena sarvaṇaitad uktaṃ anumānavikalpena hi paramārthato 'rthakriyāsādhanam eva vahnyādi viśiṣṭadeśādyavacchedena /
GSP28dhebta_u:1523: nānyad atas tadadhyavasāyinas tasya prāmāṇyam upapadyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:1525: tathādhyavasāyād iti vidhivikalpagrāhyam api sāmānyam anadhigatārthakriyāsādhanaviṣayaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:1526: sat svagrāhiṇaṃ vikalpaṃ prāmāṇyena jojayiṣyatīty āha -- idam iti [29.4] /
GSP28dhebta_u:1532: dṛṣṭāntam eva vivaṭayituṃ kāṃ punar i[29.10]tyādinopakramate /
GSP28dhebta_u:1533: parasparaṃ vyāvṛttyā hi vyaktayo bhinnam eva jñānam upajanayeyuḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1534: kathaṃ punar abhinnāṃ dhiyam abhidhānaṃ cādadhatīty āśaṃkyāha -- evam [29.23] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1536: pratiniyatatvam avaśyaṃ prāgbhāvitvaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ [29.23] yasyā sā tathoktā /
GSP28dhebta_u:1538: ktavyaṃ na tu janayitavyam ity avase[17b] 1yam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1541: tasmād vivakṣitād aparaṃ sāmānyaṃ [29.24] tadekasāmānyaṃ vyaṃjakatvākhyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1543: tadabhivyaktayepi tadaparaṃ sāmānyaṃ tadekasāmānyābhivyaṃjakākhyaṃ sāmānyābhivyañjakatvākhyam aparam upeyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1544: 2tathā tadabhivyaktayepy anyad ity anavasthāyā aparyavasānasya prasaṃgāt [29.24] prāpter hetoḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1545: sādhayiṣyanti vivakṣitasāmānyayogam antareṇa svabhāvata eveti prakaraṇād avaseyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1546: nanu kiṃ pramāṇaparidṛṣṭārthāpalāpe prayatir bhavatāṃ yenaivam abhidhīyata ity āha kim [29.6] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1547: atha kim ajñāyamānapramāṇakam asad avaśyaṃ bhavati yena sarvathā tadarthakriyo3cchedaḥ kriyata ity āha pramāṇābādhitena ce[29.26]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1548: pramāṇābādhām eva mātrayā darśayituṃ tathāhī[29.27]tyādinopakramate nopalakṣayāma [29.28] iti vadan dṛśyānupalambhaṃ bādhakaṃ darśayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:1550: rūparūpiṇor ananyatvena bhede rūpiṇa ema bhedāpatter ity abhipretyāha padārtha4dvayopagamaprasaṃgād iti [30.5] /
GSP28dhebta_u:1553: na punaḥ pratibhāsabhedād ity āśaṃkya yadi apy atra śataṃ doṣāḥ sambhavanti,
GSP28dhebta_u:1554: tathāpi granthāvastirabhayād ekam eva dūṣaṇaṃ datte sāmānyasyeti {p. 283} [30.7] /
GSP28dhebta_u:1555: evaṃ manyate yadi sāmānyabhedād bhāvabhedas tadā gavāśvarasyeva gotvā5śvatvayor api bhedas tadaparasāmānyabhedād bhaved iti sāmānyasyāpy aparasāmānyaprasakter iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1556: astv eva kā kṣitir ity āha -- niḥsāmānyasyeti [30.7] /
GSP28dhebta_u:1559: kathaṃ punar dṛśyānupalambhaḥ siddho yena tannirākrṭam e6tat syāt yata [30.15] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1567: tatrāvabhāsate tad eva sāmānya7m asmākam ity āśaṃkya tad api nāstīty abhiprāyavān āha spaṣṭasyāpī[30.27]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1569: saṃprati dvitīyasya spaṣṭarūpasyopalakṣaṇam abhyupagamya tasyānugābhirūpatvaṃ pratiṣedhayann āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:1572: anena kiṃ tad dvitīyaṃ spaṣṭaṃ rūpaṃ sābaleyabāhuleyavyaktidvayāntarālaṃ na vyāpnoti8 kiṃ vyāpnotīti vikalpayor buddhisthīkṛtayor madhye 'vyāpanapakṣe doṣaṃ darśayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:1574: kathaṃ tadanugamo [30.18] vyaktyantarānugamo vyaktyantaravyāpitvaṃ niṣkriyatvena gatvā vyāpārāsaṃbhavāt tathātvepi pūrvavyaktiviyogānuṣaṅgāt
GSP28dhebta_u:1575: na ca tatsāṅgam iti ca bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1578: na tasya tatra vyaktaṃ rūpam asti vyañjakābhāvāt tenānupalakṣaṇam ity āha nahī[30.19]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1579: avaśyaṃ hi bhūtale tat kayācid vyaktam iti na tasyāvyaktarūpasaṃbhava iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1580: vārtikakārasyāpy ayam artho 'bhipreta iti pratipādayann āha -- tathā ce[30.20]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1581: prakṛtopayayogibhāga eva paṭhituṃ yujyata itivārtikasya pādatra2yam evāyam apaṭhat /
GSP28dhebta_u:1588: iha ekatraivāśraya ity ane3nāpy aṃśenāyaṃ na dṛṣṭāntaḥ kintu yathā kṣaṇikatvasya
GSP28dhebta_u:1589: nirvikalpakabodhena dṛṣṭasyāpi na darśanāvasāyas tathā sakalasvāśrayarūpapratibhāsepi
GSP28dhebta_u:1592: sarvasvāśrayavartino vā kā {p. 284} kṣatir ity āha tata [30.27] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1596: tenāyam arthas tatsahacāriṇaḥ sāmānyasaṃbaddhasya tatsamavāyaviṣayasyeti yāvad iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1599: kim indriyabuddhau sāmānyasya pratibhāsa āhosvidvikalpabuddhā5v anumānātmikāyām iti vikalpayor antarnihitayor ekaṃ vikalpaṃ nirākṛtyāparaṃ nirākartum āha athe[31.3]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1604: yathāspaṣṭo vyaktyākāro 'rthākāro vā lakṣyamāṇaḥ samvedya6mānosti na tathā svalakṣaṇapratibhāso vyaktyākāro lakṣyamāṇostīti yojyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1605: kasmād evam ity āha -- tadabhāva [31.5] iti tasya svalakṣaṇasyābhāve tāsāṃ [31.6] sāmānyabuddhīnām /
GSP28dhebta_u:1608: spaṣtāspaṣṭarūpadvayayogi svalakṣaṇaṃ tenendri7yajñāne spaṣṭena rūpeṇa pratibhāty anyatra punar aspaṣṭenety āha aneke[31.6]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1611: yogitvāt paṭasyetyāder uttarasyātrāpi suvacatvād ity abhisandhiḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1612: iyam abhinnābhāsā sāmānyākārā svalakṣaṇād udbhavo 'syā iti svalakṣaṇodbhavā satī bhinnārthagrāhiṇī vyāvṛttavastugrāhiṇī na pratibhāti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1614: “dṛḍhatvāt sarvadā buddher” iti bruvatā yadi buddher dārḍhyam abhihitaṃ tad api niṛupayann āha -- dṛḍḥatvañ ce[31.10]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1615: sahetukavināśavādipakṣe kṣaṇikatvābhyupagamād i[31.10]ty āśutaravināśitvābhyupagamād iti veditavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1619: syād akṣaṇikaḥ syāt kṣaṇika ityādi [31.12] syād iti vādaḥ syādvādas tasya bhaṃgo
GSP28dhebta_u:1620: nirākaraṇaṃ tasmād evāvadhāraṇīyo bādhaka iti prakṛtatvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:1621: syādvādabhaṅgam adhītyeti karmaṇi lyablope ceyaṃ pañcamī draṣṭavyā /
GSP28dhebta_u:1622: evaṃ manyata [29.22] ityādinā yad upakrāntaṃ tad upasaṃharann āha 2tasmād i[31.16]tyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:1630: sābaleyādiṣu karkādisādhāraṇe parasparaṃ bhinna3tvepi gotvam eva vartate nāśvatvam ity etan nimittam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1631: yathaikasmāt sābaleyāt karko bhinnas tathā bāhuleyopi tatas tulyepi bhinnatve [31.21]
GSP28dhebta_u:1632: bhede keṣucit [31.21] sābaleyādiṣu vṛttir gotvasya avṛttitāvidyamānavṛttitvam avidyamānatvam
GSP28dhebta_u:1634: kasya keṣucid vṛttyavṛttiteti apekṣāyām uktaṃ4 gotvāder i[31.22]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1635: animitte[54]ti kākākṣinyāyenobhayatrāpi vṛttyavṛttitāyāṃ buddhāv api saṃbadhyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:1636: tenāyam artho yathā gotvādeḥ keṣucid vṛttyāvṛttitānimittāpi niyāmakasāmānyarahitāpi
GSP28dhebta_u:1641: yad vā tena kāraṇena tatsāmānyam icchanti dhruvaṃ niścitam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1642: tenābhinnena viṣayeṇa vinā anugamātmikānāṃ buddhīnām utpāde ko doṣa ity āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:1645: anena sāmānyābhāve tathābhūtabuddhyutpāde bādhakapramāṇam uktaṃ pareṇa /
GSP28dhebta_u:1646: asāv eva vandīkṛtam arthaṃ pratikurvann āha -- na tv iti [31.27] /
GSP28dhebta_u:1648: na duṣyatī[31.27]ti bruvato 'yaṃ bhāvas tadantareṇa tathāvidhabuddyutpāde mithyātvadoṣosti bādhakaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1650: tu sāmānyāntareṇa keṣucid eva vṛttau kim asti bādhakaṃ yena tatrānya7sāmānyam abhyanujānāmīti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1651: asau [32.1] mithyātvaprasaktidoṣo na tathāgatasiddhāntatītipariśuddhabuddhīn a[32.2]smadādīn bādhate vyathayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:1653: yady api pūrvavat sāmānyabuddher mithyātvavyavasthānibandhanaṃ pramāṇaṃ mātrayā darśitaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:1654: tathāpi bahumukham evāsyā mithyātvavyavasthāpakaṃ pramāṇam astīti pratipādayituṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:1660: kuto na yuktam ity āha viruddhe[32.9]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1661: amum arthaṃ sātirekaṃ kārikābhir vaktuṃ para {p. 286} mukhenāha ne(-khenāha āhace)tyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:1671: nanu ca “sāmānyāny api caitāni nāśīny āśrayanāśata” [Ślokavā. pṛ. 380] iti vacanānmīmāṃsakairvyaktināśe nāśa iṣṭa eveti kim ucyate vyaktināśe 'nāśaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1675: kevalam evaṃvaktur ayam āśayaḥ yady ekaṃ sāmānyaṃ tato bhinnañcābhinnañ ca saṃgacchate
GSP28dhebta_u:1676: tadā vyaktirūpeṇa vyayate tadvyatiriktena ca rūpeṇānuvartata iti syād api yadi paraṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:1679: ata eva ca kaiścinnaiyāyikāir nāśīnīty upalabhyānīty etad arthaṃ3kumārilenoktaṃ vyākhyātam iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1680: vyaktijanmani janmāniṣṭau sāmānyasya dūṣaṇam idam upasthitam iti darśayann āha -- vyaktī[32.12]tyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:1682: niṣkriyatvāj jāter ity abhipretya nāgatety abhyupagamayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:1684: dṛśyāyā anupalabdhatvād ity abhiprāyeṇa ca nāsīd ity u4[32.13]pagamayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:1686: tasyā vyakter utpadyamānāyā deśo diśyate 'sminn iti kṛtvādhāra uktaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1689: bandhanena vā prakāreṇa bhavet sa caikopi na bhavatīti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1690: sā jātiḥ tayā vyaktyā saṅgatā saṃbaddhā kathaṃ [32.13] na kathañcit /
GSP28dhebta_u:1691: tajjanyajanmani sāmānyasyeṣyamāṇe5 tādātmyaṃ tāvad atibhavān na(tāvad bhedān na) yujyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:1692: tatsambandhamātram api na saṃgacchata ity abhiprāyo 'syaivaṃ ca vaditur boddhavyo
GSP28dhebta_u:1694: sambandhamātraniṣedho 'nupayuktaḥ prasajyeta prastutañ ca tanmatam iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:1696: yaṃ doṣaḥ syād iti darśayann āha vyakti(ktīti) [32.14] /
GSP28dhebta_u:1698: tacchūnye[32.14] naṣtavyaktirahite dṛśyādarśanābhiprāyeṇa ca na sthitety āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:1702: jāter vyaktyātmakatvopagame tadudayavyayayos tadanvaya7vyayau na syātām /
GSP28dhebta_u:1703: satyāñ ca tadviṣtāv ayam ayañ ca doṣa iti pratipādya tattadiṣṭau ca jātes tādātmyopagama eva jaghanya iti pratipādayann āha vyakte[32.16]r ityādi
GSP28dhebta_u:1704: sā vyaktir ātmā svabhāvo yasya tadbhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1705: anupaplutaṃ [32.17] vādyādibhir aprāpitāsvāsthyaṃ ceto {p. 287} yeṣāṃ teṣām /
GSP28dhebta_u:1708: upaplutaceta8sām evamīmāṃsakānāmidam iṣṭam iti sāmarthyād darśitam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1710: ddhau prakṛṣṭaṃ kārakaṃ pramāṇam ucyate 'viśeṣādhāyitve ca sādhakatamatvābhāvāt katham asya tattvaṃ syād ity āśayaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:1713: tasmin vikalpe [19b] 1pratibhāsanāt tasya sāmānyam iti prakāśitam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1715: vyaktisvabhāvatve tasya kathaṃ tadakartṛtvam ity āha tasyeti [33.3] /
GSP28dhebta_u:1716: kalpitaṃ vikalpena ghaṭitaṃ rūpaṃ [33.3] svabhāvo yasya tasya /
GSP28dhebta_u:1720: iti[33.6]r evam artho manyate [33.6] cetasi nidhattevārttikakāra ity evaṃ bruvāṇa iti cārthād draṣṭavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:1723: anadhigatārthaviṣayaṃ pramāṇam iti pramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ pareṇa kārikayā darśitam iti darśayann āha tatrāpūrveti [33.11]. aham ahamikayā kriyā āhopuruṣikā tayā [33.16] karaṇabhūtayā /
GSP28dhebta_u:1724: tatsvalakṣaṇam aspaṣṭarūpatayā anukarotīti tadanukārī3ti vivakṣitam iti prakaṭyann āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:1727: nīlādi paśyatas tu vikalpayato yaḥ spaṣṭārthapratibhāsābhimānaḥ,
