GSP28dhebta_u:2007: dayādi dānacetanādikāryatvena niścitaṃ kenacid yena tatrāpy abhyāsāt tathāniścayaḥ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:2010: tad ayam artho yenāsakṛd vahnyāder dāhādyanubhūtaṃ sa tadā phalasya parokṣatvepi dāhādijananayogyam etad iti pratyakṣeṇa niścinoty eva /
GSP28dhebta_u:2013: apy abhyāse sa eva puruṣaḥ puruṣā7ntaranirapekṣo muktādeḥ kṛttimādirūpatāṃ svayam eva pratipadyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:2014: tathānabhyāsāvasthāyāṃ svatas tadyogyatāniścayepi abhyāsāditaḥ paṭimapratyakṣaṃ svayam eva tadyogyaṃ niścāyayiṣyatīti kiṃ nānumanyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:2016: kiñ ca na vyāptismaraṇam antareṇānumānaṃ pravartate /
GSP28dhebta_u:2017: na cāgnyā8di vastu dṛṣṭvā tatsādhyārthakriyāvāñchayā pravṛttau yad yad evam arthakriyākāri yathā mahānasādi dṛṣṭaṃ tadvastv iti pravṛttau(tteḥ)
GSP28dhebta_u:2018: prāgvyāptismaraṇaṃ saty avādinā vadituṃ śakyata iti kathaṃ tatrānumānasya pravartakatvakalpanā na sāhasam /
GSP28dhebta_u:2019: ataś caivaṃ yatas tādrūpyāvasāye pratyakṣaṃ nānumānasāpekṣamanavasthāprasakteḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2020: yathā ca tasya pāṭavaṃ tādrupyaniścaye [23a] 1caritārtham upavarṇanīyam,
GSP28dhebta_u:2021: tathā yogyatāniścaye kiṃ na varṇyata ity alam ativistareṇa /
GSP28dhebta_u:2022: yat tu tac cānumeyatāṃ nātipatati [40.19] tat svaparasaṃtānavartinīr buddhīr adhikṛtyoktam “anyatrānubhūtaviṣayebhya” iti vacanād iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2023: atra ca sarvatra samādhānaṃ dhīmadbhir eva vidheyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:2025: kṛtakatvādau pāramārthikaṃ [41.24] sādhyasādha2nayor dharmiṇiścabhedaṃ [41.24] bhinnaṃ rūpaṃ nālamba[te] nāśrayate /
GSP28dhebta_u:2028: ekasminn arthe dvayoḥ samavāya ekārthasamavāyo [41.26]tra vivakṣitaḥ kṛtakatvānityatve [41.26] ādī yasya tasya /
GSP28dhebta_u:2034: kathaṃ punaḥ kṛtakatvādeḥ śabdādau vṛttāv ātmādivrttir āsaṃjyata ity āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:2037: “na ca saṃyogavannānātvaṃ bhāvavalliṅgāviśeṣāt viśeṣaliṅgā4bhāvāc ca tasmād bhāvavat sarvatraikaḥ samavāya” [Praśa.Bh. pr. 172] iti vacanād ekatvenābhyupagamaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2038: athāpi syāt na samavāyād vṛttir api tu samavāya eva vṛttir iti tad apy avadyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:2039: saṃbandhābhāvena bhāvoyaṃ vrttir iti kalpanāyā ayogāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:2041: yadi ca samavāyas tasya vrttir ātmādiṣv api tasya bhāvāt5 kathaṃ na tasya vṛttir iti tadavastho doṣa iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2043: etasminn upagame gaḍḍapraveśe 'kṣitārānirgamvṛttānto jāta iti darśayann āha saiva tarhī[42.8]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2047: abhūtvā yo na bhavati bhūtvā ca [na] vinaśyati sa tadviparītarūpas tasya yaḥ samāropas tasya vyavacchedaḥ sa viṣayo [42.9] yasyās tasyāḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2048: sā kim a6vaśyābhyupagamanīyā yenānyasyopagamo niṣidhyata ity āha saiveti [42.8] /
GSP28dhebta_u:2049: paramārthena bhedo dharmiṇā sahety arthāt tadvatoḥ paramārthabhedavattvañ ca parābhiprāyeṇoktaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:2051: taddharmatānapekṣāyāntu nityābhimateṣv api tau varteyātām iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2052: utpattivināśadharmatāyāḥ kalpanābuddheś cāntarāle ghāṭāmastakāntarālavartimāṃsapiṇḍāparanāma gaḍur iva gaḍu[42.11]r niṣphalatvāt tena /
GSP28dhebta_u:2055: yadi kṛtakatvādayo dharmā vyatirekiṇastava dharmiṇi pramāṇasiddhāḥ syus tadā satyām api tasya vastunas tathātāyāmajāgalastanavadanupayuktā api kena nāma nābhyupagamyeran /
GSP28dhebta_u:2057: kevalaṃ tad eva pramāṇasiddhatvaṃ na saṃbhavati pratyakṣapramāṇavādhitatvam eva lakṣyata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2058: {p. 296} atha kiṃ kalpanāniveśinaḥ kṛtakatvādayo dharmāḥ sādhyadharmam avabodhayanti yenāvaśyābhyupagamanītyāyā(nīyāyā)
GSP28dhebta_u:2059: utpattivināśadharmatāyā eva tathāvidhabuddhinibandhanatvāt kim anyenety ucyata ity āśaṃkāyām abhyupagama [23b] 1evotpattir(vottara)
GSP28dhebta_u:2061: sattāmātreṇa [42.12] tanniścāyakajñānanirapekṣeṇa svarūpeṇa vastuna utpatteḥ prabhṛti sarvadeti veditavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:2062: anavarataṃ [42.14] satataṃ taddharmasya sādhyadharmasya pratītis tasyāḥ prasaṅgāt [42.14] /
GSP28dhebta_u:2063: kathaṃ nāma te tatpratītinibandhanaṃ bhavatīty āha kiṃtv i[42.14]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2064: nanu vastvasaṃsparśitve vikalpasya kathaṃ vastunaḥ kṛtakatvādirūpa2tāpratītir ity āha sa ce[42.15]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2067: tadagrāhiṇaḥ kathaṃ tadadhyavasāya ity āha paramparaye[42.17]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2070: nanu ca na kṛtakatvādayo dharmās tathāvidhabuddhinibandhanatveneṣyante kintv a3rthakriyākāritayā,
GSP28dhebta_u:2071: tat kathaṃ tathāvidhavikalpaḥ syād yataḥ prasavet (vikalpasya tataḥ prasavaḥ) /
GSP28dhebta_u:2072: tasya tasya dharmasya vaiyarthyam ity āha tadvyatiriktās tv i[42.18]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2074: tasmād abhūtvābhavanadharmaṇo bhūtvā cābhāvanadharmaṇo dharmiṇo vyatiriktā anye tasyāḥ kalpanābuddher utpattis tasyā nimittaṃ kevalaṃ nimittamātram [42.18] tadbhāvastayā /
GSP28dhebta_u:2076: dharmiṇo 'nyo na syāt tarhi kṛtakādibuddhir anubhavasiddhā nirnibandhanā syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:2077: na caivam ato 'sty etadbuddhikārī kṛtakatvād iti (dir iti)
GSP28dhebta_u:2081: tathāpi tathāvidhād bhāvād anye te tannibandhanaṃ kalpyaṃtām ity āha tadvaram i[42.19]tyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:2084: “atraivedaṃ kṛtakatvādi nātmādiṣu” ity evaṃrūpā tasyā yannibandhanam abhūtvābhavanadharmatādi tad eva tathāvidhavikalpaprasavanimittaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:2085: varam astu [42.20] / hetum asyāniṣṭer āha tasye[42.20]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2086: astu tadabhyupagamas tathāpi kathaṃ tasya vaiyarthyam ity āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:2088: caritārthā [42.21] anyena niṣpāditaprayojanā vyatirekavantaḥ [42.21] tadvyatiriktāḥ kalpanānirmitāstu te saṃtu /
GSP28dhebta_u:2090: syād etat -- yadi vyatiriktānityatādidharmayogepi vastuna evāvasthāyitvādirūpaṃ vyavahartāraḥ pratipādayanti,
GSP28dhebta_u:2091: tadā tasya bhūtvābhavanadharmatādyupagame tadupagame ca tasyaitadbuddhinibandhanatvasya yujyamānatvāc caritārthā vyatirekiṇo dharmā ta bha(dharmā
GSP28dhebta_u:2092: veyur yāvatā vyatiriktānityatādibhāve tad eva vyavahartāraḥ pratipadyante /
GSP28dhebta_u:2093: tat kathaṃ yad eva tatkalpanānibandhanam ityādyucyamānaṃ parabhāgaṃ puṣṇātīty āśaṃkyāha avaśyañ ce[42.22]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2095: vyaktam etad ity asminn arthe vā /
GSP28dhebta_u:2096: anityatāgrahaṇaṃ copalakṣaṇaṃ tena kṛtakatvādāv api yathā8yogam eva tatpratyayaṃ pratipadyante [42.23] niścinvanti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2099: kasmād avastvātmānaṃ te tathā pratīyantīty āha tasmād anavasthāyīsvabhāvasyānurūpā samīcīnocitā yā arthakriyā tadarthitayā pravṛtteḥ [42.24] pravartanāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:2102: vyatiri[24a] 1ktānityatāyāṃ satyāṃ nityatvāt [42.25] sthiratvāt tasya śabdādivastunaḥ prastāvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:2103: nityatvādi[42.25]ti bruvāṇasyāyam āśayo bhinnanityatāyogepi vastuno nānyathātvaṃ tasyās tatrākiñcit karatvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:2106: mānasya tasyākāśāder iva nityatvavyavastheti vastuno nityatvāddhe[42.25]tos tasya nityatvasya 2vastuno yo 'vagamas tenārthi[65]tve nyāyaprāpte sati ayam anumātād i(tā ani)
GSP28dhebta_u:2107: tyśabdādipadārthasādhyārthakriyārthī -- [42.25][66]itis tasmāc chabdādikaṃ nityam āśaṃkamānaḥ [42.26] tad asaṃdehe 'numānāyogāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:2108: tathā sandihānaḥ kiṃ kasmād vastuno 'nityatāvicāraṃ pratyāhitāsthaḥ [42.26] kṛtatātparyārthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2109: anityatāyās tadvyatiriktatvād tasya sthirātmatāniścayād eva3 tatsaṃśayapūrvakānityatāvicārasyaivāyogād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2113: tatra nityatve prayojye hetau tṛtīyā pratyeyā /
GSP28dhebta_u:2114: vyatiriktāyām anityatāyāṃ vastunas tathā vicāro na yujyata iti pratipādya doṣāntaram api tasyāṃ darśayann āha vyatiriktāyāṃ ce[43.1]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2115: tatraiva pratipannāyām anityatāyāṃ na vastuny apratipanna ity arthāt sūcitam /
GSP28dhebta_u:2122: vyatiriktānityatāprapipattāv api vastunas tathātvapratītiḥ kathaṃ yujyata ityādidoṣaśatam utpaśyan sotprāsam āha tad etad i[43.4]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2125: kathañci[43.4]t kenacid rūpeṇa yo bhedas tasyopagame kiñcitkalam utpaśyāmo [43.10] notpre6kṣāmahe /
GSP28dhebta_u:2126: yadi kathaṃcid bhedo na syād bhedādhiṣṭhānaḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ katham upapadyetoyonu(dyetety āha) sādhye[43.10]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2128: {p. 298} sādhyadharmasya sādhanadharmarūpatopagame sati bhedopagame phalaṃ na kiñcid iti pratipādya saṃpratyekātmasādhyasādhanayor bheda eva na saṃbhavati /
GSP28dhebta_u:2131: kathaṃcit kenāpi svabhāvena yo bhedaḥ [43.12] kṛtakatvānityatvayoḥ sa na yuktaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2133: yena dharmisvabhāvena tayor abheda iṣyate tasmād ekasmāt[67]svabhāvabhedāt tayo[43.12]r dharmayor iti prastāvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:2134: yena svabhāvena tayor a[43.13]bhedas tenāpi [na] bheda eva yenāyaṃ doṣaḥ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:2135: ki8ntu tatopi svabhāvāt tayoḥ kṛtakatvānityatvayoḥ kathaṃcid bhedābhedau na bheda evābheda eve(eva ve)ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2136: yena svabhāvenābhinnāv iṣyete tadekasvabhāvād api bhedavato[43.14]r bhidyamānayoḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2137: tena bhedāvadhinā svabhāvena kathañcid abhedanimittam [43.14] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2138: yady abhedo neṣyate tadaikāntiko bheda eva syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:2139: sati caivaṃ pūrvako doṣa iti prāyeṇo[24b] 1ktam //
GSP28dhebta_u:2140: tenāpy a[43.16]bhedanimittenābhinnena svabhāvena kathaṃcid bhedanimittam iti prastāvād boddhavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:2143: atrāpi yadi tena svabhāvena tayor abheda eva bhavet tadaikāntiko 'bheda eva tadā
GSP28dhebta_u:2144: ca kalpanāv abhāsibhedanibandhanaḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ syāt tathā cāsmanmatānupraveśaprasaṅga
GSP28dhebta_u:2146: abheda2nimitte bhedanimitte ca svbhāvāntare 'bhyupagate mābhūd aikāntiko 'bhedo bhedo veti punas tathābhūtasvabhāvāntarābhyupagamo nyāyaprāptaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:2147: punas tatrāpy evam ity abhiprāyavānitiśabdahetāv abhiprāyāha anantaive[43.16]ti (-prāyavān āha ity anantaiveti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2154: bhedapakṣabhāvinā saṃbandhābhāvena sādhyasādhanabhāvāyogād ityādīnāṃ doṣāṇāṃ katham anavasaro
GSP28dhebta_u:2156: itopi bhinnābhinnarūpobhayadharmāsaṃbhava iti saṃkṣepeṇāha yaś ce[43.20]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2157: purodhāya [43.20] puraskrtya vikalpabuddhyā ālambyeti 4yāvat kalpanāghaṭitasya pratiṣedhāt pāramārthika [43.24] ity āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:2167: bhavato 'smād abhidhānapratyayāv iti bhāvaḥ [45.5] kāryatvam i[45.5]tyādinā tam evābhivyanakti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2170: anenaitad āha -- yady adṛśyaṃ tasya karaṇaṃ syāt tat katham akaraṇasyendhanāder bhedam anuvi[da]dhyād iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2171: indhanabhedānuvidhānaṃ dhūmasya pratipādya vahnibhedānuvidhānaṃ pratipādayann āha -- alpe[45.27]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2172: alpaś ca mahāṃś cālpamahāntau tau ca tāv indhanavikārau ca tatkāriṇaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2173: prātipadikagrahaṇe na hi tadantasya grahaṇam iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2175: tadanurūpasyā[45.27]lpamahato vā dhūmasya darśanād iti sambandhaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2176: adṛśyātmano 'gnyādisāmagryāṃ niyataṃ sannidhāna7m upekṣyāgnyāder eva kāryaṃ dhūma iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2177: etat sādhikām upapattim abhidhāyādhunā tanniyatasannidhānam eva tasya na yujyata iti darśayann āha na ce[45.28]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2180: tasyaivādṛśyasya tadanantaraṃ bhāvān na dhūmaḥ syād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2185: [69]atrāpi vṛkṣendhanayor api tathābhāvakalpanāyāṃ tad evottara[46.5]m iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2187: vṛkṣādibhāve niyatasannidher adṛśyātmanaḥ kutaścid indhanasya bhāva iti punar a[46.6]prathame codye [25a] 1parakīya eva[70]eva vākya(vṛkṣa)
GSP28dhebta_u:2190: vṛkṣādikāraṇatvaṃ tasya vṛkṣādeḥ svahetor eva [46.5] bījāder bhāvadarśanād i[46.5]ti parihāraḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2191: tatrāpy adaśyātmano niyatasannidher ityādicodyaparihārayor ābhīkṣūnyenānavasthānāt paryavasānaṃ ca (naṃ na) syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:2194: yadi va tasyāpy adṛśyasya bhāve niyatasannidhāna[na]paramadṛśyaṃ kāraṇaṃ kiṃ na kalpyate?
GSP28dhebta_u:2196: tathātrāpy evam ity anavasthā na vyavasthitaḥ kāryakāraṇabhavo bhaved ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2197: athavā tatrāpi [46.5] vṛkṣādau tathābhāvakalpanāyām [46.5] dṛśyabhāvakalpanāyāṃ pareṇa kriyamāṇāyāṃ tad evottara[3m indhanā]der vṛkṣādibhedānuvidhānāt
GSP28dhebta_u:2199: nāpi vṛkṣādikāraṇatvam adṛśyātmano vṛkṣādeḥ svahetor eva bījāder bhāvadarśanad iti {p. 300} ca /
GSP28dhebta_u:2201: bījādibhāve niyatasannidher ityādau punaś codye [46.6] ca parasya sa eva bījādibhedānuvi4dhānād ityādy anaṃtarokto 'smākaṃ parihārah [46.6] paracodyapratividhānam /
GSP28dhebta_u:2203: etene [46.6]ndhanādeḥ svahetor eva vṛkṣāder bhāvadarśanād ti vacanasāmarthyāt,
GSP28dhebta_u:2204: yasya yasmād bhāvo dṛśyate tasya tatkāraṇatvam iti pratipāditena /
GSP28dhebta_u:2205: yasyā eva sāmagryā agnīndhanāder utpattis tasyā eva taddrśyatva5m upajāyata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2206: ekasāmagryadhīnatā [46.7] tayor niyatasannidhānanimittaṃ sāpi pratyuktā pratyākhyātā kasyacid bhāve vijñāyamānasyaiva tatkāryatvavyavasthāsiddheḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:2207: tadbhāve 'nupalabhyamānasya tu tatkāryatvakalpanāyām atiprasaṃgād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2208: atraiva vaktavyāntaraṃ samuccivann āha tad i[46.7]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2221: tkāraṇatvam upetyāpi7 nāsmatpratijñātasya kācit kṣatir iti pratipādayitum āha rūpantv iti (bhavatv iti) [46.12] /
GSP28dhebta_u:2222: [72]yato [46.14] vahnyādeḥ kāraṇatvahāneḥ agnyāder anyasyāpi[73]bhāvaḥ [bhāve] dhūmaṃ prati kāraṇatvena kathaṃ na agnyādeḥ kāraṇatvahāniḥ [46.14]
GSP28dhebta_u:2223: kathañ ca tanniṣcayena pravṛttau na visamvāda ity āśaṃkyāha tasya (?) /
GSP28dhebta_u:2225: dṛṣṭasya kāraṇasya hānam abhāvo na hy akāraṇatvena pratītasya kāraṇatvahānir ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2227: atatprāpti[46.16]r dṛṣṭakāraṇāprāptiḥ prasajyata āpadyate aneneti prasaṅgāpādanam atiśayitaḥ prasaṅgo 'tiprasaṃgas tenālaṃ [46.16] na kiñcit
GSP28dhebta_u:2228: nanu ca tadbhāve bhāvas tadabhāve 'bhāvaś ca [25b] 1kāryadharmāv imau tat katham ayam eva kāryakāraṇabhāva uty ucyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:2229: kāryabhāva iti tu yuktaṃ vaktum iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2230: satyam etat kevalam etasmin kāryadharme kathite kāraṇadharmopi svabhāve bhāvo bhāvanaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:2231: bhāvo bhāvayitṛtvaṃ sattayābhisambandhayitṛtvaṃ svābhāve cābhāvo 'bhāvanam abhāvayitṛtvam

GSP28dhebta_u:2513: atra ca yathā prajñākaraguptena parākrāntaṃ tathāsmābhirdharmottarapradīpe

GSP28dhebta_u:2526: parepi kim evam eṣitaro na bhavaṃti yena tanmatāpekṣam idam ucyate ityā3ha naiyāyike[57.25]ti /

GSP28dhebta_u:2528: karmāṇi kriyābahuvacanena vyāptim upadarśayati na tu bahutvasaṃkhyām eva /

GSP28dhebta_u:2546: kṛtakatvānityatvayor dharmayor yo bhedaḥ pṛthaktvaṃ tasyāvabhāsaḥ sa vidyate yasyām sā ca sā kalpanā ceti tathā /
GSP28dhebta_u:2548: sā ca sā kalpanā ceti tathā /

GSP28dhebta_u:2585: 'nityatvam apy aikātmyān niścitam eveti katham anumānāvatāra ity āśaṃkyopasaṃhāravyāje5nāha
GSP28dhebta_u:2588: dṛṣṭā api bhāvāḥ kenacid ātmanā niścitās tadanyenātmanā anumānato niścīyanta iti {5] saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2592: tasmāt kṛtakād anyad akṛtakaṃ tasmād vyāvṛttena6 /

GSP28dhebta_u:2596: kṛtakatveneva yadi tenāpy ātmanā te tadā niścetuṃ śakyāḥ katham anumānān niścīyanta ity āha [59.8] aniścīyamānā iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2598: bhrānter vibhramasya kāraṇaṃ nirantarasadṛśāparāparotpattir avidyā ca tasya sadbhāvāt /

GSP28dhebta_u:2603: prati8bandhāvasāyaḥ purovartī pūrabhāvī yasyānumānasya tasmāt [59.9] itis tasmāt tasya [59.12] vināśasyārthāntaranimittatayā tanmātrānanvayitve

GSP28dhebta_u:2671: nāpy upalabdher hetoḥ upajātā[61.8]nyathātva śaṃkā prakaraṇād vināśasyābhāvasaṃdeho yasya puṃsas tathā san /

GSP28dhebta_u:2721: {p. 314} sādhyadṛṣṭāntadharmiṇoḥ samānaḥ [62.3] sadṛśo hetusadbhāvalakṣaṇo dharmaḥ [62.3] pratipādyatayā yasya [62.3] prayogasyāsau sadharmā,
GSP28dhebta_u:2722: samānasyeti yogavibhāgāt samānasya pakṣādiṣv iti vaktavye parigrahād vā sa bhāvas tasya bhāvo [62.3] bhavato 'smād abhidhānapratyayāv iti kṛtvā [31b] 1 rūpaviśeṣaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:2723: tayor eva visadṛśo [62.4] hetusadbhāvāsadbhāvalakṣaṇo dharmaḥ pratipādyatayā yasya tasya bhāvaḥ [62.5] aśeṣasya sādhyetaradharmiṇaḥ (sādhyadharmiṇaḥ)
GSP28dhebta_u:2724: sādhyadharmaṇovānyatra sarvatra sādhye hetor vyāptir vivakṣitā /

GSP28dhebta_u:2726: nanu ca sattvalakṣaṇe 2svabhāvahetau sādhyadharmiṇy api viparyaye bādhakapramāṇavṛttyāpi vyāptir grahītuṃ śakyata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:2727: naitad apekṣayā hetor anyatra vṛttyapekṣayā kiṃcid yenedam āsajyeta /

GSP28dhebta_u:3263: kathañcid bhedonyathā tadaparaikasvabhāvād atyanta3m abhedād avasthāvasthātrabhedanimittarūpāntarāṇāṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:3265: atas tebhyas tasya kathañcidbhede 'vaśyaiṣitavye tannibandhanam aparasyāpi rūpasyāparaṃ rūpam upaitavyam iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3266: tathā tadanyatrāpy evam evety aparimitarūpataivaikasya [85.4] syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:3270: na pratyakṣā satī pratyabhijñā bādhyate kiṃtu bādhyamānā pratyakṣābhāsā seti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3280: {p. 329} na cā(ce)yam avasthā kāryavijñānātiriktaṃ jñānaṃ janayati yena jñānalakṣaṇāyām
GSP28dhebta_u:3281: arthakriyāyām asyopayogāt sāmarthyaṃ kalpyety abhiprāyeṇa sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇasye[85.22]ty avocad iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3284: bādhāsadbhāvād “bādhavarjitam” iti sāmānyapramāṇalakṣaṇasyābhāvaṃ pratipādya viśeṣalakṣaṇasyāpy abhāvaṃ pratipādayituṃ tatpratibhāsiniś ce[85.25]tyādinopakramate
GSP28dhebta_u:3285: ekarūpābhāve kathaṃ tattvādhyavasāyaḥ syāt sarveṣām ity āśaṅkyānyathaivāsyopapattim upasaṃhāravyājena darśayan7 āha -- tasmād i[86.3]tyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:3287: tena nirantarasya sadṛśasyāparasya bhāva[86.3]s tannirantaranibandhanety arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3289: ākārasāmyamātreṇāpahṛtaṃ prakaraṇāt yathātvaniścayāyogyīkṛtaṃ hṛdayaṃ [86.4] ceto yeṣāṃ teṣām /
GSP28dhebta_u:3290: nanu yadi ākārasya sāmyaṃ8 sādṛśyaṃ nāma tvanmate kiñcit syāt tanmātrāpahṛtahṛdayāḥ pratyabhijānīyuḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3292: tat katham evam uktam ity āha na ce[86.8]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3297: trayāṇām api rūpāṇāṃ pramāṇasiddhatvāt [38a] 1svataṃtrahetur iyaṃ vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ [87.7] /
GSP28dhebta_u:3299: tāvad asya bādhakatvaṃ na bhavati yāvat pratyabhijñānasyāprāmāṇyaṃ na siddhyati,
GSP28dhebta_u:3300: anyathā anenaiva bādhyamānaviṣayatvād asya kathaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ yena bādhakatvaṃ syāt?
GSP28dhebta_u:3301: tāvac ca tasyāprāmāṇyaṃ nopapadyate yāvad anumānasyāsya prāmāṇyasiddhyābodhakatvaṃ na si2ddhyati /
GSP28dhebta_u:3302: itarathā bādhavarjitatvādilakṣaṇasambhave prāmāṇyāpracyutir itītaretarāśrayatvaṃ doṣa ity āśaṅkyamānam āha nāpī[87.10]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3303: anumāna[87.11]śabdenopacārāl liṅgam abhipretya svasādhyapratibandhād i[87.12]tyādy uktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:3304: yadi vā liṅgasyety adhyāhāryam avacane ca pramāṇalakṣaṇayukte bādhasambhave tallakṣaṇam eva dūṣitaṃ syād iti sarvatrānāśvāsa ity ābhi3prāyaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:3305: {p. 330} naivaṃ brūmahe [87.17] kintu pratyakṣābhāsā satī cārthād avatiṣṭhate /
GSP28dhebta_u:3306: anumānasya virodho bādhas tam aśruvānā [87.20] vyāpnuvatī bhajamāneti yāvat /
GSP28dhebta_u:3307: ākārasya [87.20] rūpasya sāmānyād[114][87.20] ekatāṃ [87.20] tattvaṃ[115]pratīyatī [87.21] niścinvatī /
GSP28dhebta_u:3314: atha kiṃ “na ca sa pakṣe kvacid vartata [88.19]” ity asiddhatve kāraṇam idam uktam?
GSP28dhebta_u:3315: evañ cet na tarhīyantaṃ kālaṃ bhavān buddhavān asiddhalakṣaṇam,
GSP28dhebta_u:3317: yuktam avādīd idaṃ bhavān yadi paraṃ tadāyam asiddho hetur i[88.18]ti vaditur abhiprāyaṃ nājñāsīt /
GSP28dhebta_u:3318: ayaṃ khalv asyābhiprāyaḥ 5pratyabhijñā nāma vikalpaviśeṣa eṣaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3319: sa ca vikalpasya viṣayo yaḥ śabdasya viṣayaḥ,
GSP28dhebta_u:3321: sa ca śabdasya viṣayo yaḥ saṃketasya viṣayaḥ,
GSP28dhebta_u:3323: na cāsāmārthyavaiyarthyābhyāṃ svalakṣaṇātmani saṃketaḥ kartum śakyata iti kathaṃ vastu6to bhāvāḥ kecid abhi(pi)
GSP28dhebta_u:3328: yad yat pratyabhijñāyate tat tat pūrvāparayoḥ kālayor ekasvabhāvaṃ yathedam ititathāgatān pratipādayitum aśakyatvāt vyāptyasiddhyānaikāntikaś cāyam iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3329: prauḍhavāditayā siddhim abhyupagamyāpi dūṣaṇāntarābhidhitsayā pravṛtta7sya siddhāntavādino na ce[88.19]tyādivākyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:3330: yad vā dūṣaṇāntaram anvācinvann āha -- na ce[88.19]ti /

GSP28dhebta_u:3337: prakṛte tava kim āyātam ity āha -- tadvad i[89.10]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3338: taiḥ [89.12] bījādibhiḥ anekānta iti maulasya hetor iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:3339: {p. 331} na saha[89.22]śabdo yugapadarthavṛttirācāryeṇeṣṭo 'pi tu sahodaravad ekārthavṛttiḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3340: api tu ekārthakaraṇam api [114.19] yadvarṇam iti kiṃ sahakārilakṣaṇaparvaṇi pratipādayiṣyate /

GSP28dhebta_u:3343: tat kathaṃ “sahakāriṣu yugapatkaraṇaśīleṣu” [89.22] ity etadbhaṭṭārcaṭo vyācaṣṭa iti cet,
GSP28dhebta_u:3345: na hi sahaśabdasya etad vyākhyānaṃ yugapad ity api tu bhāvikāraṇānabhyupagame avaśyam ekārthakāriṇām ekadā karaṇam ity ekārthaṃ buddhāvāropya vāstavaṃ rūpam idam anūditam /
GSP28dhebta_u:3347: ekārthakāritvam eva tu lakṣaṇaṃ na tu yugapatkaraṇam avaśyaṃbhāvyapi vyabhicārāt /

GSP28dhebta_u:3368: ukte sati kim nāma pratīyatām iti tatsvabhāvasya jananād ity asyānaikāntikatve maulasyāpi tathātvamanivāryam iti parasyāśayaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3369: na kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥ syād i[92.18]ti prasaṅge kāryābhedasya bādhake pareṇokte katham etat tadbādhakaṃ bhavatīty āśaṃkyāha evaṃ manyata [92.29] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3374: yad anekasmād bhavatānekena bhavitavyam i[93.4]ti ekajātīyāpekṣayoktam na tu kāryamātrāpekṣayā,
GSP28dhebta_u:3379: dharmavacanasya saṃkaraśabdasya bhāvād asaṃkarād a[93.23]sāṃkaryād ity arthaḥ /

GSP28dhebta_u:3391: yadi vā vitarke nuśabdaḥ kiṃśabdas tu praśne /

GSP28dhebta_u:3395: sa eva svātantryaparijihīrṣayānaiyāyikapravaravacanena saṃspandayann āha āha ce[94.18]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3400: teṣām avāntarasāmagrībhedād bheda iti pratipādayituṃ teṣām i[94.20]tyādinopakramate /

GSP28dhebta_u:3414: na cakṣurāder niyamena vyāpāra [95.4] ity arthāt /

GSP28dhebta_u:3422: svasaṃtativyavasthaiva kuto yena tatpatitakāryaprasūtinimittaṃ [95.7] jñātavyam ity apekṣāyāṃ yojyam /

GSP28dhebta_u:3482: co [96.6] vyaktam etad ity asminn arthe /

GSP28dhebta_u:3495: ucyate / tasya pṛthu[96.15]śabdena viśeṣaṇasamāsaṃ kṛtvā tasyodarā[96.15]dīti tatpuruṣaṃ vidhāya tad iva tasyeva vākāro [96.15] yasyeti bahuvṛīhiḥ kāryaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3496: ādiśabdāt tadavayavāntaraviśeṣasya bhinnajātīyasya kambugrīvāde5r vā saṃgrahaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3497: sūtrāt ta[96.17]syaiva ghaṭasya [96.18] cakrāder vibhaktaḥ svabhāvo bhvatīti [96.21] sambandhaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3502: anyad eva sūtrasāhi6tyepi tayoḥ kathaṃ tajjananasvabhāva[tva]m ity āha tannirapekṣe[96.20]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3505: tayoḥ katham ity apekṣāyāṃ sūtrakāraṇopahitaviśeṣayor i[96.20]ti hetubhāvena viśeṣaṇapadam idaṃ yojyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:3506: nirdiṣṭa7kāraṇābhiprāyeṇa kāraṇatraya[96.24]grahaṇaṃ na tu ghaṭasya trīṇy eva kāraṇāni /
GSP28dhebta_u:3508: bhāvaviśeṣāḥ kāryāṇāṃ viśiṣṭāḥ svabhāvās teṣām asaṃkaro '[96.24]sāṅkaryam /
GSP28dhebta_u:3509: tatra yadi te kulālādayah pratyekaṃ janakāḥ syus tadānukrāntakāraṇatrayajanya [96.21] ity ucyeta /
GSP28dhebta_u:3510: tathāpi kathaṃ sarvataḥ samutpa8dyamānasyākhaṇḍātmanaḥ kāryasyāyaṃ viśeṣo 'smād ayañ cāsmād iti vyavasthāpyata ity āśaṃkyāh tasya caikaike[96.25]tyādi
GSP28dhebta_u:3511: ito 'stu kāryasya tatsāmagrībhūtasakalajanyatvaṃ tadgatasya tu tatadviśeṣasya kathaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:3514: [40b] 1 anenaitad darśayati -- naikasyām eva sāmagryāṃ tasminn evākhaṇḍātmani kārye

GSP28dhebta_u:3520: teṣām apy evaṃ 2vivecanena kiṃ prayojanam ity āha yata [96.29] iti /

GSP28dhebta_u:3530: anena “tajjanitaviśeṣabhedasye“ti mūlasya kārya[97.17]padaviśeṣaṇasya bahuvrīhau kartavye vigraho darśitaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3532: ne[97.26]ty anuvartate4 na yuktaṃ [97.28] nārhatīti cārthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3533: hetau śānaco vidhānāt tadrūpavikalārthasāmarthyeno[97.28]tpādād iti tadrūpānukārī(rā)
GSP28dhebta_u:3535: tathāpi kasmān na yuktam ity apekṣāyām āha -- bhrāntate[98.1]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3540: atha vijñānopajanane kim indriyādīni svalakṣaṇāntarāntarāprasavadharmāṇyapetasaṃtānāny eva yenaikasyaiva kāryasya karaṇam eṣām upavarṇyate /

GSP28dhebta_u:3545: athaikam upādānam itaratsahakārikāraṇam abhisandhāya ekasāmagrīty uktaṃ na tad api caturasram,
GSP28dhebta_u:3546: tasyā apy avāntarasāmagryāḥ kiṃ tadupādānopādeyasyāiva kṣaṇasya prasavaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3548: haṃta tad api sarvaṃ svaṃ svam upādānam apekṣyopādeyam eveti tad avastho doṣa iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3550: eva ekasāmagrīśabdārthaḥ kaivalaṃ bodhe yatraḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3551: ekam upādānaṃ sad evetaratsahakārikāraṇasad eva vyāpriyate yadā tadā ekasyaiva vijñānasya
GSP28dhebta_u:3552: manaskāropādānasya cakṣurādisahakārikāraṇasyaiva sata utpa8ttir na tu cakṣuḥkṣaṇasyaivaṃbhūtasya
GSP28dhebta_u:3553: sa[ta] utpattir api tu cakṣur upādānasya manaskārādisahakārikāraṇasya sata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3555: atra samudāyārtho manaskāropādānakāraṇacakṣurādisahakārikāraṇātmikā satī sāmagryekam eva kāryaṃ janayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:3556: tadaivānyajjanayantī tu naivam ātmikā satī ja[41a] 1nayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:3560: ata evaiṣām āntarasāmagrībhedaḥ kṛtaḥ parasparato bheda ity uktaṃ purastād iti sarvam avadātam /
GSP28dhebta_u:3562: na ca sāmagrīmātrāpekṣayāpīty āha paramārthatas tv i[98.6]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3563: tatsāmarthyantargatānā2m i[98.7]ti sā ca sā cakṣurādisahakārikāraṇātmikā sāmagrī
GSP28dhebta_u:3564: ceti tathā yatropādānabhāvenāntargatānām antarbhūtānāṃ yatra sāmagryāṃ sahakāritvena
GSP28dhebta_u:3567: kāryāntarasye[98.8]ti sopādeyakṣaṇāpekṣayā tadvijñānaṃ cakṣuṣaḥ kāryāntaram evam anyasyāpy anyat tasya kāryāntarasyāpi prārambhād ity anuvartate 3anekakāryakartṛtvam iti ra(ca)
GSP28dhebta_u:3568: śeṣaḥ kāryaḥ anyathā kasmin sādhye pañcamīyaṃ hetubhāvam abhidadhyāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:3570: tadā [98.10] tadvad anekapratyayajanitam apī[98.9]ty ekam ity asyānuvṛttes tathānekapratyayajanitam ekam api nāstīty arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3573: āha / 4yadi vā paramārthataḥ kāraṇānekatvāt kāryānekatvopagame 'pi na kācit kṣatir i[98.9]ti sambandhaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3574: kasmān na kṣatir ity āha -- tatsāmagryantargatānām i[98.7]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3578: saṃprati prakṛtam upasaṃharann āha tata [98.10] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3580: atha siddhasādhanatvaṃ hetoḥ ko doṣa iti cet /
GSP28dhebta_u:3581: tad etaddharmottarapradīpe 'smābhir vivecitaṃ vistarataś ca svayūthyavicāra ity āstāṃ tāvad iha /
GSP28dhebta_u:3582: dravya[98.16]śabdena dravati paryāyān gacchatīti vyutpāttyā dharmo pariṇāminityo vivakṣitaḥ 6paryāyaśabdena ca pari samantādetyeti dravyam iti vyutpattyā dharmāḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3584: ghaṭo dravyaṃ rūpādayaḥ [98.19] paryāyā iti dravyaparyāyayor etad udāharaṇam itiḥ saṃkhyābheda[98.19]syākāraṃ darśayati dvitīyas tu saṃjñābhedasya
GSP28dhebta_u:3587: iti7nā [98.23] kāryabhedasya svarūpam āha itir a[98.24]nantaroktabhedābhedaṃ pratyavamṛṣati /
GSP28dhebta_u:3588: cakṣurādīnām abhinno ya ātmā ekakāryajanakaḥ sāmānyabhūtas tajjanyatā tasya [98.26] /
GSP28dhebta_u:3591: dhakatvaṃ pratijñāya viśeṣeṇedānīṃ darśayitum āha -- saṃkhyābhedas tāvad i[99.7]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3593: bahuvacanaṃ ca “yuṣmadi gurāv ekapām” ity anena /
GSP28dhebta_u:3597: atraiva vaktavyā[41b] 1ntaram uccinvann āha vrīhaya [99.12] iti cet yatra bahuvacanaṃ “jātyākhyāyām ekasmin bahuvacanam anyatarasyām” [Pā.1.2.58] ity anena /
GSP28dhebta_u:3598: na ca paryāyarūpeṇa bhidyanta [99.16] iti bruvatā ca yadi saṃkhyābhedo 'nekatvasya sādhakaḥ syāt tadā tadabhedopy ekatvasya sādhakaḥ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:3600: na caivaṃ tasmāt saṃkhyābhedo na samartho 'nekatvaṃ sādhayitum iti darśitaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:3602: anena saṃjñābhedād ity asya saṃdigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttyānaikāntikatvaṃ darśitam /
GSP28dhebta_u:3603: saṃprati sādhāraṇānaikāntikatvam api darśayann āha ekasminn api ceti[99.19] atra gajanimīlikayā pūrvadoṣo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3607: 3sarvadaikarūpeṇāvasthānaṃ kūṭasthanityatā tayā [99.28] tattadavasthārūpeṇa pariṇamato 'vasthānaṃ pariṇāmanityatā tadupagamāt [100.1] sā ca [100.1] pariṇāmanityatā /
GSP28dhebta_u:3616: vibhaktapariṇāmeṣv i[100.12]ti pāṭhe vibhaktaḥ pariṇāmo yeṣām iti vigrahaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3617: vibhakto viśiṣtakāryakāritvena niyukta iti cārtha iti pūrve nibandhakṛto vyācakhyuḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3618: idānīm api kecit paṇḍitāṃmanyā anenaiva pāṭhena katham api vyācakṣate /
GSP28dhebta_u:3620: na hy ayaṃ vibhaktaśabdo viśiṣṭakāryakāritvena niyuktaṃ vakti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3622: kiñ ca kim asya śabdadāridyaṃ yena viśiṣṭakāryakāripariṇāmeṣv iti vaktavyaṃ vihāya idam īdṛśam avācakam ācakṣīta /
GSP28dhebta_u:3623: sarva eva ca pariṇāmas tadanyakāryāpekṣayā viśiṣṭakāryakārīti ko 'nyasmād a6sya paṭādipariṇāmasya viśeṣaḥ,
GSP28dhebta_u:3628: paraprasiddhyā cedam ucyate tac ca dīrghatvākhyam utpādyam atra vivakṣitam /
GSP28dhebta_u:3629: tatra vibhaktaṃ vibhāgena7 vyavasthāpitam parimāṇam yeṣāṃ paṭādīnāṃ teṣu vistāriteṣu dīrghīkṛteṣv iti yāvat /
GSP28dhebta_u:3630: vibhaktāyām ādikarpaṭādayaḥ kiñcid āvṛṇvate kiñcic ca dhārayanti kiñcid upabadhnantīti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3636: bhavet kāryam iti tu pāpīyān pāṭhaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3637: yadi8 parasparopādānāhitarūpaviśeṣas tatsāmagryantargataḥ sarva eva kṣaṇaḥ pratyekaṃ samartha utpadyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:3638: yato vijñānādiprasūtis tena tāvad avaśyaṃ jñānajananasvabhāvenaiva bhāvyam,
GSP28dhebta_u:3640: na tu parasparaviruddhatadatajjananasvabhāvena bhedaprasaṅgādity abhiprāyavān paraścodayann āha nanv i[100.24]tyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:3641: kathaṃ tadanyakārya[42a]1saṃbhava [100.26] iti bruvataś cāyam abhiprāyaḥ --
GSP28dhebta_u:3647: teṣāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ sattā tadā[na]ntaryeṇa darśanaṃ [101.5] tasmāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:3648: nanu tatsannidhau vijñānalakṣaṇakāryadarśanāt vijñānasyaiva 2janaka ity avadhāraṇāt tadavasthe doṣa kasmād idam ucyata ity āha tatre[101.5]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:3649: anainaitad āha dharmamātrasya saṃdehād ayogavyavaccheda evātra nyāyaprāpto nānyayogavyavaccheda iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3650: nanu ca yena rūpeṇa vijñānaṃ vijñānaṃ janayati yadi tenaikarūpeṇaiva rūpaṃ janayati tadā tenāvaśyaṃ tadvijñānavadbodhātmanā bhāvyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:3651: atha tadanyena rūpe3ṇa janayati tarhi viruddharūpadvayānuṣaṅga ity āśaṅkyāha na cāta [101.7] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3653: kasmān na syād ity āha -- ekasyaive[101.7]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3655: anenaitad darśayati ekenaiva rūpeṇa tattajjanayati 4kevalaṃ tad ekaṃ rūpamīdṛgvijñānāvijñānajananam iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3656: etad uktaṃ bhavati tatsāmagryantargatānāṃ sarveṣām eva kṣaṇānāṃ svahetubhir idaṃ rūpam upanītaṃ yaduta yūṣmatprāgbhāve 'nekenaiva bodhābodhātmakena kāryeṇa janitavyam iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3657: evaṃ tarhi vijnānābhinnahetujatvena {p. 340} sukhādīnāṃ bodhātmakatvaṃ duḥkhasādha[katva]māpanīya5(pa)nnam /
GSP28dhebta_u:3658: tatrāpi hīdaṃ śakyate vaktuṃ proṣitāgatapriyaputrādikṣaṇasya svahetusamūhād eva tathābhūtaṃ rūpam upa(da)
GSP28dhebta_u:3659: pādi yena vijñānam avijñānātmakaṃ ca sukham anyac ca janayatīti śuddhād rūpe(?)
GSP28dhebta_u:3661: tadviśeṣavadviśeṣākhyāne 'smābhih parihṛtam iti tata evanugantavyam iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3662: pūrvam avadhīritāvadhāraṇanirūpeṇā6ktāv uktam adhunā puraskṛtāvadhāraṇoktāv iti bhedo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3667: bhinnapravṛttinimittayor ekasminn arthe vṛttiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam teṣāṃ tannimittānāṃ tadayogād ekatraiva vṛttyanupapatteḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3671: pratibandhābhāva eva kuta ity āha -- tadgrāhaketi tadabhāvam eva pratipādayitum āha pratyakṣata [101.18] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3673: pratyakṣeṇaivam upalambhān na tāvat pratyakṣaṃ tatpratibandhasādhakam ity arthād darśitam /
GSP28dhebta_u:3674: yenānumānena kāryabhedasya kāraṇānekatvapratibandhaḥ sādhyate tatrāpi [101.20] etac caikasāmagryantargataviśiṣṭaikaikakāraṇāpekṣayā
GSP28dhebta_u:3675: draṣṭavyam na tu kāraṇamātrāpekṣayā kalāpāt kalāpotpatter iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3678: asmābhir abhyupetaṃ syāt pramāṇopapannaṃ tadā dharmisvabhāvatayaiva taducyetety abhiprāyeṇoktam
GSP28dhebta_u:3681: svabhāvatām anubhavati tad eva paraṃ bhidyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:3682: na tv asau dharmīti iti[102.3]r hetau /
GSP28dhebta_u:3683: ekaṃ kāryaṃ yasyānekasya tad ekakāryaṃ tasya bhāvas tattā [102.4] eka2kāryakāritvaṃ na syād ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3684: tasyaiva kāryasya yadātmapuraskāreṇa dharmiparyāyavyavasthā tena bhedād evaikarūpatvābhāvād iti samudāyārthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3685: nanu naivāsmābhir ekam anekaṃ karotīty ucyate yena tvayaivam ucyeta,
GSP28dhebta_u:3686: kintu samagrāvasthāyāṃ tadekaikam eva tadekaikam upakalpayatīty āśaṃkya na caike[102.6]tyādi prathamato yojyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:3689: etaddoṣabhayāt parasparopādānakṛtopakārāpekṣatve ceṣyamāṇe teṣām ekaikena bhāvatastāvataḥ kṣaṇasyopakārāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:3690: katham ekam anekakāryakṛn n syād iti cānena darśitam /
GSP28dhebta_u:3692: gatārtham apy etat kaṇṭhoktaṃ kurvann āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:3694: anabhyupagamād evaikasyānekakriyāvirahād uktayā nītyānekasyāpy ekakriyāvirahād iti cārtho draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3697: nanu ca ekasyānekakāritvaprakārād anekasyaivaikakāritvaprakārāt kilānyaḥ prakāro nāstī5ty abhimatam /
GSP28dhebta_u:3698: asti khalv anekam evānekaṃ karotīti prakrāntaṃ tat katham etat saṃgasyata iti cen na /
GSP28dhebta_u:3701: nyāyaprāptasyopagamād ekasyānekakriyopagamaprāpter ity abhiprāyā6t sarvam avadātam /
GSP28dhebta_u:3704: tau caikasvabhāvāv ekaṃ vastv iti katham ekasyānekakāryakāritvam anunmattena pratikṣipyata ity abhiprāyavān āha dravye[102.13]tyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:3706: anyathā yadi 7vastuno 'nyaḥ svabhāvaḥ syāt tasya [102.15] vastunaḥ evaṃ svabhāvasyāpy
GSP28dhebta_u:3707: avastutāprasaṅgādity api draṣṭavyam yenābhiprāyeṇa kathaṃ nonmattaḥ [102.14] ity
GSP28dhebta_u:3708: avādīt tam idānīṃ sphuṭayann āha ekasvabhāvatve ce[102.16]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3709: yadā hi tūlapiṇḍādidravyaṃ dvipiṇḍakadravyanirmāṇasamaya eva kākatālīyanyāyena pavanāvadhūtatūlāṃśuprabhṛtinā
GSP28dhebta_u:3715: karma ca tathābhūtāṃ kriyām ekadaiva karotīti dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ samavāyikāraṇaṃvaiśeṣikair avśyaipitavyam ity abhiprāyo 'syaivaṃ vaditur avasātavyaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:3717: kintūtpanne kārye paścāt kāraṇād utpadyate ata evaikasmin kṣaṇe dravyam arūpam asparśam arasam agandham upagamyateyogaiḥ/
GSP28dhebta_u:3718: tasya tu guṇasyotpadyamānasya samavāyikāraṇaṃ tad evānantarotpannaṃ dravyaṃ na tu tatkāraṇaṃ dravyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:3719: evaṃ tāvad idam asmābhir yathā kathañcid upapāditam,
GSP28dhebta_u:3720: 2karmaṇaś caikasyeti tu saṃyogasaṃskārāpekṣayopapādayituṃ śakyate na punaḥ saṃyogavibhāgāpekṣayā /
GSP28dhebta_u:3721: na hi kutaścid api karmaṇo yugapat saṃyogavibhāgāv utpadyete kintu prathamaṃ vibhāgas tataḥ prācyasaṃyogavināśas
GSP28dhebta_u:3727: anyathā kim asti karma kim asti saṃyogādir yenaivam ucyeta /
GSP28dhebta_u:3729: abhinnakālaṃ ca kāryaṃ vicārayituṃ prakṛtaṃ na tu bhinnakālam iti kiṃ bahunā /
GSP28dhebta_u:3730: etac cavaiśeṣikaśailīmanupālayanto yadi kecana nipuṇā manīṣiṇo yathāśruti samarthaya4nti kāmaṃ samarthayantu na no hāniḥ kācid api tu mahāneva lābha iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3732: na tu sajātīyā vijātīyāḥ samastā vyakrīrvyaśnuvīrann i[102.25]ty arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3736: deśakālasvabhāvabhedānāṃ madhye deśakālābhedasyābhedasādhane sādhāraṇānaikāntikatvaṃ pratipādayann āha tathāhī[103.4]tyādi5 /
GSP28dhebta_u:3739: dvitīyaḥ punar api [103.6] avadhāraṇe rūpatety asmāt paro draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3740: anuvṛttivyāvṛttirūpate[103.6]ti dravyasyānuvṛttirūpatā paryāyāṇāṃ vyāvṛttirūpateti yathākramaṃ yojyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:3741: pratyekam iti prativastvaty artho draṣṭavyaḥ na tu pratyātmeti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3743: tad ayam artho yadi prativastu dravyaparyāyayor anuvṛttivyāvṛttirūpataivopagamyata ity anyonyavyāvṛttisvabhāvadvayāviṣṭaṃ ghaṭapaṭavatpadārthadvayaṃ syān na tv ekaṃ dvirūpam /
GSP28dhebta_u:3746: padārthadvayasyaiva nyāya7prāptatvāt svabhāvābhedasyaivaṃ siddhatvād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3747: anuvṛttivyāvṛttyos tatsvabhāvatvam upetyaitad uktam etad eva tu nāstīti darśayann
GSP28dhebta_u:3749: nimittam ihābhipretam yad anantaraṃ vyaktīkariṣyate tatas tayos tatsvabhāvatvāyogāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:3750: tatsvābhāvatvam evānayoḥ kathaṃ na yujya8te yanaivam ucyata ity āha -- bhāvatvene[103.11]ti bhāvatvena kriyātvena /
GSP28dhebta_u:3753: utpattimān dharmas tattvena bhavitā dharmī tadadhīnatvāt na tu tattvād iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3754: yady ekakāryakartṛtvād ekatvaṃ tarhi anekakāryakartṛtvād anekatvaṃ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:3756: gāt na caivam iṣṭaṃ yuktaṃ vā tasmād etad api viparyaye bādha[43b] 1kābhāvān na vaktum ucitam ity abhiprāyavān āha ekasyāpīti [103.22] /
GSP28dhebta_u:3757: ekasyāpy aneke[103.24]tyādi bruvataḥ pūrvavad abhiprāyo boddhavyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3760: viṣayabhedaṃ prakṛtatvāt śabdānām abhidheyalakṣaṇaviṣayabhedaṃ [103.26] bruvāṇaṃ [103.26] pratyabhihitam a[103.26]nantaram
GSP28dhebta_u:3761: eva / ekatrāpī[103.27]ti bruvataś ca2 pūrvavadabhiprāyo jñeyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3762: anantaroktayā vacanabhaṅgyā saṃdigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttyānaikāntikatvaṃ sūcayitvā sampratyekavijñānaviṣayatvād ity asya sādhāraṇānaikāntikatvaṃ khyāpayitum āha bahūnāñ ceti [104.1] /
GSP28dhebta_u:3763: nanu yady ekaṃ dvirūpanneṣyate kathaṃ tarhi tad ekaṃ vijñānaṃ bodharūpaṃ nīlākāraṃ cotpadyata ity ucyata iti parasya vacanam āśaṃkyā3ha[123]kiṃtv iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3765: anena vyāvṛttibhedam upādāya tathocyate na tu vāstavaṃ dvairupyam iti darśitam /
GSP28dhebta_u:3768: dṛṣṭāntam eva vighaṭayann āha sa hī[104.8]tyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:3775: anenaiva saṃmūrcchitatvābhāvena śabalarūpatvāsiddheḥ sādhanaśūnyo dṛṣṭānta iti darśitam /
GSP28dhebta_u:3776: tathā cāvyavasthitaparamāṇupraca5yābhiprayeṇa bhāgaśabdapravṛttir na tu paraprasiddhā tasyāvayavābhiprāyeṇa avayavyārambhasyānabhyupagamāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:3777: saṃprati bhavatu narasiṃhabhāgābhyāṃ narasiṃhāvayavino nirmāṇaṃ tathāpi tasya śabalarūpatvāsiddheḥ sādhanaśūnya eva dṛṣṭānta iti darśanād darśayitum āha jātyantaraṃ ce[104.10]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3778: tāsu tā6su hy avasthāsu sa evāyaṃ nara ity anuvṛttipratyayahetor naratvajāter ūrdhvatāsāmānyaśabdābhilāpyāyās
GSP28dhebta_u:3779: tāsu cāvasthāsu siṃhaḥ siṃha ity anugābhipratyayahetoḥ siṃhatvajātes tathābhūtāyā
GSP28dhebta_u:3780: anyā tāsu tāsvavasthāsu sa evāyaṃ narasiṃha ity anuvṛttapratyayahetubhūtā tathābhūtaiva
GSP28dhebta_u:3782: 7sa [104.10] iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdeśaś ca tasya tadvataś cābhedavivakṣayā samudāyavivakṣayā vā draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3783: digambaramatasya ca prakṛtatvāt evaṃ vyākhyāyate tena hi tiryaksāmānyam neṣṭam upariṣṭāc ca etadbhaṭṭārcaṭenāpi sphuṭayiṣyate
GSP28dhebta_u:3787: ayam asyāśayo yadi saṃmūrcchitatvaṃ tyaktvā yathā kathañcid anekarūpatvenāpi śabalarūpatocyate tathāpy ekatvābhāvasya nyāyaprāptatvān naikasya (śabalarūpatocyate) /
GSP28dhebta_u:3790: avaśyaṃ hi śābalyam icchatā vaicitryaṃ nānārūpatvam eṣtavyam ity abhiprāyeṇāha (vaicitryaṃ nānārūpatvam eṣtavyam ity abhiprāyeṇāha[125])
GSP28dhebta_u:3793: papadyate kathaṃ tarhi lokaḥ śabalam idam iti manyata ity āśaṃkyāha kevalam i[104.13]tyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:3802: dharmaś ca pūrvaṃ kṛtakavicāreṇa pāramārthiko nirastas tadapekṣo dharmy api vāstavo vyudasta ity abhiprāyeṇa dharmadharmīṇor niṣedhād i[104.18]ty uktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:3803: {p. 344} anantaroktam arthajātaṃ sātirekaṃ svakrtābhiḥ kārikābhiḥ pratipādayituṃ paramukheṇāha -- āha ce [104.20]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3807: tatra saṃjñābhedasya tāvad bhedakatvaṃ pratibadhnann āha indriye[104.23]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3810: bahuvacanena vyāptim āha tat tasmāt kena [104.23] hetunā /
GSP28dhebta_u:3815: āśayo yadi punaḥ śabdā vastuvṛttyā indriyajñānānīva bāhyaviṣayā abhaviṣyan niyatam
GSP28dhebta_u:3816: ime anyonyabhinnarūpāḥ santo locanādicetāṃsīva rūpādīny arthān svasvaviṣayā5n abhetsyanta iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3819: abhidhānābhidheyayor abhedavivakṣāyām ityādivacanād i[104.25]tyādivacanapratipāditād arthād ity artho 'vasātavyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3821: tat ta[104.28]smād yadi saṃjñābhedād bhedaḥ [104.28] kalpitasyaiva bhedo bhaved iti yo6jyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:3822: kalpitabhede kiṃ vastubhedo na bhavatīty āha vyāvṛttibheda [105.1] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3823: arthākṣiptam eva kaṃṭhoktaṃ kurvann āha na vastuna [105.1] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3824: nanu kim ekadvivacanabahuvacanāny eva saṃkhyā yena tadbhedaḥ saṃkhyābhedaḥ (saṃkhyābhe[126]da) ucyeta /
GSP28dhebta_u:3827: vaikatvādirūpā saṃkhyā tadabhidhāyakaṃ tu vacanam ata eva pāṇiniḥ7 “bahuṣu bahuvacanāma“(Pā. 1.4.21)
GSP28dhebta_u:3829: syād evaitat yady ekādivyavahārahetuḥ saṃkhyā ekadravyānekadravyā vā pramāṇabādhitā na syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:3831: asti tu tathābhūtasaṅketānurodhād ekādivacanam evaikādivyavahāranibandhaham ity anenābhiprāyeṇoktam naivānyo mato vacanabheda [105.2] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3834: tato [105.3] vacanabhedātmakā8t saṃkhyābhedāt kalpitasya [105.3] kalpanāviparivartino rūpasya na tu vastuna [105.4] iti dūrastham iha saṃbandhanīyam
GSP28dhebta_u:3837: kutaḥ punaḥ siddham etad vacanabhedātmakaḥ saṃkhyābhedaḥ,
GSP28dhebta_u:3838: sa cābhedaka ity āha -- yeṣām i[105.4]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3839: atrāpi vācyavācakayor abhedavivakṣayā ityādi pratipādi[44b] 1ta evetyādiśabdenokto draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3846: yadi vā tadātmakā iti hetubhāvena viśeṣaṇaṃ tena tadātmakatvāt kiṃ kasmād dravyāvināśe nāśina [105.6] ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3849: nirācikīrṣoḥ pa2rasya vacanamā[śaṅkamā]na āha naṣṭā [105.7] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3855: pṛcchataś cāyam abhiprāyo yaś.anyasvabhāvatā teṣāṃ bhavet svabhāvabhedena svabhāvābheda eva na bhaved iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3857: siddhāntavādyevaitad doṣadarśino 'nyasvabhāvatāniṣedham āśaṃkamāna āha na ced iti [105.8] /
GSP28dhebta_u:3860: paryāyāḥ paryāyarūpeṇa naṣṭā na dharmirūpeṇety evam ātmanā kathaṃ nāśaḥ [105.8] /
GSP28dhebta_u:3861: no ced iti tu kvacit pāṭhaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3862: tatrāpi naṣṭāḥ paryāyarūpeṇa dravyasvabhāvena no4 cet [105.8] na yadi prakṛtāś ca paryāyāḥ kartṛkatvenābhisaṃbadhyante /
GSP28dhebta_u:3863: etad āśaṃkya siddhānty evāha kim anyarūpatā teṣāṃ i[105.8]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3865: dravyasvabhāvād anyasvarūpatā teṣāṃ kim astīty arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3867: anugāmirūpaṃ dravyam udayavyayayoginas tu paryāyā aikātmyañ ca dravyaparyā5yāṇām ahrīkaiḥ kiṃ neṣtaṃ?
GSP28dhebta_u:3873: bhedanibandhanepi kena kāraṇena te [105.10] paryāyāḥ dravyātmakā iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3874: viruddhdharmā6dhyāsa eva kuta ity āha -- dravyātmani sthite paścādbhavanta [105.9] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3875: hetau śaturvidhānāc ca paścād bhāvād ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3877: {p. 346} anena ca prakāradvayena tādātmyahāpanena bhinnarūpāṇāṃ eṣāṃ tena saha sambandhābhāvāt taddharmatvam eva ca na syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:3878: tataś ca prakṛtakṛtidarśitam atraiva vaktavyāntaraṃ samuñcinvann āha bhūta... kim iti [105.10] tatra dravye bhūtaṃ jātaṃ kiṃ?
GSP28dhebta_u:3879: dravyaparyāyayor aikātmyena dravyasthitau paryāyāṇām api niyatā sthitir iti na kiñcid bhūtam ity abhisandhiḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3881: abhiprāyam aviduṣaḥ parasya vacanam āśaṃkamāna āha bhede[105.11]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3882: bhidyanta iti bhedāḥ paryāyā eva 8tadrūpaṃ bhūtaṃ yadāṣyate [105.11] /
GSP28dhebta_u:3884: hiravadhāraṇe bhinnam ity asmāt paro draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3888: sthite ca tasmin bhedarūpaṃ bhūtam iti ceti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3889: asaṃbaddhatvam evāsya pūrvasāmarthyoktaṃ kaṇṭhoktaṃ kurvann āha[128]evam i[105.14]ti naṣṭaṃ ca tad an[45a] 1ṣṭaṃ ceti tathā /
GSP28dhebta_u:3891: tadaitat prasajyata iti pārśvasthasyāviditaprastāvasya praśnam āśaṃkyāha -- dravye[105.15]tyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:3892: yasmād uktayā nītyā lakṣaṇabheda eva siddhas tataḥ [105.16] tasmāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:3894: kāryabhedāt tayoḥ svabhāvasya bhedo yadi bhavet [105.17] /
GSP28dhebta_u:3895: tathā sati [105.17] svabhāvabhede sati avaśyaṃ hi bhedam icchatā svabhāvabheda evaiṣṭavyo 'nyathā bhedāsiddheḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3896: sati 2caivaṃ kim akiñcitkaraḥ kāryabhedo bhedasiddhyartham ucyata iti paraṃ śikṣayann āha svabhāvasyaive[105.19]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3897: nanu kāryabhedo 'bhinnasya svabhāvasya bhedaka iti kiñcitkara evāpi(evopa)
GSP28dhebta_u:3898: nyāsārho 'pi ca tat kim evam ucyata ityāsaṃkyāha na hi [105.20] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3899: hir yasmāt kāryāṇāṃ bhedaḥ paścāt prakaraṇāt svahetvāgatasyābhinnasvabhāvasya paścādbhavanasvabhāvasya
GSP28dhebta_u:3900: tasyaiva svahetubalāyātasyābhinnasya na bhedakaḥ [105.20] hetau śaturvidhānāt paścād bhāvād ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3901: prāgbhāvī hi kāraṇaṃ tadbhinnaṃ svabhāvaṃ kuryād api,
GSP28dhebta_u:3903: paścād bhavann api kasmān na bhedaka iti?
GSP28dhebta_u:3905: nanu kāryabhedaḥ svahetusamutthaṃ svabhāvaṃ mā nāma vikārṣit tadavasthe vikārāyogāt,
GSP28dhebta_u:3906: tam eva tu vināśayi4ṣyatīty āha nāśeti [105.21] /
GSP28dhebta_u:3907: yadi cāyaṃ kāryabhedas tayoḥ svabhāvasya bhedakaḥ syāt tad ayaṃ doṣaḥ syād iti darśayann āha -- ekāntene[105.22]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3909: syād etat -- syād ayaṃ doṣo yadi bhedaḥ paścāt prakaraṇāt svahetvāvage(tvāga)
GSP28dhebta_u:3910: tasyābhinnasvabhāvasya paścād bhavansvabhāvasya tasyaiva svahetubalāyā5 tasyābhinnasya na bhedakas tayor abhinnoya(yaṃ)
GSP28dhebta_u:3912: yāvatāsty abhinnopi svabhāvas tatas tayor abhedopīty āha sa ceti [105.22] /
GSP28dhebta_u:3916: kutaḥ punar asau tayor na syād ity āha -- vibhinnābhyām i[105.23]ti parasparabhinnābhyāṃ dravyaparyāyābhyāṃ abhinnasyābhi6nnasvabhāvasya kalpitasya tasya /
GSP28dhebta_u:3924: evaṃ pañcamādāv api saiva vārtetyādinā bhinnasvabhāvasyāsambandhaniścayaparipanthinya[na]vasthā syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:3925: nanu kim a[na]vasthābhayād dṛṣṭānekasvabhāvāpalāpaḥ kartavyaḥ ity āha -- na ceti [105.27] /
GSP28dhebta_u:3926: syād etat syād ayaṃ doṣo yady abhinnasya svabhāvasya dravyaparyāyābhyāṃ bhedo 'py upagamyeta /
GSP28dhebta_u:3927: kintv abheda8 evety āha aikāntikas tv i[105.29]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3928: bhinnayor dravyaparyāyayor abhinnāsvabhāvād abheda aikāntiko yadi bhaved iti yojyam,
GSP28dhebta_u:3931: tasmād ekasmāt svabhāvād avyatirekas tayor ity arthāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:3934: ayaṃ cābhiprāyo drvyaparyā[ya]yoḥ kalpitābhinnasvabhāvayos tādātmyopagame tasya vā tayor anupraveśa eṣitavyas tayor vā tatreti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3935: tatra yadi kalpitasya svabhāvasya dravyaparyāyayor anupraveśas tadā tāv eva svarūpeṇa vyavatiṣṭheyātāṃ na tv asāv iti so 'sankathaṃ tatsambandhī syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:3936: nanu ca nāsau svabhāvas tayor upalīyamānas tadabhedā2nubhāvī kiṃ tarhi teṣām abhedasiddhyartham
GSP28dhebta_u:3937: abhinnasvabhāvo 'nyo 'bhyupagamyate ity abhiprāyasya parasya vacanam āśaṃkamāna āha teṣām i[105.24]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3938: atrāpi doṣāntaram upekṣyaivānavasthāṃ darśayann āha tathe[105.26]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3939: atha dravyaparyāyayos tasminn abhinne svabhāve 'nupraveśas tatrāha aikāntikas tv i[105.29]tyādi iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3942: kintu svata evābheda ity āha abhedasye[106.1]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3947: kasmāt punar bhedābhedāv ekātmakau na syātām ity āha anyonye[106.3]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3949: ekasya bhāvo [106.4] vidhir aparasyābhāvā niṣedho yas taddhetuko yataḥ [106.4] bhedābhedābhyāṃ dvirūpatā nāsti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3952: sa eva tu na bhedavyavasthānimittam ity āśaṃkyāha anyonyābhāvarūpāś ce[106.4]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3956: tenāyam artho yadi viruddhadharmādhyāso bhedavyavasthāṅgaṃ neṣyate,
GSP28dhebta_u:3958: evaṃ ca kathaṃ syāt evaṃ ca kasmān neṣtavyam iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3959: tadrūpāḥ santopi na bhedino [106.5] bhinnāḥ syur virodhasya bhedavyavasthāṅgatvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:3965: sarvathaiva tasya vināśaḥ kinneṣyata ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:3966: kathaṃ nāma dravyam eṣtavyam ity ākāṃkṣāyāṃ ṣikṣayann āha kūṭe[106.7]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3972: pariṇāmanityatā dravyeṣu kasmād iṣteti sāmarthyād āveditam /
GSP28dhebta_u:3973: astu tarhīṣtā kūṭasthanityatety āśaṃkyāha tad iṣṭāv i[106.9]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3975: atra doṣāntaram upekṣyaiva etad āha kinne[106.9]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3976: yathottarottarasarvaparyā8yānugāmisuvarṇatvādy ekaṃ sāmānyam iṣyate tattadbhinnadeśādisarvavyaktyanuyāyisuvarṇatvagotvādy ekaṃ kiṃ [106.10] kasmān neṣyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:3980: nanu yadi strītvasāmānyam abhipretyedam ucyate tadābhyupagama evottaram iti koyam anupayā(nuyo)
GSP28dhebta_u:3982: anyathā saṃketāvedinopi gāva iva tā api bhāryā ma[a]bhimatā vyaktyastenarūpeṇa sāmānyabhāsāṃ {p. 349} dhiyamādadhīran /
GSP28dhebta_u:3985: śobhanam uktaṃ bhavatā kevalam evaṃ vaditur abhiprāyo na samyagjñāyi /
GSP28dhebta_u:3986: ayaṃ khalv asyābhiprāyo yenopādhyavacchinnena kenacid rūpeṇa tatstrītvaṃ tasyāṃ jāyāyāṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:3987: vartamāna2m enāṃ tathopabhogāṅgaṃ nopapādayati vinaiva tāvad ātmanā jananyām api
GSP28dhebta_u:3989: sati caivaṃ tasyā api tathātvam āpadyeta;
GSP28dhebta_u:3990: evam atrāpekṣayāpy ucyamānajāyāyā api tathātvam anivāryam /
GSP28dhebta_u:3991: yady evaṃ śābaleyabāhuleyādīnām apy ekagotvādiyogād ekatvaṃ kiṃ nāpādyata iti?
GSP28dhebta_u:3993: udāharaṇa3diṅmātraṃ tūktam etad upahāsāpadeśeneti sarvam avadātam /
GSP28dhebta_u:3994: evam uktayā nityā bhedābhedāv ekādhikaraṇau na yuktāv iti pratipādyādhunā bhavetāṃ tau tathā,
GSP28dhebta_u:3995: tathāpy uktadoṣān na muktir iti pratipādayann āha bhedābhedoktadoṣāś ce[106.11]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:3996: dravyaparyāyayor bhede hy ekāntena vibhinne te syātām /
GSP28dhebta_u:3998: tathā4 suvarṇakuṇḍalādiparyāyayor aparasparātmatayā kuṇḍalādisuvarṇaviśeṣābhyāṃ tayor apratibhāsanaprasaṅgādayo doṣāḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4001: sati caivaṃ viphalo 'yam ekasya bhedābhyupaga5ma iti cārthād darśitam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4002: tayo[106.11]r bhedābhedayor iṣtau [106.11] kathaṃ vā na bhavanti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4003: pratyekaṃ bhāvān na samudāye bhavantīty āha -- pratyekam iti te [106.12] doṣāḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4004: nanu ca dṛṣṭam idaṃ yata ekaikabhāvino doṣāḥ samudāyāvasthāyāṃ na bhavantīty abhiprāyavān paraḥ prāha guḍaśceti [106.13] /
GSP28dhebta_u:4005: kevalo guḍaḥ ṣleṣmaṇor hetur nāgaraṃ śuṇṭhī 6kevalaṃ pittasya kāraṇam [106.13] /
GSP28dhebta_u:4006: militayos tv anayos tau doṣau kasmān na bhavata iti prakaraṇād draṣṭavyamadhyāhāro vā kartavyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4008: parasparopasarpaṇāśrayāt pratyayāt tadupādānasahakāriṇo 'nyad eva [106.14] tat -- kāryakāriṇaḥ kevalād guḍāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4009: kevalāc ca nāgarād bhinnam eva viśiṣtā7rthakriyākāri dravyāntaram idaṃ guḍanāgarā[106.14]khyam utpannam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4010: na tu sa eva guḍo nāgarañ ca dve ime dravye /
GSP28dhebta_u:4012: anenaitad āha -- viśiṣṭaśleṣmaharaṇādyarthakriyākāridravyāntaram idam udapādi tena pratyekabhāvī mama doṣo na bhavati /
GSP28dhebta_u:4013: bhavatas tu militāv api bhedābhedau dravyaparyāyalakṣaṇau tāv eveti kathan no(katham u?)
GSP28dhebta_u:4015: athāstu dravyāntaram idaṃ tathāpi madhuratvāt kaṭukatvāc ca kathaṃ kaphapittakṛn na bhavatīti pārśvasthasya codyam pratikṣipann āha madhuram
GSP28dhebta_u:4019: kena punar nidarśanena sarvaṃ madhuram eva(vaṃ)
GSP28dhebta_u:4020: saṃbhāvayitum ayuktam ity ata āha yathe[106.15]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4023: anena madhuratvād ity ayaṃ hetuḥ sādhāraṇānaikāntiko darśitaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4024: tīkṣṇaṃ [106.16] kaṭukam vā sarvam iti neti syād iti cānuvartanīyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4027: anenāpi kaṭukatvād ity asya sādharaṇānaikāntikatvaṃ darśayato 'yam abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4029: iva mādhuryaṃ kaṭukatvam api pippalyā ivānyad eva tena militāvasthāyāṃ na doṣadvayasambhava iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4030: yadi ca pratyekabhāvināṃ doṣāṇāṃ militāvasthāyāṃ guḍanāgarāder abhāvopadarśanenaitat pratiṣidhyate,
GSP28dhebta_u:4031: tadā pratyekabhāvināṃ doṣāṇāṃ samudāyāvasthāyām api bhāvadarśanāt kim asmad abhimataṃ cānupa(nābhyupa)
GSP28dhebta_u:4033: yadi vā samudāyāvasthāyāṃ teṣāṃ doṣāṇām asadbhāve sādhye pratyekabhāvitvād ity asya hetoḥ sādhāraṇānaikantikatvaṃ darśayitum āha -- pratyekam
GSP28dhebta_u:4034: yat pratyetyekaṃ yasya kāryasya nidānaṃ [106.17] nimittaṃ svatas tad yadi svahetubalān mibhrama[106.17]nyasahitam evādhikaraṇam utpadyate tadā kiṃ 4tatkāryakāri tatra dṛṣṭam?
GSP28dhebta_u:4035: [106.18] kṣepe kimaḥ prayogād dṛṣṭam evety arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4036: sneho hi kaphahetur ūṣṇatvaṃ ca pittakṛddṛṣṭaṃ sahitāvasthāyām api te tatkāryakāriṇī dṛṣṭe yathā amūmāṣaṅgate,
GSP28dhebta_u:4037: ata eva yathā māṣa [106.18] ity udāharati /
GSP28dhebta_u:4038: māṣo hi snigdhatvād ūṣṇavīryatvāc cobhayātmaka ubhayam eva kāryaṃ kaphapittalakṣaṇaṃ karotīti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4040: śleṣmā kasmān na jāyate kaṭukāyā api pippalyāḥ kuto na pittaṃ yenāsmad uktaṃ bhavatā vyabhicāryate /
GSP28dhebta_u:4041: tathāpy abhāve vā guḍānnāgarāc ca tau doṣau mā bhūtām iti parasya matam āśaṃkya dṛṣṭasyopapattiprakāraṃ darśayitum āha śaktyapekṣañ ce[106.19]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:4044: kiṃ tatkāryaṃ mādhuryādi guṇamātraṃ nibandhanaṃ na bhavatīti praśne 'bhyupagama evottaraṃ kurvann āha -- guṇeti [106.19] /
GSP28dhebta_u:4045: ācāraviśeṣānavacchinnaḥ kevalo mādhuryādiguṇo guṇamātraṃ tad anibandhanam [106.19] akāraṇaṃ yasya tat tathoktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4046: śaktyapekṣatvepi kāryasya tasyāḥ sarvatra bhāvāt tadavastho [doṣa] 7ity āha sarvatreti [106.20] /
GSP28dhebta_u:4047: tāsāṃ [106.20] śaktīnāṃ kiñcid eva kāryaṃ kasyacid eva janyatayā sambandhī bhavati /
GSP28dhebta_u:4048: ayam artho madhuratvāviśeṣepi kiñcid eva svahetusamudbhūtarūpaviśeṣaṃ yat tathākāryakāri na tat sarvam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4049: taddhetos tajjananaḥ svabhāvaḥ kutastya iti cet,
GSP28dhebta_u:4052: nnatvādi8doṣo hi bhedamātre prasajyamāno na bhedasya śaktiviśeam apekṣate /
GSP28dhebta_u:4053: na ca bhedasya {p. 351} viśeṣa eva saṃbhavati militāvasthāyām api tādrūpyād eva /
GSP28dhebta_u:4055: tasmād guṇamātranibandhanaṃ yatkāryaṃ tad yathā sati tasmin bhavati /
GSP28dhebta_u:4056: tathā bhedābhedamātre saṃbhavino doṣā ye te tadbhāve kathaṃ na syur iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4057: bhedābhedābhyām utpatti[47a] 1dharmatvam amīṣāṃ doṣāṇām abhyupetya sarvam idam uktam
GSP28dhebta_u:4058: adhunā tu tādātmyād eva teṣām anivāryatvam āyātam iti pratipādayituṃ guḍanāgarādau
GSP28dhebta_u:4059: pareṇa dṛṣṭāntīkṛte janyadoṣāṇām anyathaivānupapattim abhyupagacchann āha virodhī[106.24]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4061: sannidhis tasmād virodhiśunyād guḍāder janma yasya doṣasya sa tajjanmā na bhaved a[106.23]pi /
GSP28dhebta_u:4063: tu doṣaḥ, sa tu tasminnātmabhūte bhede abhede cāniṣtopi na nivartate [106.24] /
GSP28dhebta_u:4065: idam atrārthasatattvaṃ bhidyamānaṃ hi rūpaṃ bhedo viparyayeṇa cābhedaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4066: vibhinne ca te syātām ityādinā ca vastutas tadātmaka eva doṣo darśitaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4068: anya3d api dūṣaṇaṃ vastuto bhedābhedātmakam eva /
GSP28dhebta_u:4069: vyāvṛttikṛtas tu bhedo yadi bhaved bhavatu na tāvatā prakṛtakṣatir iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4070: tanmate 'vasthāntarāvayavinaḥ sattvam upetyaitad uktam idānī tu sa eva nāstīti darśayitum āha bhāgā eva ce[106.25]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4073: tena tena prakāreṇādhisti4ryagūrddhvāvasthānalakṣaṇena tattadarthakriyākāritvalakṣaṇena ca saṃniviṣtā [106.25] vyavasthitāḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4077: tadabhāvāc ca kena saha teṣāṃ bhedābhedacintā syād iti cābhipretam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4078: nanv asaty ekasminn avayavini dhāraṇākarṣane katham upapadyeyātām ity āha -- anyo 'nye[106.27]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4080: eka sāmagryadhīnatvād anyonyakāraṇādhīnāpekṣāḥ santas tathāvasthitavapuṣo yenaikasyākarṣane dhārane vānyeṣām api te bhavata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4081: na kevalaṃ dṛṣṭahetubalāt teṣāṃ tathāsthitir api tv adṛṣṭavaśād apīti darśayann āha -- karmaṇāṃ ce[106.28]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4082: lokasyāsādhāraṇacetanātmakarmaṇām api sāmarthyāt te 'vinirbhāgavarti6naḥ [106.28] parasparaṃ vibhāgena na vartante /
GSP28dhebta_u:4083: nanu cākāraṇasya karmaṇaḥ sāmarthyopavarṇanam ayuktam ity āśaṃkyāha sanniveśane[106.29]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4086: {p. 352} iti vacanāt karmabhir janitā [106.30] ity āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:4087: teṣām eva prāṇināṃ sādhāraṇair asādhārarṇavau karmabhiḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4088: tebhyaḥ [106.30] karmasya eva tadādhipatyād eveti yāvat /
GSP28dhebta_u:4090: athāsaty ekasminn avayavini ekoyaṃ ghaṭa ityādi vyapadeśaḥ kathaṃ syād ity āśaṃkyāha -- te ce[106.31]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4092: nanu caiko ghaṭa ityādi śabdajanmani śabdānuviddhe jñāne tāvatkiñcid ekatvena pratyavabhāsate
GSP28dhebta_u:4093: tad eva ca svalakṣaṇaṃ svalakṣaṇatvenādhyavasāyāt ta katham abhe8dino 'rthasyāpalāpaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:4096: ayam abhiprāyo yadi śabdagocaro 'rthaḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ syāt tadendriyaprabhavepi pratyaye tathaiva pratibhāseta /
GSP28dhebta_u:4098: na caikam eva rūpam upāyabhede 'pi bhinnākārāvabhāsi yuktam / tad uktam
GSP28dhebta_u:4100: evaṃ tarhi śabdapratyayagocara eva kiñcid ekaṃ tāvad āstām /
GSP28dhebta_u:4101: tato na sarvathaikasyābhāvaḥ sidhyatīty āha aspaṣte[107.1]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4104: ayam arthas tatrāpi jñāne ta eva bhāgā a[vi]vecitabhedāḥ pratīyante na tu tadatiriktaṃ kiñcid ekam api /
GSP28dhebta_u:4105: adhyavasāyānu2rodhena ca ta evety uktaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4106: yatau bhāgātiriktaṃ nirbhāgadṛśyam anupalabhyamānam asadvyavahāragocaraḥ tata[107.2]s tasmāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4110: punar api nirbhāgamaṅgīkṛtya siṃhāvalokitanyāyena dūṣaṇāntaram āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:4111: bhinno deṣo yasya sa cāsāv aṃśaś ceti padasaṃskāraṃ kṛtvā paścād anekaśabdena saha 3karmadhārayaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4113: ayam āśayo yadi tat sāṃśaṃ syāt,
GSP28dhebta_u:4115: na tu niraṃśaṃ sat tathā kartum utsahata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4116: nanu pratīyate tāvad ekasyānekabhinnadeśāṃśayogitā tatra kiṃ katham etad iti vimṛṣṭena /
GSP28dhebta_u:4123: ity abhiprāyavataḥ parasya vacanam āśaṅkamāna āha pratīteś cedi[107.4]ti yady apy atroktam eva dūṣaṇaṃ na nirvikalpe nāpi vikalpe jñāne tadekamanubhāsata ityadi /
GSP28dhebta_u:4127: ye paryāyāḥ sthemānaṃ [107.5] sthairyaṃ dadhataḥ pratīyante [107.5] yat tadornityam abhisaṃbandhātte 5kṣaṇadhvaṃsānubhāvinaḥ kutaḥ kasmān matā [107.5] iti yojyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4128: anenaitad āha pratītiśaraṇāś ced bhavantas tadā katham anyathā pratīyamānā anyathā anugamyanta iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4129: punaḥ parasya vacanam āśaṃkamāna āha -- anyata [107.6] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4130: anyato bādhakāt pramāṇāt tanmatā ity abhisambandhavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4131: iha prakṛte tad bādhakaṃ pamāṇaṃ samaṃ [107.6] tulya6m atrāpi taddhita ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4132: uktepi dṛśyānupalambhādau bādhake 'nyad api bādhakaṃ darśyann āha -- aikāntikāv i[107.7]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4134: tayor anyonyānupraveśamukhena bheda evābheda eva veti niyamavantāv aikāntikāu syātām /
GSP28dhebta_u:4136: athaikātmyetpi paryāyā eva bhidyante na dharmī dharme (?)
GSP28dhebta_u:4137: ca na bhidya7te na tu paryāyā ity āśaṃkyāha -- anyonyaṃ ve[107.8]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4138: viruddhadharmādhyāsasya ekatvabādhakasya bhāvād bheda eva niyato [107.8]vaśyaṃbhāvīty abhiprāyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4139: ananyatvepi nāyaṃ doṣo bhinnarūpasyāpi bhāvād iti parasya vacanam āśaṃkamāna āha tayor apī[107.9]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4140: apiśabdo bhinnakamo bheda ity asmāt paro draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4143: apiśabdadarśitam abhedam api dūṣayann āha dravye[107.12]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4148: abhede svabhāvānupraveśe tayoḥ svātmahāniḥ [107.14] dravyarūpatā paryāyarūpatā ca hīyeta,
GSP28dhebta_u:4151: ta [107.15] ity anenoktaṃ bahutvam evāha dharmī[107.16]tyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:4153: trayāṇām abhedasiddhyarthaṃ kalpyate yadi tatrāpi sa eva doṣa iti punaḥ svabhāvāntarakalpane
GSP28dhebta_u:4156: kuta evaṃ syād ity āha tattantratvād i[107.19]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4158: kayos tattantratvam ity apekṣāyām {p. 354} āha -- tad anyayor i[107.19]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4159: tasmād ekasvabhāvād anyayor dravyaparyāyayor bhedasyābhedasya ca tanmūlatvāt tattantratvaṃ pratyeyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4160: astu tarhi tasya tathātvam anekātmakatvaṃ ca vastunaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4161: na ca dṛṣṭasyānavasthayā apalāpaḥ ka3rtuṃ śakya ity āha -- na caivam i[107.20]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4165: iti[107.21]r hetau / bahubhāṣitayā alaṃ [107.21] na kiñcit /
GSP28dhebta_u:4167: avaśyamo bhā4va āvaśyakam ity asya bhāvapratyayāntatvād apṛkkaraṇasyāvaśyakam iti
GSP28dhebta_u:4168: prāpte yoyam āvaśyakam apṛthakkaraṇam i[108.1]ti prayoge sāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdeśaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:4169: saḥ katham iti tu na jāne mahānta eva praṣṭavyāḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4170: saṃyogavibhāgeṣu [108.11] kartavyeṣu anapekṣo [108.11] na kāraṇam iti rūpādivargābhiprāyeṇānapekṣa5sya tat kāraṇamātraṃ vivakṣitam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4174: saṃyogavibhāgāpekṣayā tv anapekṣo na kāraṇaṃ kintu sāpekṣa eva kāraṇam iti vivakṣitam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4176: na tu kasyacid anyānapekṣasyaiva kāraṇatvam asti yenānapekṣo 'kāraṇam ity ucyamānaṃ śobheta /
GSP28dhebta_u:4178: tad yathā tantuturīsaṃyogalakṣaṇo guṇaḥ paṭaturīsaṃyoge kartavye paṭaṃ paścādbhāvinam apekṣate /
GSP28dhebta_u:4179: yathā ca vaṃśādau pāṭanākhyā7vayavakarmajo 'vayavāntarād vibhāgaḥ paścādbhāvinaṃ dravyavināśam apekṣya sakriyasyāvayavasyākāśādideśād vibhāgam
GSP28dhebta_u:4180: yathā cāsau na kriyājo vibhāgaḥ kintu vibhāgaja eveti vibhāgajaṃ vibhāgam abhyupagacchadbhirvaiśeṣikair iṣyate tathā nehāprakṛtatvād ucyate
GSP28dhebta_u:4185: “[133]yuṣmad asmadbhyām anyatarasyām khañ” ity anena khaña kartavyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4196: nanu ca manaskārādisamudāyajanyam idam ekam upadarśitam etatsāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭaikajanyaṃ tu kiṃ na darśitam ity āha tadanyad i[111.13]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4198: na tv ekajanyaṃ nāma kiñcit saṃbhavati /
GSP28dhebta_u:4202: tyādyabhidhānād evaitad ūhituṃ śakyam ity ahiprāyeṇa ca sva[134]yam ūhyam i[111.13]ty āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:4203: nanu kiṃ bhāgato viśeṣavṛttir yena3 bahuvacanena nirdeśa ity āha[135]tajjanyāpekṣayā ce[111.17]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4208: kutaḥ svabhāvabhedavattvaṃ tasyety apekṣāyāṃ yojyam kāryāntare[112.1]tyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:4209: pṛthivyādīny upādāya vartanta ity upādāya rūpaṃ [112.5] parasparādi mayūravyaṃsakāditvāt samāsaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4215: nanūpakāraka ādhāro na tu janakas tat katham evam ucyata ity āha nahī[112.27]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4224: kathaṃ tatrākiñcitkaratvaṃ tasya sa6hakāriṇo jñāpitaṃ bhavatīty āha -- śaktipratibandhakāpanayanene[113.19]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4225: yasmād arthe 'yaṃ nipātaḥ “na vai“[nai]veti vyācakṣāṇo vai[113.25]śabdam avadhāraṇe darśayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:4229: kathaṃ tarhi saha yugapat kurvanta [114.12] ity ayaṃ vyācaṣṭeti cet,
GSP28dhebta_u:4230: uktam atra pūrvam iti na punar ucyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:4233: yāvate[115.8]ti tṛtīyāntapratirūpako 'yaṃ nipāto yasmād ity asminn arthe,
GSP28dhebta_u:4236: tadavasthāyā prāk pūrvaṃ paścād uttarakālaṃ[136]pṛthak tadvikalāvasthāyāṃ bhāvaḥ [115.10] sadbhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4239: nanu yadi svahetoḥ samarthasyotpattis tarhi katham anantaram uktam -- “te samarthāḥ svabhāvataḥ [115.6]” ity ata āha paramate[115.16]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4240: bhavatyasmāt kāryam iti bhāvo hetus tasmād iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4241: tad api tvayā kasmān na vyākhyātam iti cet /
GSP28dhebta_u:4242: na, sa[49a]1marthaḥ kuta utpanna ity asya vyāghātaprasaṃgāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4243: sahakāribhyaḥ sāmarthyam[137]icchantī[115.17]ti camīmāṃsakamatāśrayaṇenāha na tunaiyāyikāevam icchanti yena tanmatopagraheṇāpy etat saṃgaccheta,
GSP28dhebta_u:4245: tathā cāha --jalpamahodaghiḥ“sahakārisākalyaṃ tadvataḥ sāmarthyaṃ vaikalyaṃ tv asāmarthyam” iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4249: āvaśyakaṃ[138]jananam i[116.11]ty asya śabdasya tu siddhiḥ[139]pūrvaṃ na jāne /
GSP28dhebta_u:4252: [139] draṣṭavyam -- pṛ. 354 paṃ. 8 -- “avaśyamo bhāvaḥ ityādinā na jāne ityantena kṛtā“,
GSP28dhebta_u:4254: kuśūlañ ca tadapanetṛpuruṣaprayatnaś ca kṣetranayanaṃ ca prakiraṇaṃ [116.14] ca prakaraṇāt kṣetre prakiraṇaṃ ceti dvandvaṃ kṛtvā paścād ādiśabde[na] bahuvrīhiḥ kāryaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4255: prakiraṇam ity ayam auṇādikaḥ śabdo na tu kiratirlyuḍanto draṣṭavyas tadā guṇasyāpratiṣedhena prakaraṇam iti prāpter asādhu3tvaprasaṃgāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4256: sametya [116.19] yogyadeśe sthitvā sambhūya ādyena saha militvā pratyayaiḥ sahakāryupādānarūpaiḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4257: nanu ca “ata eva tayor avasthayor” ityādinā pratyabhijñāyāḥ prāmāṇyam apoditam eva tat kathaṃ na punar ukte(ktam i)
GSP28dhebta_u:4261: tarhi kim arthaṃ punar uktam ity āha -- vipañcanārthaṃ tv i[117.12]ti tuḥ pūrvasmād asya kathanasya viśeṣaṃ darśayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:4263: paścād bāhyepi darśayitavyatvāt krame tāvac śabdam āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:4267: kathaṃ tādṛśo na bhavatīty āha anyādṛśād iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4268: anyādṛśāddhi bhavannanyādṛśasyāpi hetor hetuvyapadeśasaṃbhavāj jananahetur ity āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:4269: kathaṃ taddhetur ity āha tad iti tatsahakāribhiḥ parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayahetusahakāribhir indriyādibhiḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4270: 6samarthañ ca tadvijñānajanane svasvakṣaṇāntaraṃ ceti tathā tasyārambhāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4275: vijñānanirmāṇasamarthāś ca te hetavaś ca te ca te indriyādayaś ca teṣām upādānaiḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4280: sukhasaṃvarditatvād iti vyācakṣāṇo mūle sukhaidhita ity asyānabhiyoganimittasyāpi sāmarthyāt krīḍana[119.12]śīla ity asya hetubhāvena 8viśeṣaṇatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:4281: nanu kṛtaṃ niṣpāditam ucyate 'tra ca kimācāryeṇa niṣpāditam ity āśaṃkāṃ nirākurvann āha kṛtam i[119.14]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4282: na punar e[119.15]vam ācakṣāṇena dvir uktābhāvo darśita iti boddhavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4283: asyārthasyāsakṛduktatvāt ekavāraṃ prativihite punaḥ pratividhāpayitari avajñāsaṃbhavenopahāsāṃyogāc ca kṛtaṃ kṛtam iti nirdeśasya nyā[49b]1yaprāptatvād atiprasiddhatvāc ceti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4284: nanu kiṃ kurvantaṃ kartuṃ prayuṅkte punaḥ pūrvapakṣavādī yena punaḥ pūrvapakṣavādī kārayatīty ucyata ity āha -- punar ityādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:4286: pūrvavan mīmāṃsakābhiprāyeṇa sāmarthyaṃ sahakāribhyo jāyata [119.25] ity ācaṣṭe /
GSP28dhebta_u:4288: {p. 358} samprati prakārāntareṇāpi pratyabhijñāyā aprāmāṇyaṃ paramabhyupagamayituṃ bhūmikāṃ racayann āha -- vyāvasthitasyaive[120.12]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4289: ayaṃ cātrābhiprāyaḥ -- bhavatu yāvad bījādāvucchūnoccūnatarādiviśeṣasya darśanāt sāmarthyotpādādikalpanā na punar iha tathā adarśanād iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4292: apratibhāsamāno viveko [120.14] yasya puṃ3saḥ sa tathā /
GSP28dhebta_u:4293: yady api viveko 'sya pratyakṣato nāvagamyate tathāpy etasmāt pramāṇāt tatsvabhāvasya sāmarthyasyotpattiḥ kalpyata iti darśayann āha vijñānādī[120.15]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:4294: anutpattiprasaṃgāt prāgasatsāmarthyaṃ cakṣurādisannidhāv utpadyata iti niścayaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4299: apūrvasāmarthyasya yaḥ pratibhāsa ākāras tena vivikto rahito ya upalādis tadgrāhi /
GSP28dhebta_u:4300: yata evaivaṃ tata evāvikṛtam iti ca draṣṭavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4302: abhyupagamyatām evaṃ kā kṣatir ity āha tatheti tadvat /
GSP28dhebta_u:4304: dvividhaṃ hi sāmarthyaṃ prātisvikam āgantukañ ca /
GSP28dhebta_u:4306: anyathā śilāśakalam api kṣityādisānnidhye bījavadaṃkuraṃ kasmān na niva(rva)
GSP28dhebta_u:4307: rtayatīti paryanuyoge kim uttaraṃ vācyam iti hi teṣāṃ matam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4308: nanu sāmarthyam atiśayalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāryādheyaṃ tato 'nyad eva tat ka6thaṃ “sahakāripratyaya[sānnidhya]lakṣaṇasye“ty ucyata ity āha ata[141]eve[121.3]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:4310: sānnidhyaśabdaparityāgena sahakāripratyayalakṣaṇasyeti te evetyādy apy uktaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4311: ata evābhyupagamād i[121.3]ti upāgatābhyupagamād i7ti pratyetavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4318: idaṃ śabdasya caitad iti etad darśanam [121.21] /
GSP28dhebta_u:4320: evaṃ niyuñjānamaho mahāsāmarthyam astu kā tavākṣamety āśaṃkya yadi nāmety avatārayituṃ na cātre[121.25]tyādy āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:4321: na cātra me kācid akṣamā [121.25] kiṃtv itīyam asmākaṃ cintā cittaṃ dunotī[122.3]ti samba8ndhaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4322: na cātra me [121.25] ity anena ṭīkākāravacanenaikavākyīkaraṇapakṣety a(pya)
GSP28dhebta_u:4325: evam asaṃbaddhavādiny apūjya eva pūjāvacanam upasaṃhāraparaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4326: dainyodbhāvanam i[122.1]ty arthāt saṃbodhyamānasya dainyaprakāśanam iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4329: apeto 'pagataḥ saṃtānaḥ [122.2] prasūtiḥ paraṃparā yasya tathoktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4331: śiraḥkampe cāsya satyam idam astī[122.10]ty asya śabdasya prayogam ākalayya prayoktur abhiprāyaṃ varṇayan pṛcchatī[122.13]ty ācaṣṭe /
GSP28dhebta_u:4332: ata eva cedam āha -- kiṃ tvayāstitvena pṛcchyata iti pārśvasthaṃ praśnayann āha kiṃ tad i[122.13]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4334: audāsīnyāpattir ity atreti śabdena idam āstitvenābhipretasya nyāyyavacana[122.17]syākāro darśitaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4335: ata eva nyāyyavacanasyāstitvena darśyamānasya rūpaṃ darśayan satym idam apy astī[122.16]ti punar āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:4336: yady evam asya nyāyyavacanasya sadbhāvādanavadyam evāsmanmatam ity āśaṃ3kyāha kiṃtv i[122.17]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4338: pracyutam ajanakaṃ rūpam utpannaṃ janakaṃ rūpaṃ dvandvaikavadbhāvam abhipretya pracyutotpannam ity āha -- apracyuto(tā)
GSP28dhebta_u:4342: aparāpekṣasvabhāvabhedalakṣaṇatvād i[123.20]ti parā4pekṣo yaḥ svabhāvabhedo na bhavati svata eva yo bhāvabhedalakṣaṇatvād iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4345: svarūpeṇa kartṛtve vivakṣitasyāpi tādrūpya prasajyetety abhiprāyeṇāha e[144]ṣām api pararūpeṇa kartṛtva [124.1] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4346: pararūpeṇa kartṛtve iti para eva kartā syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4347: tasya tu tathātvaṃ5 harītakīṃ prāpya devatā recayantīty anena tulyaṃ syād ity abhipretyāha -- pararūpeṇāpy akārakatvād i[124.3]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4348: asyottarasya [124.5] “sahitas tatsvabhāvo na kevala” ity asya /
GSP28dhebta_u:4350: kathañcit ke[124.10]nāpi prakāreṇa na kāryakriyāyā virāmaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4351: purastād api tasya svarūpasya bhāvād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4354: 6syād etaj janakam asya rūpam avasthitaṃ janakañ ca tad ucyate yasmin saty eva kāryam asti na tu yasmin sati kāryaṃ bhavaty eva,
GSP28dhebta_u:4358: ve {p. 360} nopapadyeta ity eva tasya kāryaṃ,
GSP28dhebta_u:4359: tadbhāve tu bhavaty avaśyam iti ko(kvo)payogo 'sya /
GSP28dhebta_u:4360: tasmāt kathaṃ tadrūpabhāvepi kāryakriyā7 prasaṃjanaṃ jyāya iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4361: atrocyate akṣaṇikatvenāpracyutānutpannarūpāntare sarvāvasthāsamāne 'pi kāraṇaṃ yadi kāryaṃ nopajāyate tarhi tatsvatantram āpadyeta /
GSP28dhebta_u:4362: tathā ca na tat tasya kāryaṃ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4365: svatantraṃ kāryam eva syān na [tat]kāryaṃ tathā 8sati //” iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4366: kāraṇapāratantrye ca tatkāraṇaṃ tatkāryaṃ haṭhād eva janayet /
GSP28dhebta_u:4367: tathāpy abhāve na tasya kāryaṃ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4368: tasmād a[kāraṇāt] kāraṇasya viśeṣaḥ kāryasyāvaśyaṃbhāva evāvaśyañ ca vaktavyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4370: ve na bhavati kāryam” ity akāraṇād asya viśeṣaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4371: na hi tasyākāraṇasyābhāve tatkāryaṃ na bhavatīti,
GSP28dhebta_u:4372: hanta kuta etad avagamyate tada[50b]1bhāvaprayukto 'syābhāva iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4374: vasyābhāve tadbhāvalakṣaṇe kāryābhāvasyābhāvaḥ kāryabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ syāt tadā tadabhāvaprayukto 'syābhāvaḥ siddhyed itarathākāraṇābhimatābhāvaprayukto 'pi tadabhāvaḥ kiṃ na kalpyate?
GSP28dhebta_u:4377: tasmād yathā 2tadavastha eva kāraṇe svayam eva kāryaṃ na bhavati svātantryāt,
GSP28dhebta_u:4378: tathā tadabhāvo 'pi svayam eva na bhaviṣyatīti svātantryād eva /
GSP28dhebta_u:4379: yaś ca svayam eva na bhavati nāsau niyamyata tena paratantratve tasya kāraṇasya bhāve 'vaśyam eva bhavet /
GSP28dhebta_u:4383: “[146]tadbhāvepi na bhāvaś ced abhāve bhāvitā kutaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4387: tasmāt tadbhāve bhāvas tadabhāve cābhāva iti viśeṣitaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'vaśyaṃ bhavatīti jñāpayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:4388: tathā ca kāraṇe saty avaśyaṃbhāvi kāryam āyātam iti kathaṃ kadācit kriyāvirāmaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4389: kiñ ca tathāvidho hi kāryābhāvo nirhetukatvāt svayam eva bhavatīti yuktam api /
GSP28dhebta_u:4390: bhāvas tu hetuparatantratvāt sa4marthe hetau na bhavatīti na yuktam / tad uktam
GSP28dhebta_u:4391: “abhāvo hi padārthānāṃ svayam eva bhaved api /
GSP28dhebta_u:4392: bhāvas tu paratantratvāt kathaṃ hetor bhaven na saḥ //” iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4393: {p. 361} nanu kāryābhāvasya svatantratvāt “kāraṇe saty eva na bhavatī“ti yuktam evaitat /
GSP28dhebta_u:4394: evaṃ tarhi na kāraṇābhāva prayukto 'bhāva kathaṃ bhavet kāryasya(kāryam[147]asya)
GSP28dhebta_u:4396: yaś ca svayam eva na bhavati nāsau tena niyantuṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4397: tato yathā svayaṃ na bhavati tathā bhaved api /
GSP28dhebta_u:4399: yadā tu kāraṇe sati bhaved eva tadā svarasanirodhepy aparāparakṣaṇotpattes tadabhāva eva saṃtānocchedas tadabhāva eva ca saṃtānākṣepakṣaṇānārambho vā su6jñāta(na)
GSP28dhebta_u:4403: etena tad api nirastamyadāhur eke yathobhayādhīnanirūpaṇā vyāptir ayogavyavacchedena vyāpake nirūpyate vyāpye sati bhāva eva vyāpakasya nābhāva
GSP28dhebta_u:4404: vyāpyasya punar anyayogavyavacchedena vyāpaka eva bhāvo vyāpyasya nānyatreti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4406: kāryotpādasya purastād bhāva eva kāraṇasya nābhāva iti;
GSP28dhebta_u:4407: kārye punar anyayogavyavacchedena kāraṇa eva sati bhāvo nānyasminn ity anubhavānusārānniścīyata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4412: kāraṇasya mukhyasyānubhavo 'nyas tu tādarthyād upacaritakāraṇabhāvasyānubhava iti svayam upacaritakāraṇānubhavarūpatva eveti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4413: api ca yathā kāraṇe saty avaśyaṃ bhāvam anicchatā kāryasya kādācit kādanvayāt tatkāra[51a] 1ṇam iṣyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:4414: tathā kādācit kādavyatirekād api kin na kāraṇam iṣyate yujyate vā /
GSP28dhebta_u:4415: tasmāt kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ niyatam icchatā yathā vyāptimān vyatireka eṣṭavyas tathā vyāptimānn anva(mān anva)
GSP28dhebta_u:4417: kiṃ ca sahitāvasthāyāṃ tāvad asau bhāvaḥ kāryaṃ janayatītīṣyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:4421: yady utaraḥ pakṣas tadā tasmiñ janayati na kadācit kāryaṃ satpratyayaviṣayaḥ syāt sattayā abhisambandhasya bhāvitatvā(vitvā)t /
GSP28dhebta_u:4424: kim anenaiva svabhāvena pūrvam ayam avasthito 'thānyena /
GSP28dhebta_u:4427: 3anenaiva svabhāvenāvasthāne ca saṃpratīva tadāpi kāryaṃ sattayābhisambadhyata ity upetaṃ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4431: kiṃ prāgbhāva eva kiṃ vā prāg eva bhāvaḥ?
GSP28dhebta_u:4433: tadā sthirasyāpi evam eva kāraṇatve su[148]sādhitasya4 nirākaraṇaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP28dhebta_u:4436: tad eva tu na siddham iti {p. 362} katham idam ucyamānaṃ śobheteti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4437: āstāṃ prāgbhāva eva kāraṇatvaṃ ko bādhaḥ?
GSP28dhebta_u:4438: nanūktam evākṣaṇikasyāpi kāraṇatve sādhayituṃ śakye tadanirākṛtir eva mahatī bādheti ceti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4439: hanta kiṃ 5heturūpasya lakṣaṇenākṣaṇikasya sattvaṃtathāgatair nirākriyate yenedam api vaktum adhyavasitās tarkavidaḥ kathaṃ nāmeti cet /
GSP28dhebta_u:4441: prāgbhāva evāsau sthirarūpāt kramākramākhyasya vyāpakasya nivṛttyā nivartate /
GSP28dhebta_u:4442: yathā ca tasya tābhyāṃ vyāptir yathā ca tatas tayor nivṛttis tathānyatra niṛṇītam iti ne6ha hetulakṣaṇakāle 'prakṛtatvād ucyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:4445: na tu hetulakṣaṇena tasyā nirākṛtir iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4450: [tya]ity e[123.21]kena prakāreṇa vyākhyāyāpareṇāpi prakāreṇa vyākhyātum athave[124.10]tyādinopakramate /
GSP28dhebta_u:4453: nanūktam eva pratyayāntarāpekṣasvakāryajananasvabhāvo bhāvas tat kathaṃ pratyayāntarasāhityadaśāyāḥ pūrvaṃ kuryād ity āha pratyayāntare[124.19]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:4455: kecit punaḥ “svahetubhir evāyaṃ pratyayāntarasāpekṣakāryajananasvabhāvo janita [124.11]” ity atraiva vipañcyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:4456: 8yady evaṃdharmo 'yaṃ svahetubhir eva janitaḥ syāt tadā na kadācij janayet /
GSP28dhebta_u:4457: tathā hi yāvat sahakāripratyayasannidhikālas tāvad akaraṇadharmāsau bhāvo 'nyathāsyā pūrvam api kartṛtvaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP28dhebta_u:4458: pratyayāntarasannidhikāle ca sa eva kiyatkālākaraṇasvabhāvo yaḥ prathame kṣaṇa āsīt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4459: tato naiva kuryāt ki[51b]1yatkālākaraṇadharmatvāt tasya kriyāyāt (kriyāyāṃtu)
GSP28dhebta_u:4463: punar ante tathaiveti katham ivākṣaṇikaḥ kadācid api janayet /
GSP28dhebta_u:4464: tasmān na pratyayāntarāpekṣajanakasvabhāvo bhāvaḥ svahetubhir janyata iti / tathā cāha --
GSP28dhebta_u:4466: bhāvaḥ syāj janito nāsau kiṃcij janayet tadā //
GSP28dhebta_u:4468: tāvan nūnam akartāsau svabhāvas tasya vastunaḥ //
GSP28dhebta_u:4471: tan na kuryāt kriyāyām vā svabhāvosya no bhavet (?) /
GSP28dhebta_u:4474: svabhāvasya tathāpy eṣa tāvat kālam asatkriyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4475: punar ante tathaiveti kuryād akṣaṇikaḥ katham? //” iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4480: santānam apy āśritya katham ucyata ity āha -- pūrvottareti [128.8] /
GSP28dhebta_u:4481: kiṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nāma vastu4tas tatra sahakāritvam ity āha -- pūrva[151]kṣaṇebhyas tv i[128.10]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4485: ekatvenādhim uktasya [130.6] tad evedam iti niścitasya /
GSP28dhebta_u:4489: upanipatantīti upanipātās te ca kṣaṇāḥ [130.13] tathā kṣaṇo yato 'nyo nāsti kālaḥ sovacchedakatvenaiṣāṃ vidyata 5iti “[154]arṣa ādi“ty enad vidhātavyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4499: kiṃtu durvekena anyad eva kiñcid uddhata bhāti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4500: tathā ca atra “arṣa ādibhyo 'dityanenād vidhātavyaḥ” iti pāṭhaḥ samyak sambhāvyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:4501: tadanāsādanam eva katham ity āha -- kṣaṇānām i[130.27]ti6 /
GSP28dhebta_u:4502: ayaṃ niratiśayo 'yaṃ ca sātiśaya iti vivekasyābhāvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4504: yad uktam akṣaṇike tatsarvaṃ kṣaṇikeṣv api mamaṃ yata [131.10] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4506: yad vā kṣaṇānām i[131.13]tīdam ubhayatrāpi sambandhanīyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4509: dūradeśavartināṃ kathaṃ hetuphalabhāvapratiniyama ity āśaṃkāyāṃ nyāyam upadarśayann
GSP28dhebta_u:4510: āha yena yasyābhī[131.16]ti yena dūrasthitasahakārikṛtena viśeṣeṇa saviśeṣā eva saṃnidhīyanta itīṣyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:4512: {p. 364} naiva kāryotpādane yogyās te 'smābhir iṣyante kiṃ tarhi kāryotpādānuguṇasyotpā8dane tat kathaṃ tadupāyetyādy ucyamānaṃ śobhetety āśaṃkyāha yadi hi [132.5] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4514: kiṃ puna[132.22]r hi dvistrir vā brūmaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4515: kiṃ tarhi śataśa eva brūma ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4516: saṃpratyevam eva vyākhyānasya niravadyatayāpūrvaṭīkākṛtaḥkaṭākṣayann āha -- evam i[132.23]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4518: na viśeṣotpādanād evetyādigranthasya punar uktatāpari[52a]1hārārthaṃ yatante yatnaṃ kurvanti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4521: na sarvadāparāparayogosya saṃbhavati yenāsya tannibandhano viśeṣaḥ kalpyata ity āha nahī[133.22]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4523: chāyāpi śītādyarthakriyākāriṇī vastv eva tv anā(na tv ā)
GSP28dhebta_u:4524: na tu pratikṣaṇam ityādinā ekadaivārthasyoktatvāt kathaṃ dviḥ punar grahaṇaṃ kṛtam ity āha kṣaṇikeṣv i[133.29]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4526: (Pā. 5-4-18) sucakenoktam ity āha tatra svarasata [134.2] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4527: tajjanmanimittam ity ācakṣāṇo mūle nimittasaptamīṃ darśayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:4532: yasmin kārye kartavye 'nukūlo 'nuguṇaḥ sa cāsau viśeṣaś ceti tathā āsād itas tadanukūlo viśeṣo yais te tathā taiḥ [136.28] /
GSP28dhebta_u:4533: atha kena granthena pūrvam anavasthoktā kathaṃ ca syād iti pārśvasthavacanam āśaṃkya taṃ prāguktaṃ granthaṃ tasya cārthaṃ darśayann āha athe[137.1]tyādi
GSP28dhebta_u:4535: kuśūlādyavastham api bījaṃ kṣityādinā kṛtaviśeṣaṃ kṣityādikam api tena kṛtaviśeṣam evopatiṣṭhata ity asya praka[156]raṇa(kāra)
GSP28dhebta_u:4538: kāryotpādānuguṇo 'yam ādyo viśeṣaḥ saṃparkakṣaṇā5nantarakṣaṇarūpas tajjanakasya dharmaśabdād anicaṃ vidhātuṃ vyutpattiṃ darśayann āha akṣepeṇe[137.14]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:4539: kāryatām ananubhavata [137.27] iti tatkāryatāṃ ceti draṣṭavyam itarathā antyāvasthāprāpter abī(prāptena bī)
GSP28dhebta_u:4543: {p. 365} bāhulyeneti vivṛṇvan prāyaḥ[137.28]śabdaṃ nipātaṃ darśayati bāhulyenety asyārthe vartamānam /

GSP28dhebta_u:4556: [138.20]ti “tatsvabhāvasya jananād” ity asya 8prasaṃgāt prastāvād āgataṃ prāsaṃgikaṃ [138.23] kāryaṃ yatheṣṭam avināśaṃ hetu(ṣṭam vināśahetu)
GSP28dhebta_u:4557: naiva nivṛttiḥ kriyata ity āha vināśaheto[139.27]r iti /
