GSP28dhebta_u:4562: anyasyaiva dravyādirūpasya tāmrāder utpattir ihācāryeṇopagamyate -- tarhipramāṇavārtike
GSP28dhebta_u:4567: śakyate hi tatrāpīdaṃ vaktum upādānāt tasmāt tasmāc ca sahakārikāraṇād anyad eva tat tathotpannam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4568: na tv agnis tāmradravatvaṃ saha tiṣṭhata iti cet /
GSP28dhebta_u:4569: satyam, yathāśruti2 syād virodho yathā tv avirodhas tathāsmābhirviśeṣākhyāne khyāpitam iti tata evānugantavyam iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4574: para eva praśnayann āha -- kathaṃ jñāyata [140.22] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4575: avasthānāt [140.24] tasya vināśasya kāṣṭhāder i3ti prakaraṇāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4576: tathāpi tasya tathātvam katham ity āśaṃkya para evāha yadī[140.24]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4578: tarhi na nivartetaivety āśaṃkya sa evāha tasya svabhāvene[140.25]tyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:4580: yat tasmāt tasya vināśo bhavatīti bruvatā parakāryatvaṃ tasya kathitaṃ bhavatīty āśaṃkya sa evāha parasmā4d i[140.27]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4581: uktam evārtham upasaṃhāravyājena sphuṭayann āha svahetubhir evāyam i[140.28]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4582: atramīmāṃsakasya sahāyakaṃ darśayann āha -- tad uktam i[141.2]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4583: yena svabhāvena virodhinaṃ [141.4] apekṣya nivartata [141.3] iti yojyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4584: anyeṣāṃ kṣaṇikavādināṃ mudgarādikam a[141.4]pekṣya nivartata iti sambanddhavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4587: sāpi katham ahetur ity āha -- tasyāś ce[141.9]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4588: yadi sā bhavitrī katham ahetukā bhaved ity āśaṃkya sa evāha -- nahī[141.9]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4589: ko nāmāsya bhāṣitasyārtha ity āha kevalam i[141.10]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4590: idam anantaroktam uttaraṃ kartṛ vikalpadvayaṃ karma nātikrāmati [141.12] /
GSP28dhebta_u:4592: sa hi nitya ucyate yo naiva vinaśyati na cāyaṃ tathopagata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4600: nyūnasa2mvatsare sthitidharmā syāt tadānayoḥ svabhāvayor viruddhadharmādhyāsena bheda eva bhaved ity abhiprāyeṇa sa eva tad antepī[141.18]ty āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:4603: pūrvoktena [142.3] “tadantepi sa evāsya svabhāva” ity anena nyāyena yuktyā tadayogā[142.5]n nāśāyogāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4605: ata eva [142.9] virodhisannidhānāpekṣatvād eva vināśasya tannibandhanatvaprasaṃgāt [142.8] apekṣaṇīyavirodhikāraṇatvaprasakteḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4606: {p. 367} hetubhāvasya [142.10] [53a]1hetutvasyāpekṣā kāryeṇāpekṣyamāṇadharmasyaivāpekṣā sā vivakṣitatvāt sā lakṣaṇaṃ [142.11] yasya tadbhāvas tattvaṃ tasmāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4608: ayaṃ cāsyāśayo yadi vināśo 'nyathā nopapadyate parataś ca na bhavati taṃ cāpekṣata iti pramāṇasiddhaṃ syāt kalpyeta vaitat,
GSP28dhebta_u:4610: pūrvam akiṇcitkaratvena virodhitvam upetya tadapekṣā2yāṃ uktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4611: saṃprati tu virodhitve 'kiñcitkaratvam eva nāstīti darśayann āha kathañ ce[142.15]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4616: yathā tadbhāvabhāvitvaṃ teṣāṃ tathā darśayann āha -- vegavad i[142.28]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4617: kasmāt saṃjātātiśaya ity apekṣāyāṃ yojyam paraspare[142.28]tyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:4621: vināśaḥ kathaṃ tasya svabhāvo bhavitum arhati yena evam ucyata ity āha -- vinaśyatī[143.14]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4623: to vacanāt ka4rtari bhavatīty āśaṃkyāha -- bahulam i[143.14]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4630: ayoga eva kuta ity āha -- asāmarthye[143.24]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4632: syād etat tatra khalu viparyaye bādhakaṃ pramāṇam ucyate yat sādhyaviparyaye hetor vṛtti(ttiṃ)
GSP28dhebta_u:4634: na tu yat sākṣād eva sādhyaṃ sādhayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:4635: iyaṃ cānapekṣā sākṣād eva kṣaṇakṣayitāṃ kṛtakānāṃ satāṃ sādhayituṃ śakteti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4636: 6tathāhi ye yadbhāvaṃ pratyanapekṣās te tadbhāvaniyatā yathāntyā kāraṇasāmagrī svakāryotpādane /
GSP28dhebta_u:4637: vināśaṃ pratyanapekṣāś codayān antaram ime kṛtakā bhāvā iti -- prayoge kṛte kṛtakānām eṣāṃ kṣaṇikatā kiṃ na pratīyate yena kṛtakatvāddhetos tatsiddhiḥ prārthyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:4638: tasmād ayaṃ maulo hetur vaiyarthyam ātmanaḥ paśyan nai(śyan ne)
GSP28dhebta_u:4639: vaṃ viparyaye bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ sādhyasiddhau sahāyam apekṣayituṃ kṣaṇam api na kṣamata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4640: na vayaṃbhaṭṭārcaṭena kṛtakatvasya hetor evaṃrūpe vuparyaye bādhakapramāṇe pradarśite
GSP28dhebta_u:4641: sati {p. 368} caivaṃ gaḍupraveśe 'kṣitārānirgamakalpite yathāśruti suśliṣṭaṃ kiñcid vaktumīśmahe,
GSP28dhebta_u:4642: kevalaṃvārtikakāra8sya kṛtakatvahetor vyāptiṃ samarthayituṃ pūrvācāryaiḥ kāmanapekṣāṃ bruvatoyam abhiprāyaṃ (?)
GSP28dhebta_u:4647: tathāhi kṛtakatvasyodayānantaram avināśitve sati vināśaṃ prati sāpekṣatvaṃ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4649: vināśaṃ [53b] 1pratyanapekṣatvaṃ taddhetuyogād avagataṃ tasya vyāpakam tatas tadvyāpakaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:4650: svaviruddhavidhinā vipakṣāt tadbhāvāniyatatvād udayānantaram avināśitvalakṣaṇāt nirvatamānaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:4651: svayam api vyāpyaṃ kṛtakatvam ādāya nivartata iti vyāptisiddhiḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4652: tataś ca vyāpakavirudhopalambhāt kṛtakasya hetor nivṛttir iti vyāpakopalabdhivuparyaye bādhakaṃ pramāṇam -- eta2t sucanārtham anapekṣāṃ (?)
GSP28dhebta_u:4654: ye yadbhāvaṃ pratyanapekṣā ity etad api yady anantaroktasūcanād bādhakaṃ pramāṇam ucyate,
GSP28dhebta_u:4656: na tu jātu tad eva bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ vaktuṃ yuktam svātantryeṇa kṣaṇikatvasya tena sādhanāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4658: “tatra ye kṛtakā bhāvāḥ sarve te kṣaṇabhaṅginaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4660: yadbhāvaṃ prati yan naiva hetvantaram apekṣate /
GSP28dhebta_u:4661: tat tatra niyataṃ jñeyaṃ svahetubhyas tathodayāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4663: vināśaṃ prati sarvepi nirapekṣāś ca janminaḥ //
GSP28dhebta_u:4665: ye punar imaṃ do4ṣam upadarśitaṃ prativada[158]nto yathāśruti bādhakaṃ pramāṇam idaṃ samarthayitum īśate na tān vayaṃ[159]vidmaḥ pratyutopakāriṇa eva manyāmaha iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4668: m ity āśaṃkyopasaṃhāravyājenāha -- tad evam i[144.9]tyādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:4669: ahetoḥ svabhāvādiniyamāyo5gād ity abhiprāyeṇāha kṛ[160]takatvasya sato 'bhāvād i[144.9]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4672: [159] atra yadi “dviṣmaḥ” iti pāṭhaḥ syāt tadā bāḍhaṃ saṃgacchet /
GSP28dhebta_u:4680: abhidhānīyam abhidhātum ucitam iti manyamāna [144.27] ācārya iti prakaraṇāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4686: nanu sattāyogāditaḥ satvam akṣaṇikasyopapatsyate tat kathaṃ śaktir hi [145.18] -- ityādy ucyamānaṃ śobhata i7ty āśaṃkyāha evaṃ manyata [145.20] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4687: tripadārthasatkarīti sattā tair iṣyata ity abhiprāyeṇāha -- sāmānyādī[145.22]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4689: svarūpasattve ca teṣām iṣyamāṇe tadvad anyeṣām api kiṃ [na] bhavet?
GSP28dhebta_u:4692: tasyaiva sattāyoga ity arthasāma8rthyam eva bhāvalakṣaṇam āyātam i[146.3]ty eṣa eva
GSP28dhebta_u:4693: pāṭhaḥ iti[146.2]śabdena hetvabhidhāne arthyata ity artho dāhapākādis tatra sāmarthyaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:4694: tad eva bhāvalakṣaṇam āyātam iti saṃgatatvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4695: tasyaiva sattāyoga ity artha iti pramādapāṭhaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4696: evaṃ hi sāmarthyam eva bhāvalakṣaṇam ity akāraṇam uktaṃ syāt ke ca(kva ca)
GSP28dhebta_u:4697: tatsāmarthyam iti ca noktaṃ bhavet tasmā[54a]1d ity adhyāhṛtya vyākhyāne ca kliṣṭam iṣṭaṃ syād iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4698: atraivopapattyantaraṃ samuccinvann āha -- itthaṃ ce[146.3]ti anena vakṣyamāṇena prakāreṇa /
GSP28dhebta_u:4700: tam eva prakāraṃ darśayann āha anyathe[146.3]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4706: “na nāśena vinā śoko notpādena vinā dhṛtiḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4707: sthityā vinā na mādhyasthyaṃ tasmād vastu trayātmakam //” iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4710: agorasavrato nobhe tasmād vastu trayātmakam //” [Āptamī. 60] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4714: anenāsaṃbhavitāṃ lakṣaṇadoṣam āha -- yathoktaṃ [146.10] yādṛśam uktaṃ utpādvyayaghrauvyātmakaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yasya tat tathoktam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4715: utpādavyayaghrauvyāṇām {p. 370} asattvaprasaṅgenāvyāpitālakṣaṇadoṣo draṣṭavyaḥ na cāsaddhis tair anyasya yogo 4yukta iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4718: yadi hi sāmānyād iti svajñānaṃ janayet tadārthatvena vyavasthāpyeta nānyatheti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4721: kramayaugapadyābhyām i[146.28]ti kramayaugapadyakāritvābhyām iti dra5ṣṭavyam itarathā kāryadharmābhyāmābhyāṃ kāraṇadharmaḥ kāryakāritvaṃ katham iva vyāpyeta /
GSP28dhebta_u:4725: arthakriyākāritvamātrakramākramakāritvātmakārthakriyākāritvaviśeṣayoś cobhayavyāptikatvātmakaṃ sattvaṃ kramākramakāritvābhyāṃ vyāptam i6ty ucyate
GSP28dhebta_u:4731: tato [146.29] vyāpyavyāpakabhāvāt kāryakāraṇaśaktarūpavyāpakayoḥ kramākramakāritvayor nivṛtte[147.1]r nivṛttatvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:4732: ta(ka)dā nivṛttir ity apekṣāyām āha akṣaṇi7katva [147.2] iti akṣaṇikatve sati /
GSP28dhebta_u:4733: tatra evākṣaṇikatvād vipakṣān nivṛtter iti ca sāmarthyād apādānaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4734: kathaṃ tayos tato nivṛttir ity āha -- virodhād i[147.1]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4736: na tu śāstranirdiṣṭalakṣaṇayor virodhayor anyataravirodhavaśād iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4740: ayogapakṣe 'pi yāvat sambhavaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ pratividhānaṃ cāsmābhirviśeṣākhyāna eva vistareṇābhihitam
GSP28dhebta_u:4741: iti tata evāpekṣitavyam iti. anena ca yasya [na] kramākramayogo na ta[54b]1sya kvacit sāmarthyam,
GSP28dhebta_u:4742: yathākāśakuśeśayasya. asti cākṣaṇike sati vyāpakānupalambhaḥ sattvahetoḥ sādhyaviparyaye bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ darśitaṃ veditayam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4745: tyāṃkṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhauviśeṣākhyāne cākhyātam iti tata evāvagantavyam iti. viruddhayoḥ [147.3] sattvāsattvayoḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4754: 2kramayaugapadyābhyām eve[147.6]ty atra kramayaugapadye kāryadharmāv eva vivakṣite /
GSP28dhebta_u:4755: tenāyam arthaḥ -- kāryam aṅkurādikaṃ bījādinā [147.6] kevalaṃ vā kriyetānyasahitaṃ {p. 371} ceti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4759: kāryāntarasāhityāsāhityarūpe krama3yaugapadye vivṛṇvatā cānena kāryadharmatvaṃ kramayaugapadvayor vyaktam upadarśitam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4760: ata eva kramayaugapadyābhyāṃ kāryakriyāvyāptety asmābhir vyākhyātaṃ tathā /
GSP28dhebta_u:4764: tataḥ kim āyāta4m ity āha -- tasya ce[147.18]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4766: astuṃ dṛśyānupalambhāt kasmiṃścid deśe kāle ca tasyābhāvavyavahāro 'nyasmin punar deśe kāle cāpratiṣedhāt kathaṃ tatra prakārāntarasyābhāvaḥ siddhyatīti āśaṃkyāha /
GSP28dhebta_u:4769: tābhyāṃ prakārāntaraṃ tasya niṣedhe dṛśyānupalambhakṛte sati hy ani(sati ni)
GSP28dhebta_u:4772: bhāvepī[147.25]ti tasyāṅkurāder iti prakaraṇāt na kācit kṣatiḥ [147.25] /
GSP28dhebta_u:4773: kiṃ bhūte deśāntarādāv ity āha krameṇetyā[147.24]di /
GSP28dhebta_u:4776: ayaṃ cāśayo deśāntarādir apy etad deśāntaravat kramena vā tadbhāvavān yugapad vā bhavitum arhati,
GSP28dhebta_u:4779: na kācit kṣatir i[147.25]ti bruvataś cāyam abhiprāyaḥ -- kāryasya caikatraikadāvasthādvayabahirbhāvo
GSP28dhebta_u:4780: niṣi7ddho 'nyadāpi tena bhavatā pramāṇaparidṛṣṭātmanaiva bhavitavyam anyathā tat kathaṃ deśāntarādau
GSP28dhebta_u:4785: nanu saṃpratyevoktaḥ svabhāvānupalambha evetyādi tat katham idānīm ucyate pratyakṣa [147.25] ityādīti cet /
GSP28dhebta_u:4786: naiṣa doṣaḥ pūrvaṃ hi mūḍhaṃ pratipattāraṃ prati tathoktam adhunā punar amūḍhaṃ pratī8ti ko vyāghātaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4787: kramayaugapadyayor i[148.1]ti kramākramayor ity arthaḥ sakṛtapratyupalakṣaṇena yaugapadyaśabdenākramasyaiva
GSP28dhebta_u:4792: [55a]1ubhayaniṣedhātmakam eva prakārāntaraṃ kiṃ {p. 372} na bhavati yenaikaniṣedhanāparavidhānāt tasya niṣedho bhavatīty āha -- vidhipratiṣedhayor
GSP28dhebta_u:4793: ayam abhiprāyaḥ -- kramo na bhavatīti ayam evākramavidhiḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:4794: sopi na bhavatīti tadaiva tasya niṣedhaḥ anayoś caikādhikaraṇayor ekakālikayor virodhas tasmāt tathābhūtasyā...ṃ...va iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4796: kāraṇam api kāraṇāpekṣayā kāryam eveti kāraṇagrahaṇam,
GSP28dhebta_u:4799: yad vā kāraṇena kriyamāṇe kārya iti jñāpanārthaṃ kāraṇagrahaṇaṃ vāstavaṃ rūpa(varū)
GSP28dhebta_u:4800: pānubādakaṃ pratiṣedhasya yadviruddhaṃ tasyopalabdhir ity āśaṃkā etad evopapādayann āha vyavacchidya3māne[148.10]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4801: itarasya vyavasthānam i[148.10]ti tathavyavacchidyamānaprakārād itaravyavasthānam iti tathā /
GSP28dhebta_u:4803: saṃbhavagrahanaṃ copalakṣaṇaṃ tena pūrvasiddhāṃ ca vyāptiṃ pradarśyety api draṣṭavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:4805: bādhakam ity asyāviruddhopalabdheḥ sādhyavi4paryaye bādhakaṃ [148.15] pramāṇam ucyata iti cādhyāhāryā(rya)
GSP28dhebta_u:4806: kriyāpekṣayāyaṃ ktvāpratyayaḥ kāryo 'nyathā kāṃ kriyām apekṣyeyaṃ pūrvakālā pradarśanakriyā pradarśayitavyā yatrāyaṃ bhavet,
GSP28dhebta_u:4807: yathāśruti bhinnakartṛkāyāṃ ca kriyāyām ayaṃ prasajyeta puruṣasambadhitvāt pradarśanasyeti /
GSP28dhebta_u:4811: nanu kramākramābhyāṃ kāryaṃ kāmaṃ vyāpyatāṃ tathāpy akṣaṇikaḥ krameṇākrameṇa vā kāryaṃ kariṣyati /

GSP28dhebta_u:5026: daḥ kiṃ na kalpyata iti pūrvavat /
GSP28dhebta_u:5027: syād etat pratibhāsaniyamanibandhanoyam abhedo nānyanibandhanas tat kim evam ucyate ity āha pratibhāse[163.16]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5030: ntinimittād {p. 369} ā[163.17]kārasāmyādeḥ paramārthato bhede 'py atādṛ2śatvepy upalakṣaṇād darśanānaivam iti draṣtavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:5031: evam upalakṣaṇatvād asya bhedavicārāvasare 'pi pratibhāsabhedād bheda iti pūrvapakṣe
GSP28dhebta_u:5032: pratibhāsabhedasya ca kutaścid bhrāntinimittāt paramārthato 'bhedepy upalakṣaṇād iti vaktavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:5033: ubhayatrāpi tu yadi pratibhāsabhedābhedāv apy aparapratibhāsabhedābhedanibandhanau
GSP28dhebta_u:5034: tatrāpi tatpratyanavasthā tasmād ā3dyayor api tathātvaṃ vyavasthāpayituṃ na śakyata
GSP28dhebta_u:5038: tebhyāṃ bhāvasvabhāvabhedābhedebhyo 'nyaḥ sa cāsau sambandhaś ceti tathā tasya kalpanā [163.23] tasyām /
GSP28dhebta_u:5039: sopi teṣāṃ kuta ity ākāṃkṣāyāṃ sambandhāṅgīkaraṇaṃ tatrāpi tatparyanuyoge tad e4vottaram ity anavasthā /
GSP28dhebta_u:5040: svātmany evāvasthānād i[163.24]ti bruvato 'yaṃ bhāvo yadi bhāvasvabhāve tayor anupraveśas tadā sa evāvatiṣṭheta na tu tau /
GSP28dhebta_u:5041: atha tayos tasyānupraveśas tarhi tāv avatiṣṭheyātāṃ na tv asāv iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5042: punar bhedapakṣa eva doṣāntaraṃ samuccinvann āha anupakārāc ce[163.25]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5043: yau bhedābhedau tādṛśatvātā5dṛśatvalakṣaṇāv asau pratipadyate tāv api yadi bhinnau [164.1] tato vyatiriktau /
GSP28dhebta_u:5045: [164.2] na bhinnaṃ nāpy abhinnaṃ yat tadavastham,
GSP28dhebta_u:5049: tata eva hetubalāyātāt kutaścid bhinnābhinnād rūpād viśeṣasāmānyātmano[164.11]r ity atra viśeṣaśabdena svalakṣaṇaṃ na vācyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:5050: tasya bhidyata iti vyutpattyā bhedarūpatvāpatter ayogāsiddhiprasaṅgān nāpi viśeṣpadārthas tasya vināśārambharahiteśve vāṇavākāśādiṣu pravṛtteḥ pareṇa bhedaśabdenābhipretatvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:5053: 7apekṣayā hī[164.18]ty atrasthasya hiśabdasya maulasya vyākhyānam etat yasmād i[164.18]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5055: yad vā hir yasmād apekṣayā tasyeti yojyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:5057: sādhanānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ sādhanāya [165.2] niṣpādanāya kathaṃ neṣyata ity āha /
GSP28dhebta_u:5060: 8yathādṛṣṭaṃ kāryaṃ yathādṛṣṭād eva kāraṇād utpadyeteti vartate /
GSP28dhebta_u:5061: vilakṣaṇayāpi vivakṣitasāmagryā anyādṛśāpi tallakṣaṇaṃ vivakṣitasāmagryā jāyamānakāryasarūpam /
GSP28dhebta_u:5062: tatsāmagrīvailakṣaṇyāviśeṣādyasyāḥ kasyāścit sāmagryā jāyamānaṃ kiṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ na bhavatīti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5063: tathā ca sa eva doṣa ity āśaṃkya para evāha kasyāścid eve[165.23]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5064: atrāsmi[58b]1n pūrvapakṣe [165.25] yādṛśī śakti[165.28]r iti yojyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:5066: kathaṃ tad eva nāmāntareṇoktaṃ {p.380} syād ity āha tadvilakṣaṇasye[166.3]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5069: tasyāvilakṣaṇasyāgnyādikāraṇakalāpasya ya ātmātiśayaḥ śaktiśabdavācyas tasyāsaṃbhavād a[166.4]yogāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:5071: tadātmātiśayayoge 'pi katham agnyādirūpatvaṃ tasyety āha sa eva hī[166.4]ti dhūmaṃ janayati sahakārikāraṇatvena /
GSP28dhebta_u:5074: tāṃ sāmagrīm agnyādisaṃjñayā vayaṃ3 vyavaharāmo bhavantas tu śakramūrdhādisaṃjñayā vyavaharante ato nāgni saṃjñāyām eva vivādaḥ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:5075: [166.7] kathaṃ punar nāgny eva vivādo nānyatrety āha arthābhedam i[166.7]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5076: arthābhedaṃ tathā dhūmajananaśaktilakṣaṇam abhyupagamya tathābhidhānāt [166.7] śakramūrdhādīty abhidhānāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:5077: dhūmādikaṃ kāryaṃ kartṛ kathaṃ niścitam ity āha -- atadrūpe[166.9]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5079: kṣaṇāpekṣāpakṣe tu kāraṇam indhanādi kṣaṇarūpam ity avaseyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:5082: kāryaṃ hetuṃ vyākhyāyādhunānupalabdhiṃ vyācikhyāsuryatas tatas tadutthānaṃ tadupadarśayituṃ tad evam i[167.3]tyādinopakramate /
GSP28dhebta_u:5083: bhavad utpadyamānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ niścitaṃ sakṛd i[167.3]ti sakṛd apīti jñeyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:5086: avadhāraṇena pratīyamānam apy atathāvidhāj janmaniṣedhaṃ kaṇṭhoktaṃ kurvann āha -- ne[167.4]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5089: yādṛśyuktā yathoktā [167.7] tasyāṃ dṛśyatvaviśeṣaṇāyām ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:5091: svarūpa[167.8]grahaṇam upalakṣaṇaṃ tena vyāpārepīty api pratyeyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:5093: krame tāvac chabdaṃ prayuñjāno 'nupalabdhisvarūpaṃ 7tāvad darśayatīti vakṣyati /
GSP28dhebta_u:5095: yathāśruti vyākhyāne tu tathetyādi vakṣyamāṇam asaṃgataṃ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:5099: tajjñānādhāratvapratiṣedhamātravivakṣayā ca pakṣāntaram iti pramāṇāntaratvam eva tadanyavijñānāśrayeṇopapādayann {p. 381} āha nahī[167.13]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:5103: kiṃ kurvat tarhi tadabhāvapramāṇa[59a]1vyapadeśam aśnuta ity āha bhāvāṃśa (abhāvāṃśe)
GSP28dhebta_u:5106: tadindriyajanmani jñāne yadavabhāsate sa tasya viṣayas tatpratipattijanakatvena labhata ity abhisaṃbandhād dvitīyā sādhana[167.18]padasaṃskāravelāyām
GSP28dhebta_u:5108: kathaṃ tarhi sa sidhyatīty āśaṃkāyām ācāryadeśīya2syaivābhiprāyaṃ varṇayann āha anupalabdher i[167.18]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5109: yadi vimṛśyamānam “aghaṭam etadbhūtalam” iti pratītir nātiśete “tadghaṭo nāsti” iti
GSP28dhebta_u:5111: indriyārthasannikarṣāṭ jāyamānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ sad eva pramāṇāntaram anumānādeḥ pramāṇād anyat pramā3ṇam /
GSP28dhebta_u:5113: kiṃ bhūtaṃ sad etat pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam ity āha abhāvasya [167.21] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5114: tuccharūpasya [167.21] iti bhāvarūpaśūnyasyeti boddhavyam na tv avasthā(tv astv ā)
GSP28dhebta_u:5117: api tu sannikarṣasya pratyakṣapramāṇasya pramāṇarūpaṃ phalam etat tat katha4m evam uktam iti cet,
GSP28dhebta_u:5119: kevalaṃ hānādibuddhirūpaṃ phalaṃ pradhānam idaṃ pramāṇam abhipretam /
GSP28dhebta_u:5120: paricchedātmakam i[167.21]ti ca paricchidyate 'neneti paricchedas tadātmakam /
GSP28dhebta_u:5122: yadi vā pramāṇaśabdenopacārāt phalam evābhipretam iha evaṃbhūtaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇaphalāntaram
GSP28dhebta_u:5123: āca5kṣāṇaiś ca sāmarthyāt yata etad bhavati tat pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam iti darśitam
GSP28dhebta_u:5125: teṣām eva bauddhaṃ prati vakroktiṃ darśayann āha -- tad eva [167.21] iti tad eva pramāṇam anantaroktaṃ yat /
GSP28dhebta_u:5126: prativādināṃ tīrthakānām ācāryadeśīyānāṃ ca tannirāsārthaṃ [167.24] buddhibhedanirāsārthaṃ,
GSP28dhebta_u:5129: saiva tu kīdṛśī yatprāpto 'rthas tathokto vārtikakṛtety āśaṅkyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptim abhipretāṃ darśayann āha upalabdhī[167.25]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5130: upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptir evaṃrūpā śāstrakṛtā7 anyatra vyākhyātā [167.29] iti sambandhaḥ kāryaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:5135: ālambyata iti kṛtvā ālambanapratyayo nīlādiḥ sa /
GSP28dhebta_u:5136: kim artham sā tathārūpā śāstrakṛtā [167.28] {p. 382} anyatra vyākhyātety āśaṅkāyām āha -- naiyāyika [168.1] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5137: vipratipattim eva darśayann āha -- te hi [168.1] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5138: dra[178]vyāṇām u[168.2]palambhakānīti vadatā ca yatraitāni santi tadupalambhe nimittaṃ dravya eva ca santīti dravyasyaivolambhe nimittam amūni nopalambhamātra iti darśitam,
GSP28dhebta_u:5140: na ca nāsti saṃyuktasamarthatayā viśeṣaṇabhāvena tayor upalambhasyanaiyāyikair iṣṭatvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:5141: [59a]1evaṃ guṇādīnām api tathā tathopalabdher iṣṭatvād iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5142: evam eṣāṃ abhidhānaṃ kuto jñāyata iti āha mahatī[168.2]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5144: vacanādi[168.3]ty ācaṣṭa iti draṣṭavyam anyathā asaṃgatam uktaṃ syātvaiśeṣikasūtratvād asyeti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5145: asyāyam artho mahattvayukte mahatyupalabdhir bhavati na dvayaṇukādau /
GSP28dhebta_u:5146: yadi mahattvād upalabdhis tarhi paramamahattvepy avakāśādau sā kiṃ na bhavatīti paryanuyogāśaṃkāyāṃ tadvyavacchedārtham uktam anekadravyatvād iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5147: athavā anekadravyāvayavās tadvattvam avayavino mahata eva na dvayaṇukasyety utpattyānyanirapekṣatvaṃ mahattvānekadravyatvayor iti lakṣaṇavikalpa evāyaṃ vivakṣitaṃ boddhavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:5148: anekaṃ dravyam ārambhakatayā vidyate yasya tadbhāvas ta3smāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:5149: anekadravyavattvād iti pāṭhe sarvadhanāder ākṛtigaṇatvena gaṇapāṭhād asya bahuvrīhipratiṣedhena śatur vidhe draṣṭavyaḥ (matuvidhiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ)
GSP28dhebta_u:5150: anyathā karmadhārayamattvarthīyāt bahuvrīhir lāghaveneṣṭa ity anekaṃ dravyaṃ [yasya] sa tathā tadbhāvas tasmād iti nirdeśaḥ prāpnoti anekadravyavattvā(vyatvā)
GSP28dhebta_u:5151: d iti pāṭhe tu na kaścid āyāsaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:5152: yadi 4mahattvād anekadravyavattvād anyata[ra]smād vā upalabdhir vāyāv api sā syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:5156: [178] durvekānurodhena “dravyāṇām upalambhakāny āha” iti pāṭhaḥ syāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:5157: nanu cānayopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptyā yuktasyānupalambhato 'bhāvasiddher anupalabdhis tāval liṅgatvena tair iṣṭaivety āha -- evaṃ ca [168.3] iti
GSP28dhebta_u:5159: kuto 'naikāntikīty āśaṅkya 5tanmata eva sthitvā āha -- saty api [168.4] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5160: etad eva tanmatyaiva nidarśanenopapādayann āha -- nahi [168.5] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5163: anumānata upalabdhim eva tadīyāṃ darśayitum āha -- indriyatvāt [168.8] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5164: prāpyakārī [168.9] viṣayaṃ prāpya tena saha saṃyujya tatra jñānaṃ janayatīty arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:5165: e6tac cārthakathanam avaseyam na tu anugamānaprayoga eṣa /
GSP28dhebta_u:5168: m evopasaṃharann āha -- tad evam i[168.11]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5169: {p. 373} anaikāntikatvābhidhānaṃ ca teṣāṃ vaiśeṣikasūtre yathāśruti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:5171: te hi rūpād ity udbhūtasamākhyātād iti viśeṣya 7nāyanaraśmyavayavina upalabdhiṃ nivartayantīti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5175: tadupadarśaneti[pi] yadi vyabhicārasaṃbhavaḥ kathaṃ tannirākṛtaṃ bhavatīty āha yadāhī[168.13]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5176: kuto vyabhicārāvakāśa [168.15] iti tayopalabdhilakṣaṇa8prāptyā vartamānasyānupalabdhir iti ca prakaraṇāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:5179: [179] mūle “bhavanti” ity eva mudritaṃ kiṃtu “na bhavanti” ity eva pāṭho 'nuṭīkāgataḥ sādhuḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:5181: nanunaiyaikair yadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptiśabdena mahattvādikam ucyate tasyāpy anavadyatvāt
GSP28dhebta_u:5182: saivopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptir bhavatāpi kasmān nocyate kiṃ punar āhopuruṣikayānyābhidhīyata
GSP28dhebta_u:5184: tam evā[60a]1saṃbhavam āśrayābhāvadvāreṇa pratipādayitum āha nahī[168.17]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5189: kiṃ bhūteneti āha tatpratibhāse[168.18]ti tasya rūpādeḥ pratibhāsaḥ pratibhāsata iti kṛtvā svarūpam eva tasya vivekaḥ pracyutis tadvatā /
GSP28dhebta_u:5191: pa(gha)ṭapratibhāsane 'pi paṭapratibhāsavyavasthā syād ity atiprasaṅga[168.19]s tasmāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:5192: idānīṃ dravyam abhyupagamya mahattvādeḥ tadupalambhakatvam apākartṛkāma āha na ce[168.20]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5194: svahetusamudbhūte 'pi tatrāmahati dravyātmani tasyākiñcitkaratvād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:5195: svarūpeṇa mahatas tu kim arthāntare3ṇa mahattvena tadbuddher api tata evotpatter iti cābhipretya na ca svarūpeṇāmahata [168.20] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5196: ekasminn eva pakṣe sa doṣo darśito 'neneti draṣṭavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:5197: atha tatsaṃbandhe mā bhūd asya svato mahattā kiṃ naś chinnam arthāntarabhūtamahattvarūpeṇāsya grahaṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīty āha -- [168.21] -- para[181]rūpeṇeti
GSP28dhebta_u:5204: n nāma kiñcit na cātra sa(tat)
GSP28dhebta_u:5208: tasya rūpa5sya na tathā grāhakatvam i[168.24]ti sambandhanīyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:5209: grāhayatīti {p. 384} grāhakaṃ tasya bhāvas tattvam iti cārtho draṣtavyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:5214: svarūpeṇa prātisvikena ātmanā grahaṇe saty anyasyopalabdhau tasyeti pratyāsatteḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:5216: ayam asyāśayo rūpaṃ hi gṛhyamāṇam evopalambhakaṃ yuktaṃ, nānyathā /
GSP28dhebta_u:5217: na tac ca dravyarūpeṇa gṛhyate tadgrāhiṇo jñānasya bhrāntatvaprasaṃgāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:5219: tathāpy asya tathātvam upagacchāmo yadi tato bhedena tatpratibhāsaḥ 7syān na caitad astīti pratipādayann āha dravyarūpasye[168.23]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5222: etac ca dūṣaṇaṃ mahattvepy upalaṃbhe draṣtavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:5223: atraiva vaktavyāntaraṃ samuccinvann āha -- na ce[168.24]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5227: utpattikṣa8ṇe nirguṇam api dvitīye kṣaṇe saguṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīty āha na ce[168.27]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5234: nanu ca pūrvarūpanāśe tasyaiva nāśād rūpāntarāvirbhāve cānyasyaiva bhāvāt kathaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:5235: yad eva mahattvādikaṃ prati prāgapratipannādhārabhāvaṃ tad evādhā[60b]1ratāṃ yāyād
GSP28dhebta_u:5236: iti ced ayam aparo 'stu doṣo 'syety abhiprāyād adoṣa eṣaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:5237: ihāpi mahattvādikaṃ prati dravyam ādhāro nopapadyata iti darśayann āha -- na ce[169.1]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5241: yathā cākṣaṇikaḥ krameṇākrameṇa vārthakriyām upakalpayituṃ na kalpyate tathoditaṃ purastāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:5242: samavāyikāraṇasyeti prakaraṇāt mahattvādikaṃ prati samavāyikāraṇasyāsyopalambhasya dravyasyety artho 'vaseyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:5243: syād etad yadi nāmānantaroditayā nītyā taṃ prati tasyādhārabhāvo nopapadyate tathāpi tadanādhāra eva tatsamavayikāraṇaṃ kiṃ na bhavatīty āha yata [169.3] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5246: yatas tathā vyapadeśam aśnata ity āha -- na ce[169.4]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5248: ayam asyāśayo labdhātmasattvenaiva hi tathā janayitavyaṃ na tv āgṛhītamahattvādirūpeṇa
GSP28dhebta_u:5250: tu dvitīyekṣaṇe 'sattvāt na svotkalitakāryajananam iti -- paścād ādhāra [183]bhāvo
GSP28dhebta_u:5255: {p. 385} tadabhāvepi katham asaṃbhavīty āha -- yasmād i[169.6]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5257: dravyābhāvaś ca na hi rūpādivy5atiriktam ityādinā anantaram evopapāditaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:5262: yā tv i[169.13]tyādi bruvataś cāyam abhiprāyo -- yadi vyāpakādyanupalabdhyabhiprāyeṇābhāvavyavahārayetur
GSP28dhebta_u:5263: veti vaktum adhyavasyāha -- naitad rūpāt abhāvaśabdenāpy abhāvavyavahārasya viṣayeṇa
GSP28dhebta_u:5264: viṣayiṇo nirdeśasambhavena vaktuṃ śakyatvāt bruvan viśiṣṭām evānupalabdhim abipraitīti
GSP28dhebta_u:5265: upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptānupalabdher vyāpāram imaṃ kathayatā ca vārtikakṛtā sāmarthyād
GSP28dhebta_u:5266: yad atropadarśitaṃ anyatra tu sākṣād abhihitam tad api darśayann āha -- yā tv anupalabdhī[169.15]tyādi

GSP28dhebta_u:5287: kṣaṇikatve utpattikṣaṇamātrasattve sati sthiter upādātirekiṇyā abhāvāt [170.12] /
GSP28dhebta_u:5288: na pātābhāvas tasyāḥ [170.14] patanasyaivāsaṃbhavād iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:5289: kuto na patanaṃ tasyā yato na pātābhāvaḥ sthitir ity āha -- tasyāḥ [170.14] iti /

GSP28dhebta_u:5293: gurutvaṃ ca guṇaḥ “gurutvaṃ jalabhūmyoḥ patanakāraṇam” iti vacanāc ca gurutvābhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:5294: mā bhūd gurutvaṃ tasyāḥ patanaṃ tu kiṃ na bhavatīty āha -- saṃ[184]yogābhāva [170.15] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5295: yadi gurutvād eva patanaṃ bhavet na 4tarhi śākhādau phalānyavatiṣṭheteti saṃyogābhāve satīty uktam saṃyogābhāve [170.15] śākhāvṛntādisaṃyogābhāve
GSP28dhebta_u:5298: kṛtāntaḥ [170.16] siddhāntaḥ samavāyāt upalabdhes tatra samavāyād ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:5301: bhāvaviśeṣaḥ ādhāryādhārabhāvaḥ sa cātmano nityasya sa saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:5302: yady apy u5palabdher na pātaḥ sambhavī tathāpy asau kim ādhāro na bhavatīty āśaṅkya pūrvasmin pakṣa eva prativacanaṃ darśayati /

GSP28dhebta_u:5306: na tv apatanadharmaṇa iti tad āhaprāmāṇikacakracūḍāmaṇiḥ--
GSP28dhebta_u:5322: anekena nidarśanenopapadya8māno 'rthaḥ sujñāto bhavatīty nidarśanāntaram āha yathā ca [170.27] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5324: tadvad [171.1] upadarśitadvayavad viśiṣṭa [171.3] uttarapadārthābhāvaviśiṣṭe arthe [171.3] tatsadṛśa iti yāvat /

GSP28dhebta_u:5347: etad eva5 sāmānyopadarśitaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ prakṛte yojayann āha vi[185]dhiś ce[171.6]ti /

GSP28dhebta_u:5530: -- tatsaṃyogīti vivakṣitam tad eva kaivalyaṃ spaṣṭayann āha -- ghaṭaṃ pratī[180.11]ti /

GSP28dhebta_u:5836: punar i[202.6]ti viśeṣataḥ so 'nyabhāvo [202.6] yosau kevalapradeśalakṣaṇo 'nyabhāvaḥ pratyakṣalakṣaṇene[202.7]ndriyajapratyakṣalakṣanena /

GSP28dhebta_u:5838: anupalambhena siddha [202.8] iti ca tasyāpi pratyakṣasya tadanupalambharūpatvāt vāstavānuvādo boddhavyo na tu tasyānupalambharūpatāpratipādanam idānīṃ prakṛtaṃ nāpy upayuktam iti /

GSP28dhebta_u:5843: pratyakṣaṇābhāvavyavahāraṃ pravartayitum anīśāno 'sya mate mūḍho vācyas tasya pratipattau
GSP28dhebta_u:5844: [202.10] pratipa5ttiśabdena cābhāvavyavahāraikadeśo jñānalakṣaṇo anuṣṭhānalakṣaṇo vā vaktavyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:5845: tasyāṃ sādhyāyāṃ vyavahāraś ca tad itaro draṣṭavyaḥ /

GSP28dhebta_u:5852: atra tu yathā prativaktavyaṃ tathāsmābhiḥsvayūthyavicāre vicāritaṃ vistareṇeti tata evāpekṣitavyam iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5855: yady api bahuprakārānupalabdhis tathāpi mūlabhūtaprakārapradarśanārthaṃ trividhe[202.21]ty uktaṃ draṣtavyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:5856: saviśeṣaṇā [202.28] saha viśeṣaṇena upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatvalakṣaṇena vartata iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5858: siddhasambandhayo[204.3]r iti kāraṇavyāpaka8yor iti mūlagranthasyāpekṣaṇāt saṅgatam idam /

GSP28dhebta_u:5872: adhunatanāḥ punar anvayavyatirekiṇaṃ paṃcalakṣaṇam anvayinaṃ vyatirekiṇaṃ caturlakṣaṇalakṣaṇam
GSP28dhebta_u:5873: ācakṣata iti sāmānyenanaiyāyikagrahaṇe vyākhyāyamāne tanmatāvedanamasyāveditaṃ syād iti /

GSP28dhebta_u:5883: śabdavācyām udvāhya putraṃ tadarthakriyāṃ vā vyapadeśena prārthyate tena tulyam idaṃ

GSP28dhebta_u:5890: udvāhya [207.15] padārthaṃ tathaiva vyācakṣāṇa āha -- pariṇāyye[207.16]ti /

GSP28dhebta_u:5895: ambhaś cedaṃ nādeyam iti prayoge caitad ucyata ity avaseyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:5899: ambhas tv ādiṣu [207.25] hetuyopanīteṣu tathā darśanāt /

GSP28dhebta_u:5904: ata eve[208.21]ti bādhakapramāṇe sati sādhyābhāvād eva /

GSP28dhebta_u:5906: hetoḥ sāmarthyaṃ hetusāmarthyaṃ tatpratipādayann āha paraḥ [209.2] /
GSP28dhebta_u:5908: {p. 404} darśayann iti [209.2] hetau śaturvidhānāt tatrābādhāyā anyathātvapradarśanād ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:5910: yatrāsau tadartham abhidhānīyaḥ sa hetuprayogasya viṣayaḥ [209.6] /
GSP28dhebta_u:5913: vai[209.9]śabdo 'kṣamāyāṃ bādhānupalabdhir abādhetyādi yad ucyate tatra kṣamyata ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:5915: tasyā [209.10] itir mātrārthānāṃ bhayahetur apādānam ity apādānatvād apādāne pañcamīyam /
GSP28dhebta_u:5917: praśnārthasya kiṃ śabdasyāprayogepi kākur eva śiraḥkampasahitā praśnaṃ prakāśayatīty abhiprāyeṇa pṛcchatī[209.16]ti vyācaṣṭe /
GSP28dhebta_u:5918: bādhānupalabdhir abādheti abhidhānād uktam etad i[209.16-17]ty abhiprāyavān paraḥ prāhoktam evai3tad iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5919: kim arthaṃ prayujyate [209.18] sa hetur iti sāmarthyāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:5923: ādi[212.21]śabdād anumānaviruddhādeḥ saṃgrahaḥ teṣāṃ [212.23] {15] pratyakṣaviruddhādīnām upavarṇanaṃ [212.23] svarūpa4pradarśanam /
GSP28dhebta_u:5924: tadbhāvāyogād viṣayatvāyogāt sādhakapramāṇasyānumānasyāvṛtter yad uktaṃ “vyastohetor anāśraya” iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:5926: kiṃśabdaviyukte tu pāṭhe saśiraḥkampayākāṃkṣā evaṃvadataḥ praśno 'bhiprāyagato draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:5932: viruddhasyāpi viparyaye samyagdhetutvāt tadabhiprāyeṇa viparyayasya ce[213.23]ty uktam /

GSP28dhebta_u:5941: vedaprāmāṇyanirākartṛṣv i[217.14]ti pratyakṣādyadhikāropi tenāsaṃvādādītyādiṣv ity abhipretaṃ -- yad āha --vārtike kumārilaḥ--
GSP28dhebta_u:5954: keṣāṃ na kaściddhetuḥ syād ityāha ekasaṃkhyāvādinām i[218.1]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5956: a[68b]1thāpradarśitahetur i[218.6]ty asyācāryagranthasya sambandhaḥ kārya iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5957: na kathañcid vyavacchedahetukaṃ[216][218.9] kenāpi prakāreṇa nityānityavyavacchedahetutvam /

GSP28dhebta_u:5968: mīmāṃsakamatāśrayeṇāthavety anena pakṣāntaram āha -- vedāntaniṣevaṇāt [219.5] ātmatattvaniṣevaṇāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:5971: yad asya sāmarthyam āsīt tat tadupadarśanenotkīlitaṃ {p. 406} apanītaṃ [219.8] iti
GSP28dhebta_u:5972: vyācakṣāṇaś cotkīlitam apanītaṃ sādhanasāmarthyaṃ yasya śrāvaṇatvalakṣaṇasya hetoḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:5974: nanu tāni vastūni te ca puruṣāḥ pratihetunaitadviparītarūpopadarśanadvārā tathābhūtāyāḥ saṃpadaḥ pracyāvyante,
GSP28dhebta_u:5975: na tu tena hetuneti kim ucyate tāni vastūni nityatvasaṃpadaḥ pracyāvya tāṃś ca puruṣāṇ svargāpavarasampada [219.8] iti cet,
GSP28dhebta_u:5976: satyam etat kevalaṃ yasmād asau vidyamāna eva svayaṃ prāpitāyās tathābhūtāyāḥ saṃpadaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:5977: pracyāvyamānā na samānajātīyena pareṇa 5tāni vastūni tāṃś ca puruṣāṃs trāyasva trāyasveti
GSP28dhebta_u:5978: phūtkāraṃ viplavam ābhāṣamāṇānīva svajīvitam apekṣamāṇa ivopekṣate /
GSP28dhebta_u:5979: tasmāt pracyāvyā vayaṃ taṃ paraṃ prayuktaṃ ivety abhiprāyād adoṣatraya (?)
GSP28dhebta_u:5980: iti cet, sarvañcaitat kiṃ yo vastuto asaṃbhavāt pratihetur ityādidūṣaṇam avādhitaviṣayatve 'pi lakṣaṇe pratihetupa6dam apoddhṛtyābādhapadaṃ prakṣipya vaktavyaṃ /
GSP28dhebta_u:5981: ata evasmābhir etann idānam eva kiṃ vastuto 'saṃbhavadbādhatvam abādhitaviṣayatvam abhipretamutāpratibhāsamānabādhatvam api kiṃ tadaiva kiṃ vā anyeṣām api /
GSP28dhebta_u:5983: anyeṣām api kiṃ tadaivātha kālāntare 'pītyādi vikalpya sarvatra yathā 7yogaṃ dūṣaṇam
GSP28dhebta_u:5986: tato 'nyair api jigīṣubhir abādhi[ta]tve viśeṣaṇe sarvatraivānayaiva diśā pratyavastheyam iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:5991: anarthapratilambha eva syāt [221.1] arthapratilambho na syād evety arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:5993: yady evaṃ bāhyasyaiva hetutvam astu tatkim anena prayāsenety āha -- sādhye[221.3]ti /

GSP28dhebta_u:5998: anu[217]saraṃto [221.4] bhedāpratipattyā avidyamānanibandhanayādhyavasyanto nānaikavyatirekān [221.4] ekasminn apy arthe nānārūpaṃ kṛtakatvānityatvādi,

GSP28dhebta_u:6009: tena vyapadeśa3nibandhanam iti ca vyapadeśa “indriyam asthānam etad rājana (?)

GSP28dhebta_u:6018: vikalpākārād bhedena pratyetum aśakyatvāt pratibimbasyeva pratibimbakasyāpohasya athavā anayā vacanabhaṅgyā buddhayākāro 'pi tathādhyasto 'poho vācya iti darśitam anena /
GSP28dhebta_u:6019: kathaṃ tasya sāmānyātmatvavyvasthety āha -- yasmād i[221.10]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:6022: tathā ca jñānaṃ kiṃ na rūpaṃ liṅgasyety āha -- tathātve ca [221.11] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:6026: rūpa[222]m abhidhīyate [221.17] evaṃvidhaṃ liṅgasya rūpam ity abhidhīyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:6038: na hi teṣv asatsv i[222.2]ti bruvato 'yaṃ bhāvo yadi tatra sādhyaṃ na bhavet tadā tadavyabhicārivastudarśanapranāḍikayā tatra jñānam eva na bhavet /
GSP28dhebta_u:6039: yadi ca liṅge dhūmādau mahattvādisamavāyo na syāt,

GSP28dhebta_u:6041: tadā tadviṣayaṃ pratyakṣam eva na bhavet /
GSP28dhebta_u:6042: asati ca tasmin na liṅgini vijñānam utpadyeta tathālokā bhāve 'pi tathaiva liṅgijñānānutpattir jñātavyā /
GSP28dhebta_u:6046: niścayo 'pīty eva pāṭhaḥ yatra pustake {p. 408} niścayo hī[222.9]ti pāṭhaḥ /

GSP28dhebta_u:6052: tādātmyatadutpattī lakṣaṇe nimitte yasya bhāvasya sa tathā tadviśiṣṭena [222.21] /
GSP28dhebta_u:6053: nanu ca darśanādarśananibandhanau sapakṣāsapakṣayo[69a]1r bhāvābhāvāv apy anyonyaviśiṣṭāv eva tat ko 'tiśayo 'nenokta ity āśaṅkyāha -- etad uktaṃ bhavatī[222.22]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:6062: utpattyatireki2ṇyāḥ sattāyā anutpatter yā sattā utpatti[223.19]r iti vyācaṣṭe /

GSP28dhebta_u:6065: tathā ca ayatnasiddhaḥ sarvaḥ sarvadarśīty āśayaḥ /

GSP28dhebta_u:6075: bhavati niścayas tadadhīnatā tayor bhāvābhāvayoḥ sattā vyavasthety asyārthasya jñāpanārthaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:6077: ācāryadignāgakṛtaniścitagrahaṇārthe bhūyaḥ saṃhriyamāṇevartikakāreṇa katham asmā5bhir ity ucyata ity āśaṃkyāha -- asmābhir i[225.9]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:6079: niścitagrahaṇe [225.9] asmākam abhimatatvād i[225.10]ti vacanena caivaṃācāryasyābhiprāyaṃ darśayati /
GSP28dhebta_u:6080: tac ced asmākam abhimatam eva tadāsmābhir evoktam iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:6081: evaṃ tāvad anena vyākhyātaṃ lakṣyate punar ayam asyārthaḥ -- {p. 409} etad arthaṃ

GSP28dhebta_u:6084: dvayor arthayor bahuvacanaṃ kena vacaneneti “asmadordvayoś ca” ity aneneti brūma iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:6085: ato 'pi nyāyāt iti pāṭhoḥ ata eva nyāyāt [225.12] iti tu pramādapāṭhaḥ /

GSP28dhebta_u:6089: vyāvṛttikṛtaṃ bhedam upādāya [226.9] iti tatrābhāvavyāvṛttyā bhāvo vyavasthāpyate /
GSP28dhebta_u:6091: paramārthato bhedo nāsti [226.10] iti bruvato8yaṃ bhāvaḥ tasmin saty eva bhāvo bhavitṛtvaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:6092: tadabhāvo cābhāva evābhavitṛtvaṃ evam eva hetoḥ svagata evāyaṃ dharmo 'ta eva yatrānvayas
GSP28dhebta_u:6093: tatra vyatireka iti svabhāvahetusādhyam etad avatiṣṭhate /
GSP28dhebta_u:6096: nanu ca yady anayoḥ parasparāntarbhāvo na bhavet tarhi katham ekaṃ vākyam ubhayaṃ gamayet /
GSP28dhebta_u:6098: bhinnalakṣaṇam eva [226.15] vyāvṛttito bhinnasvabhāvam eva santaṃ tataś ca bhinnatvāt anayor liṅgarūpatvāc ca pṛthagavayavāntaratvaṃ yuktam iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:6099: yady ekaḥ svabhā...............yaduktapūrvaṃ tadavastham evety āha paraspara [226.16] ityādi /

GSP28dhebta_u:6102: na tv i[226.17]tyādinoktena ity āśaṅkya pūrvapakṣavādimata eva ...............darśayitum

GSP28dhebta_u:6105: pratibandhaś ca [226.22] pratibaddhatvañ ca hetor ity arthāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:6107: tadbhāve bhāvarūpa eve[226.23]ti vicārata etad avatiṣṭhate /
GSP28dhebta_u:6108: yata ity abhiprāyeṇoktaṃ ekavākyeneti pīno devadatta ityādinā tata evaikavākyā[225]ntarabhāvād i[227.17]ti
GSP28dhebta_u:6113: tadantarbhāvamātreṇa [227.18] ekavākyārthāntarbhāvamātreṇa niyamavadvākyavyapakṣeyā kadācid dṛṣṭena tadantarbhāvāt /
GSP28dhebta_u:6114: ekarūpāntarar bhāvāt tu dvitīyagati[227.27]r neti vartate /
GSP28dhebta_u:6115: bhinnarūpāv eve[228.6]ti yathā tayā ka5......ta tathā bhinnarūpāv eveti /
GSP28dhebta_u:6120: syād etat ye tāvat jñātatvaśabdena jñānam evābhidadhate te santūktayā nītyā nirākṛtāḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:6121: ye tu jñānakarmatvaṃ jñātatvaṃ6 .........nirākriyante ity āśaṅkāyām āha tad ayam atra [228.20] ityādi /
GSP28dhebta_u:6123: prakaraṇam upasaṃharann āha -- tad evam i[228.28]ti /
GSP28dhebta_u:6124: trīṇi pakṣadharmānvayavyatirekātmakāni lakṣaṇāni yasya sa tathokta iti sarvam avadātam /
GSP28dhebta_u:6126: ṭīkāṃ paṭīyasīm īdṛśīṃ parārtham uddiśya praṇayatā niyataṃ mayāpi kim api puṇyaṃ
GSP28dhebta_u:6127: upārjitaṃ tad apy ahaṃ parārtham upanayām iti manvāno 'nekajanmābhyastakṛpāyogāt
GSP28dhebta_u:6129: asyāyaṃ samudāyā[rthaḥ 8munīśarādddhā]ntanayapradīpam [229.2] vivṛ[226]tya yat puṇyam upārjitaṃ tat jagato viśuddhiṃ vidheyāt [229.3] iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:6130: kāyavāṅmanomaunayogān munayaḥ pratyekabuddhādayas teṣāṃ īśaḥ śāstā buddho bhagavān savāsanakleśaparihāṇiyogenāta(?)
GSP28dhebta_u:6131: bhyas tasya prakarṣaprāptayā tāyitvāt tasya nayo nītiḥ pravacanaṃ tasya rāddhāntaḥ
GSP28dhebta_u:6133: yathāvatprakāśanāt kutsitaḥ pramāṇānupapannārthaprakāśanāt tarko nyāyadarśanādi[r i]ti tathā /
GSP28dhebta_u:6135: tasya mārgaḥ [229.1] panthāḥ siddhānta ity arthaḥ /
GSP28dhebta_u:6136: kṣataḥ khaṇḍitaḥ tadvairūpyāpādanād aśeṣaḥ kutarkamārgo yena sa tathā /
GSP28dhebta_u:6138: tat puṇyaṃ [229.3] kartṛ viśuddhiṃ [229.3] vimalacittasaṃtati parāṃ [229.4] prakṛṣṭāṃ sarvāvaraṇaprahāṇād iti sarvam anavadyam iti /
GSP28dhebta_u:6143: nāstīha sūktaṃ mama yat punaḥ syāt gurorjitāreḥsa khalu prasādaḥ //
GSP28dhebta_u:6144: kutūhalenaiva yadṛcchayā vā mātsaryato doṣajighṛkṣa3[yā vā]
GSP28dhebta_u:6148: parārtham uddiśya yathārthamarcaṭaṃvivṛṇya puṇyaṃ yadupārjitaṃ mayā /
GSP28dhebta_u:6149: nihantu tenāvaraṇāni vidviṣo janontarāyeṇa vinaiva sarvathā //
